items.title: The Daily News — 2026-01-30 Edition
items.content_html:
A curated selection of today’s most interesting stories from 61 RSS sources.

Technology

Transforming Handwritten Journals Into Beautiful Printed Books

Ordered my first Day One printed book. Still have some work to consolidate my hand-written journal to digital, then will be ordering a couple more.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/29/ordered-my-first-day-one.html

Finally Make Finder Columns Fit Your Filenames Automatically

macOS 26 Tahoe introduces a long-awaited solution for truncated filenames in Finder’s column view with an auto-resize checkbox. Best of all, you can enable this helpful feature on earlier macOS versions too, making it easier to read full file names at a glance.

Source: https://tidbits.com/2026/01/29/make-finder-window-columns-resize-to-fit-filenames/

US Leads Global Gas Power Surge to Feed AI Data Center Demands

The US is driving a 31% global increase in gas-fired power plants, with over one-third of new capacity earmarked for data centers. This boom, led by the Stargate AI facility in Texas, signals a concerning trend of rising emissions despite clean energy goals.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/news/870422/data-center-ai-gas-power-surge

iPhone Breaks Records With $85.3 Billion Quarterly Revenue

Apple just reported its strongest iPhone quarter ever, with revenue soaring to $85.3 billion—a 23% increase from last year. The company’s overall Q1 earnings hit $143.8 billion, proving that iPhone demand remains incredibly strong despite delays to AI-powered Siri features.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/news/870319/apple-iphone-best-revenue-ai-q1-2026

These Hedgehog Headphones Transform into Portable Speakers

TDM’s bizarre Neo headphones that roll up into compact Bluetooth speakers will launch on Kickstarter February 10th, 2026. Priced at $249, this innovative CES standout offers a unique two-in-one design for both personal listening and sharing music with others.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/news/870416/tdm-neo-wireless-headphones-bluetooth-speaker-kickstarter-february \n## Politics

Elizabeth Warren Demands AI Bailout Promise From OpenAI

Senator Elizabeth Warren has asked OpenAI to commit to not seeking a government bailout if the company fails, citing concerns about soaring AI spending and a potential market bubble. The author suggests Warren’s efforts may be misguided, arguing that OpenAI is too far committed to their strategy to worry about bailout contingencies—they’ll either succeed spectacularly or fail beyond any government rescue.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/29/elizabeth-warren-asks-openai-to.html

Comcast Bleeds 181,000 Customers Despite Price Guarantee Reform

Comcast lost a staggering 181,000 broadband subscribers in Q4 2025, despite attempts to win back customers with five-year price guarantees and unlimited data plans. The cable giant acknowledged long-standing issues with pricing transparency and customer service, but these fixes have yet to reverse the exodus to fiber and wireless competitors.

Source: https://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2026/01/comcast-keeps-losing-customers-despite-price-guarantee-and-unlimited-data/

Tesla Abandons Luxury EVs for Humanoid Robots

Tesla is discontinuing its Model S and X vehicles as Elon Musk pivots away from car manufacturing to focus on humanoid robotics and AI. The decision follows Tesla’s worst financial year ever, with profits nearly halved and revenues declining for the first time in company history.

Source: https://arstechnica.com/cars/2026/01/tesla-kills-models-s-and-x-to-build-humanoid-robots-instead/

Kritis-Dachgesetz: Strengere Regeln für Deutschlands kritische Infrastruktur verabschiedet

Der deutsche Bundestag hat das Kritis-Dachgesetz verabschiedet, das Betreiber kritischer Infrastrukturen wie Energieversorger vor Sabotage und Stromausfällen besser schützen soll. Mit strengeren Sicherheitsstandards reagiert die Politik auf wachsende Bedrohungen – doch Frage bleibt, ob das neue Gesetz tatsächlich ausreicht, um die Resilienz der wichtigsten Anlagen des Landes signifikant zu erhöhen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Krit…

Effiziente Apple-Geräteverwaltung mit Jamf: Webinar zeigt Best Practices

Verwalten Sie Apple-Geräte mit Jamf Pro automatisiert und sicher. Das Webinar deckt alles von der Grundkonfiguration über Patch-Management bis zu Security-Aspekten und Reporting ab. Perfekt für IT-Teams, die ihre Apple-Infrastruktur optimieren möchten.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Webi… \n## Entertainment

Brandon Sanderson to Write Mistborn Screenplay Himself

“I will be writing the Mistborn screenplay myself over the next 5 months, as my full time work. I promise not to get too distracted to do books. However, if I want this done right, I need to give some real attention and heart to it now.”

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/29/more-from-brandon-sanderson-on.html

Your Complete Guide to Apple TV’s Most Anticipated 2026 Releases

Apple TV’s 2026 lineup is packed with returning favorites and exciting new series. Look forward to Ted Lasso’s surprising fourth season, star-studded thrillers like Eternity with Elizabeth Olsen and Miles Teller, and Apple’s massive new fantasy universe based on Brandon Sanderson’s bestselling Cosmere books. From the heartwarming Yo Gabba GabbaLand! season 2 to dark psychological thrillers starring Elisabeth Moss and Kerry Washington, there’s something for every viewer.

Source: https://www.macworld.com/article/340717/apple-tv-plus-upcoming-shows-future-moves-series-release-dates-film-television.html

Shrinking Season 3 Now Streaming on Apple TV Plus

Apple TV+ just dropped Season 3 of the hit comedy ‘Shrinking,’ starring Jason Segel as a therapist breaking all the rules. The streaming service continues expanding its impressive library of originals, from ‘Ted Lasso’ to ‘Severance,’ now offering over 100 shows and movies. New subscribers can dive in for $12.99 monthly or take advantage of free trial offers to sample the acclaimed content.

Source: https://www.macworld.com/article/230863/apple-tv-originals-shows-series-movies-release-dates-news-actors-directors.html

Moltbot soll ein Durchbruch als echter KI-Assistent sein, der sich Gespräche merkt und proaktiv Aufgaben erledigt. Das Tool erzeugt derzeit erheblichen Hype in der KI-Szene, bringt aber auch bedeutende Sicherheitsrisiken mit sich.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Ist-…

40. Jahrestag: Das Challenger-Unglück, das die Welt schockierte

Am 28. Januar 1986 explodierte das Space Shuttle Challenger kurz nach dem Start und tötete alle sieben Besatzungsmitglieder. Der bis heute schwerste Unfall der bemannten Raumfahrt veränderte die Weltraumindustrie grundlegend und bleibt in Erinnerung als dunkler Meilenstein der Raumfahrtgeschichte.

Source: [www.heise.de/hintergru…

Behind the Visual Magic of Stranger Things 5’s Epic Finale

A revealing look at how Wētā FX brought Stranger Things 5’s climactic battle to life, from the practical Pain Tree set to the fully digital Mind Flayer. Production combined real-world quarry locations with cutting-edge VFX to create the Abyss, culminating in Joyce’s dramatic Vecna decapitation.

Source: https://beforesandafters.com/2026/01/30/in-the-abyss/ \n## Health

Ollie’s Arcade Kickstarter Brings Ad-Free Retro Games to Everyone

The Iconfactory launched a successful Kickstarter to expand Ollie’s Arcade, making all in-app purchase games completely free and bringing back the beloved puzzle game Frenzic. This campaign promotes the concept of well-crafted, ad-free iOS games that you pay for once rather than subscribe to, offering a refreshing alternative to today’s gaming landscape.

Source: https://blog.iconfactory.com/2026/01/bringing-more-fun-free-retro-gaming-to-ios/

Testing Misen’s New Nonstick Carbon Pan: Worth the Hype?

Misen claims their new carbon steel nonstick pan is in a class of its own, but does it actually deliver on its promises? This hands-on review puts the pan through rigorous cooking tests to evaluate its nonstick capabilities, durability, and overall performance. Find out if this hybrid cookware truly bridges the gap between traditional carbon steel and modern nonstick surfaces.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/misen-carbon-nonstick-pan-review-11874480

Digitale Gesundheitsmesse DMEA verlässt Berlin nach 2027

Die DMEA, wichtigste Messe für digitale Gesundheit in Europa, zieht überraschend nach 2027 von Berlin an einen neuen Standort ab. Damit endet nach diesem Jahr die erfolgreiche Ära der Digital-Health-Messe in der Hauptstadt. Für Berlin ist bereits ein neues Gesundheitsmesse-Konzept angekündigt worden.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/DMEA…

How Lego’s Money Tree Set Brings Good Luck This Lunar New Year

A writer shares how her family blends traditional Lunar New Year preparations with a modern twist using the Lego Money Tree set. The festive building activity combines Chinese symbolism with family bonding, creating space for prosperity while decluttering away the old year’s baggage.

Source: [www.nytimes.com/wirecutte… \n## Food

A Romance Novelist Picks the Perfect Valentine’s Day Gifts for Foodies

Serious Eats consulted a romance novelist to curate the ultimate Valentine’s Day gift guide for food-loving partners. The thoughtful recommendations include romantic candles, beloved sweet cookbooks, and artisanal cheese selections that blend culinary passion with heartfelt romance.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/best-valentines-day-gifts-editor-picks-11892700 \n## Business

iPhone Demand ‘Simply Staggering’ as Apple Smashes Records

Apple reported record-breaking revenue of $143.8B for Q1 2026, driven by exceptional iPhone sales that hit an all-time high of $85.2B—up 23% year-over-year. CEO Tim Cook described demand as “simply staggering,” with the iPhone 17 family powering unprecedented growth across all geographic markets during the holiday shopping season.

Source: https://www.macrumors.com/2026/01/29/iphone-demand-simply-staggering/

Apple’s Vision Pro Dog Documentary Reveals Immersive Video’s Growing Pains

Apple’s new ‘Top Dogs’ immersive documentary for Vision Pro takes viewers behind the scenes at the famous Crufts dog show. While it offers some remarkable close-up experiences, the film also highlights the challenges creators still face with immersive video, including shaky camera work and a tendency to rush through content rather than letting viewers truly immerse themselves.

Source: https://sixcolors.com/link/2026/01/vision-pro-goes-to-the-dogs/

Elon Musk Eyes Merger Between SpaceX and Tesla or xAI

SpaceX is reportedly exploring a potential merger with either Tesla or xAI ahead of its planned IPO in mid-2026. The strategic move could support SpaceX’s ambitious plans to launch data centers into space, creating an unprecedented convergence of Musk’s empire spanning electric vehicles, AI, and space exploration.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/tech/870380/elon-musk-space-x-xai-merger

Apple feiert Rekord-Weihnachtsgeschäft dank iPhone

Apple hat im Weihnachtsgeschäft erneut Rekorde bei Umsatz und Gewinn aufgestellt – getrieben vor allem von starken iPhone-Verkäufen. Doch Analysten fragen sich bereits, wie lange der iPhone-Motor noch auf Hochtouren laufen wird und ob Apple neue Wachstumstreiber braucht.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Appl…

Court Blocks Worker Councils for App-Only Delivery Platforms

Germany’s Federal Labor Court has ruled that platform workers in delivery areas without physical on-site supervision cannot elect their own works councils. The decision demands clearer organizational structures in the gig economy, affecting thousands of delivery workers who communicate primarily through apps rather than traditional workplace hierarchies.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Bund… \n## Science

Atacama-Wüste gesichert: Astronomen atmen auf

Ein US-Energiekonzern hat den Bau einer Wasserstoffanlage in der chilenischen Atacama-Wüste abgesagt – eine große Erleichterung für Astronomen weltweit. Die geplante Anlage hätte empfindliche Teleskope gestört, die von dem extrem trockenen Klima der Wüste profitieren.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Indu…

James Webb: Neuer Rekord bei der Entdeckung entferntester Galaxien

Das James-Webb-Teleskop hat erneut die Grenzen des beobachtbaren Universums verschoben und einen neuen Rekord bei der Beobachtung der am weitesten entfernten Galaxien aufgestellt. Diese Entdeckung liefert faszinierende Einblicke in die Frühzeit des Kosmos und zeigt, dass das Teleskop auch nach Jahren der Betriebstätigkeit weiterhin Überraschungen im frühen Universum zutage fördert.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Welt…

iMessage auf Android: Open-Source-Projekt durchbricht Apples Schranken

BlueBubbles ist eine Open-Source-Serverlösung, die iMessages an Android-Geräte weiterleitet und damit Apples strenge Ökosystem-Grenzen überwindet. Das Projekt ermöglicht Android-Nutzern erstmals den Zugriff auf den beliebten Apple-Dienst, obwohl dieser offiziell nur für Apple-Geräte verfügbar ist.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Blue…

Amazon macht erste „Fallout"-Staffel gratis auf YouTube verfügbar

Amazon stellt die komplette erste Staffel der beliebten TV-Serie „Fallout" kostenlos auf YouTube zur Verfügung. Die Verfügbarkeitsdauer ist derzeit noch ungewiss, was Fans die Gelegenheit gibt, die postapokalyptische Serie jetzt ohne zusätzliche Kosten zu streamen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Erst…

Millionen Trümmer im All: Die unsichtbare Gefahr für unseren Alltag

Millionen von Weltraumschrott-Teilen gefährden unsere Satelliten und damit essentielle Technologien wie Navigation, Kommunikation und Wettervorhersage. Eine Videoreportage mit einem DLR-Experten zeigt die dramatischen Risiken und innovative Lösungsansätze für das wachsende Problem im Erdorbit.

Source: [www.heise.de/hintergru… \n## Sports

The Perfect Down Jacket for Every Winter Adventure

After testing 60 insulated jackets across 300 miles of rugged terrain, Wirecutter named the Montbell Alpine Light Down Jacket the top pick. Its winning combination of lightweight warmth and weather resistance makes it ideal for everything from casual gatherings to winter snowshoeing.

Source: [www.nytimes.com/wirecutte…

This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that:

  1. Aggregates content from 61 RSS feeds

The decision demands clearer organizational structures in the gig economy, affecting thousands of delivery workers who communicate primarily through apps rather than traditional workplace hierarchies. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Bund...](https://www.heise.de/news/Bundesarbeitsgericht-Keine-Betriebsraete-bei-reiner-App-Steuerung-11159437.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Bundesarbeitsgericht-Keine-Betriebsraete-bei-reiner-App-Steuerung-11159437.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) \n## Science ### Atacama-Wüste gesichert: Astronomen atmen auf Ein US-Energiekonzern hat den Bau einer Wasserstoffanlage in der chilenischen Atacama-Wüste abgesagt – eine große Erleichterung für Astronomen weltweit. Die geplante Anlage hätte empfindliche Teleskope gestört, die von dem extrem trockenen Klima der Wüste profitieren. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Indu...](https://www.heise.de/news/Industrieprojekt-in-der-Atacama-Wueste-abgesagt-Astronomen-erleichtert-11159473.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Industrieprojekt-in-der-Atacama-Wueste-abgesagt-Astronomen-erleichtert-11159473.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### James Webb: Neuer Rekord bei der Entdeckung entferntester Galaxien Das James-Webb-Teleskop hat erneut die Grenzen des beobachtbaren Universums verschoben und einen neuen Rekord bei der Beobachtung der am weitesten entfernten Galaxien aufgestellt. Diese Entdeckung liefert faszinierende Einblicke in die Frühzeit des Kosmos und zeigt, dass das Teleskop auch nach Jahren der Betriebstätigkeit weiterhin Überraschungen im frühen Universum zutage fördert. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Welt...](https://www.heise.de/news/Weltraumteleskop-James-Webb-Neuer-Rekord-bei-am-weitesten-entfernten-Galaxien-11158846.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Weltraumteleskop-James-Webb-Neuer-Rekord-bei-am-weitesten-entfernten-Galaxien-11158846.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### iMessage auf Android: Open-Source-Projekt durchbricht Apples Schranken BlueBubbles ist eine Open-Source-Serverlösung, die iMessages an Android-Geräte weiterleitet und damit Apples strenge Ökosystem-Grenzen überwindet. Das Projekt ermöglicht Android-Nutzern erstmals den Zugriff auf den beliebten Apple-Dienst, obwohl dieser offiziell nur für Apple-Geräte verfügbar ist. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Blue...](https://www.heise.de/news/BlueBubbles-Serverloesung-leitet-iMessages-an-Android-weiter-11156237.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/BlueBubbles-Serverloesung-leitet-iMessages-an-Android-weiter-11156237.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Amazon macht erste „Fallout"-Staffel gratis auf YouTube verfügbar Amazon stellt die komplette erste Staffel der beliebten TV-Serie „Fallout" kostenlos auf YouTube zur Verfügung. Die Verfügbarkeitsdauer ist derzeit noch ungewiss, was Fans die Gelegenheit gibt, die postapokalyptische Serie jetzt ohne zusätzliche Kosten zu streamen. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Erst...](https://www.heise.de/news/Erste-Staffel-von-Fallout-gratis-auf-YouTube-11158310.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Erste-Staffel-von-Fallout-gratis-auf-YouTube-11158310.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Millionen Trümmer im All: Die unsichtbare Gefahr für unseren Alltag Millionen von Weltraumschrott-Teilen gefährden unsere Satelliten und damit essentielle Technologien wie Navigation, Kommunikation und Wettervorhersage. Eine Videoreportage mit einem DLR-Experten zeigt die dramatischen Risiken und innovative Lösungsansätze für das wachsende Problem im Erdorbit. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/hintergru...](https://www.heise.de/hintergrund/Weltraumschrott-Gefahr-fuer-Satelliten-und-unseren-Alltag-11155150.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag_plus.beitrag_plus](https://www.heise.de/hintergrund/Weltraumschrott-Gefahr-fuer-Satelliten-und-unseren-Alltag-11155150.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag_plus.beitrag_plus)) \n## Sports ### The Perfect Down Jacket for Every Winter Adventure After testing 60 insulated jackets across 300 miles of rugged terrain, Wirecutter named the Montbell Alpine Light Down Jacket the top pick. Its winning combination of lightweight warmth and weather resistance makes it ideal for everything from casual gatherings to winter snowshoeing. --- Source: [[www.nytimes.com/wirecutte...](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/best-insulated-jacket/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/best-insulated-jacket/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed)) --- #### How This Newsletter Works This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that: 1. **Aggregates** content from 61 RSS feeds 2. **Filters** articles from the last 24 hours 3. **Categorizes** each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air) 4. **Detects similarities** and combines related stories 5. **Selects** the top 5 most interesting stories per category 6. **Summarizes** each story with AI (GLM-4.7) **Tech Stack**: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings. --- **Generated with ❤️ by n8n**

items.title: The Daily News — 2026-01-29 Edition
items.content_html:
A curated selection of today’s most interesting stories from 61 RSS sources.

Entertainment

Springsteen’s New Minneapolis Song Honors Candlelight Vigil

Seton nurses organized a moving candlelight vigil for Alex Pretti, featuring Bruce Springsteen’s newly released tribute song ‘Streets of Minneapolis.’ The vigil brought community members together in remembrance, with the Boss’s latest anthem providing a powerful soundtrack to the evening’s reflections.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/28/we-went-to-a-candlelight.html

Apple TV Lands Brandon Sanderson’s Entire Cosmere Universe in Unprecedented Deal

Apple TV has acquired the rights to Brandon Sanderson’s entire Cosmere literary universe, marking a landmark deal for fantasy adaptations. Sanderson will maintain unprecedented creative control as architect, writer, and producer, with plans for Mistborn as a feature film and Stormlight Archive as a TV series—giving him more involvement than even J.K. Rowling or George R.R. Martin.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/28/apple-tv-acquires-rights-to.html

Crusader Kings 3 DLCs jetzt im Abo-Modell ab 10 Euro verfügbar

Paradox Interactive führt ein neues Abo-Modell für die Erweiterungspakete von Crusader Kings 3 ein. Ähnlich wie bei Spotify oder Netflix können Spieler nun gegen eine monatliche Gebühr ab 10 Euro auf alle DLCs zugreifen und dadurch im Vergleich zum Einzelkauf erheblich sparen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Crus…

8 Gripping Polar Exploration Books That Will Chill and Inspire You

Discover the most captivating tales of Arctic and Antarctic exploration, from Shackleton’s miraculous Endurance expedition to Mawson’s unthinkable solo survival. These gripping narratives offer more than adventure—they’re powerful lessons in leadership, resilience, and the limits of human endurance when pushed to the edge.

Source: https://www.artofmanliness.com/living/reading/polar-books/

Batman Faces Twisted New Villain Who Eliminates Fear

A mysterious villain named the Lion is terrorizing Gotham with a plague that removes the ability to feel fear. Batman discovers the antagonist is a traumatized boy turned scientific genius who admires Bruce Wayne but hates Batman, building toward an explosive confrontation.

Source: [geekdad.com/2026/01/r… \n## Technology

Apple’s Secretive Culture Undermines Trust

The article critiques Apple’s infamous secrecy, suggesting that more transparent and authentic communication from leadership would significantly improve public perception. When Apple remains tight-lipped on important issues, it damages trust, but regular commentary from executives could create a more genuine connection with customers.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/28/apples-notorious-secrecy-really-hurts.html

How RSS Readers Create Digital Guilt Through Design

Terry Godier’s thoughtful essay explores how RSS reader interfaces that display unread counts transform reading from a pleasure into an obligation. The design subtly argues that content should be counted and progress measured, creating unnecessary psychological pressure on users to ‘catch up’ rather than enjoy reading at their own pace.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/28/beautiful-essay-by-terry-godier.html

Snap’s AR Glasses Spin Off Into Standalone Company

Snap is spinning its AR glasses project, Specs, into a dedicated subsidiary called Specs Inc. ahead of the consumer launch expected later this year. The move separates the experimental eyewear from Snap’s main operations, allowing focused development of its augmented reality technology.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/28/techcrunch-on-the-snap-specs.html

Simple Fix for iPhone Disconnecting From Image Capture

A pesky bug causes iPhones to randomly disconnect from Image Capture whenever tethering is toggled on or off. Thankfully, the workaround is straightforward: simply disable tethering or enable Airplane mode while transferring photos to keep your connection stable.

Source: https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/28/fixing-iphone-disconnects-from-image-capture/

Cloudflare Faces Backlash Over AI-Generated Matrix Homeserver Post

Cloudflare published a blog post about implementing Matrix on Cloudflare Workers, but critics revealed the code was AI-generated and incomplete, with missing security features. The incident raises concerns about credibility when tech companies use AI to produce technical content without proper review.

Source: https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/28/cloudflare-matrix-homeserver/ \n## Politics

Ireland Moves to Break Encryption for Police Access

Ireland’s government plans legislation granting police power to intercept encrypted messages across IoT devices, email, and messaging platforms, while legalizing spyware use. Following EU Commission guidelines, the proposal mirrors global government efforts to compel tech companies to provide backdoor access to encrypted communications, though officials haven’t explained how they’ll technically bypass encryption without compromising security.

Source: https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/28/irish-communications-interception-and-lawful-access-bill/

Tim Cook’s Memo and the Art of Saying Nothing

George Orwell’s analysis of political language finds a modern target in Tim Cook’s vague memo about Minneapolis events. The critique explores how corporate euphemisms and cowardly language avoid moral clarity while creating an illusion of substance.

Source: https://daringfireball.net/2026/01/politics_and_the_english_language_january_2026_edition

Tim Cook’s Vague Memo on Minneapolis Border Patrol Killings Draws Criticism

Apple CEO Tim Cook issued a company-wide memo addressing the ’events in Minneapolis,’ but critics note his vague language fails to name Alex Pretti or Renée Good, victims of Border Patrol shootings. Cook’s response—unlike his 2020 statement on George Floyd—lacks public urgency, drawing sharp contrast with Apple’s previous stance on racial justice.

Source: https://www.macrumors.com/2026/01/27/tim-cook-responds-after-minneapolis-shootings/

Tim Cook unter Feuer: Trump-Besuch sorgt für interne Unruhe bei Apple

Apple-Chef Tim Cook sieht sich massiver Kritik ausgesetzt, auch intern, nach seinem Besuch bei Donald Trump angesichts der gewaltsamen Eskalation. Der kontroverse Kinoabend bei den Trumps hat interne Unruhen ausgelöst, woraufhin Cook ein Memo versandte, um die Wogen zu glätten und Mitarbeiter zu beruhigen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Trum… \n## Science

Challenger’s “Remove Before Flight” Tags Found 40 Years Later

An aerospace enthusiast who purchased red “Remove Before Flight” tags on eBay in 2010 discovered they were originally attached to the space shuttle Challenger before its tragic 1986 disaster. Now, he’s tracing their journey from the NASA launchpad to his doorstep, hoping to document their historical significance and potentially donate them to museums and educational institutions for preservation.

Source: https://arstechnica.com/space/2026/01/attached-to-tragedy-tracing-challenger-remove-before-flight-tags/

Ancient DNA Rewrites the Dark History of Syphilis

A groundbreaking discovery of a 5,500-year-old Treponema pallidum genome in Colombia reveals that syphilis-causing bacteria existed millennia before the infamous 1495 European pandemic. This archaeological finding completely overturns long-held beliefs about the disease’s origins, proving the pathogen has plagued humans for thousands of years longer than historians ever imagined.

Source: https://arstechnica.com/science/2026/01/the-origin-story-of-syphilis-goes-back-far-longer-than-we-thought/

Japan’s H3 Rocket Finds a New Way to Fail, Losing Its 5-Ton Satellite in Flight

Japan’s H3 rocket suffered an unprecedented failure last month when a 5-ton navigation satellite detached mid-flight and the rocket simply continued. This novel malfunction has baffled engineers, as it represents a failure mode that apparently wasn’t considered possible during design.

Source: https://arstechnica.com/science/2026/01/heres-the-story-of-how-japans-h3-rocket-lost-its-cargo-and-just-kept-going/

Durchbruch: Neues Lasersystem erzeugt superscharfe Röntgenpulse

Hamburger Forscher haben am European XFEL ein revolutionäres Lasersystem namens XFELO entwickelt, das deutlich präzisere Röntgenpulse erzeugt als bisher möglich. Diese Technologie ermöglicht genauere Einblicke in die Struktur von Materie und verspricht bahnbrechende wissenschaftliche Entdeckungen in Physik, Chemie und Biologie.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/XFEL… \n## Health

South Carolina Breaks Measles Record as US Risks Elimination Status

South Carolina’s explosive measles outbreak has reached 789 cases, surpassing Texas’s previous record of 762 and marking the largest outbreak since measles was declared eliminated in 2000. With cases nearly quadrupling from 218 to 789 in just one month, the US faces the very real threat of losing its measles elimination status as the virus continues spreading unchecked.

Source: https://arstechnica.com/health/2026/01/sc-measles-23-schools-hit-over-550-quarantined-as-outbreak-hits-record/

The Underrated Cast Iron Skillet You Need in Your Kitchen

Discover the specific cast iron skillet size that offers exceptional non-toxic, nonstick cooking properties. This essential kitchen tool combines health benefits with superior cooking performance, making it a worthwhile upgrade for home cooks seeking safer, more effective cookware.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/lodge-cast-iron-skillet-sale-11894172

Weeknight-Ready White Bean and Kale Soup

This 30-minute soup combines creamy white beans, fire-roasted tomatoes, and hearty kale for a nutritious, satisfying meal. Perfect for busy weeknights when you want something healthy and delicious without spending hours in the kitchen.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/30-minute-white-bean-and-kale-soup-recipe-11894062

Essential Tools That Make Breast Pumping Easier and More Comfortable

Wirecutter’s comprehensive guide draws on years of expert testing to recommend the best pumping bras, accessories, and tools for nursing parents. From hands-free pumping bras to breast care essentials, these products can transform the pumping experience from a chore into a more manageable routine.

Source: [www.nytimes.com/wirecutte…

The Best Breast Pumps for Every Nursing Style

After testing 32 pumps, Wirecutter reveals the top performers for every pumping situation. Their standout picks include the reliable Spectra S1 Plus, hands-free portables like BabyBuddha, and wearable options from Elvie and Willow Go.

Source: [www.nytimes.com/wirecutte… \n## Food

Crispy Catfish Po’ Boys: Southern Comfort Food Done Right

Discover the art of crafting authentic Southern po’ boys with perfectly fried catfish fillets that are crispy on the outside and flaky within. This classic sandwich recipe brings the taste of New Orleans straight to your kitchen, making it the ideal meal for anyone craving traditional Southern comfort food.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/catfish-po-boys-recipe-11894135 \n## Business

Deutschland droht der Verlust des Ingenieur-Nimbus

Ein Interview mit Dirk Fox, Träger des Bundesverdienstkreuzes, beleuchtet den alarmierenden Ingenieurmangel in Deutschland. Mit 170.000 unbesetzten Stellen und sinkenden MINT-Studierendenzahlen warnt er vor gravierenden Folgen für den Wirtschaftsstandort.

Source: https://pm-wissen.com/politik/fehlen-deutschland-ingenieure/

Microsoft übertrifft Erwartungen – doch Aktienkurs stürzt ab

Microsoft hat die Erwartungen an Umsatz und Gewinn übertroffen, doch der schwächere Ausblick für das Cloud-Geschäft sorgt für Enttäuschung bei den Anlegern. Die Aktie fiel, obwohl die KI-Nachfrage das Cloud-Angebot übersteigt. Investoren sind besorgt über die zukünftige Entwicklung des Cloud-Bereichs trotz der starken Nachfrage nach Künstlicher Intelligenz.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Micr…

Meta Cashes In: More Users, Higher Ad Prices Drive Record Revenue

Meta Platforms has successfully raised advertising prices while simultaneously increasing ad sales volume, resulting in boosted revenue and operating profit. The company’s strong performance comes despite higher ad costs, with lower taxes further contributing to their impressive bottom line growth.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Meta…

SAP stellt drei Manager frei nach Vorwurf des Diebstahls von Geschäftsgeheimnissen

Der Konkurrent o9 hat SAP verklagt wegen angeblichen Diebstahls von Geschäftsgeheimnissen durch drei Manager, die von o9 zu SAP wechselten. SAP hat daraufhin die drei Führungskräfte vorläufig freigestellt, während die rechtlichen Untersuchungen laufen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Gesc…

Weltmarktführer SK Hynix verdoppelt Gewinn dank Speichermangel

SK Hynix verdient goldene Zeiten an der aktuellen Speicherkrise und verdoppelt seinen Betriebsgewinn. Der südkoreanische Weltmarktführer schiebt damit ein Rekordjahr ein, von dem primär die Anleger profitieren. Die Knappheit bei Speicherchips treibt die Preise und damit die Margen des Konzerns in die Höhe.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/So-v…

How This Newsletter Works

This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that:

  1. Aggregates content from 61 RSS feeds
  2. Filters articles from the last 24 hours
  3. Categorizes each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air)
  4. Detects similarities and combines related stories
  5. Selects the top 5 most interesting stories per category
  6. Summarizes each story with AI (GLM-4.7)

Tech Stack: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings.

Generated with ❤️ by n8n

Der kontroverse Kinoabend bei den Trumps hat interne Unruhen ausgelöst, woraufhin Cook ein Memo versandte, um die Wogen zu glätten und Mitarbeiter zu beruhigen. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Trum...](https://www.heise.de/news/Trump-Besuch-trotz-Gewalteskalation-Kritik-an-Apple-Chef-Tim-Cook-kocht-hoch-11157666.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Trump-Besuch-trotz-Gewalteskalation-Kritik-an-Apple-Chef-Tim-Cook-kocht-hoch-11157666.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) \n## Science ### Challenger's "Remove Before Flight" Tags Found 40 Years Later An aerospace enthusiast who purchased red "Remove Before Flight" tags on eBay in 2010 discovered they were originally attached to the space shuttle Challenger before its tragic 1986 disaster. Now, he's tracing their journey from the NASA launchpad to his doorstep, hoping to document their historical significance and potentially donate them to museums and educational institutions for preservation. --- Source: [https://arstechnica.com/space/2026/01/attached-to-tragedy-tracing-challenger-remove-before-flight-tags/](https://arstechnica.com/space/2026/01/attached-to-tragedy-tracing-challenger-remove-before-flight-tags/) ### Ancient DNA Rewrites the Dark History of Syphilis A groundbreaking discovery of a 5,500-year-old Treponema pallidum genome in Colombia reveals that syphilis-causing bacteria existed millennia before the infamous 1495 European pandemic. This archaeological finding completely overturns long-held beliefs about the disease's origins, proving the pathogen has plagued humans for thousands of years longer than historians ever imagined. --- Source: [https://arstechnica.com/science/2026/01/the-origin-story-of-syphilis-goes-back-far-longer-than-we-thought/](https://arstechnica.com/science/2026/01/the-origin-story-of-syphilis-goes-back-far-longer-than-we-thought/) ### Japan's H3 Rocket Finds a New Way to Fail, Losing Its 5-Ton Satellite in Flight Japan's H3 rocket suffered an unprecedented failure last month when a 5-ton navigation satellite detached mid-flight and the rocket simply continued. This novel malfunction has baffled engineers, as it represents a failure mode that apparently wasn't considered possible during design. --- Source: [https://arstechnica.com/science/2026/01/heres-the-story-of-how-japans-h3-rocket-lost-its-cargo-and-just-kept-going/](https://arstechnica.com/science/2026/01/heres-the-story-of-how-japans-h3-rocket-lost-its-cargo-and-just-kept-going/) ### Durchbruch: Neues Lasersystem erzeugt superscharfe Röntgenpulse Hamburger Forscher haben am European XFEL ein revolutionäres Lasersystem namens XFELO entwickelt, das deutlich präzisere Röntgenpulse erzeugt als bisher möglich. Diese Technologie ermöglicht genauere Einblicke in die Struktur von Materie und verspricht bahnbrechende wissenschaftliche Entdeckungen in Physik, Chemie und Biologie. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/XFEL...](https://www.heise.de/news/XFELO-Neues-Lasersystem-am-European-XFEL-erzeugt-superscharfes-Roentgenlicht-11157592.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/XFELO-Neues-Lasersystem-am-European-XFEL-erzeugt-superscharfes-Roentgenlicht-11157592.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) \n## Health ### South Carolina Breaks Measles Record as US Risks Elimination Status South Carolina's explosive measles outbreak has reached 789 cases, surpassing Texas's previous record of 762 and marking the largest outbreak since measles was declared eliminated in 2000. With cases nearly quadrupling from 218 to 789 in just one month, the US faces the very real threat of losing its measles elimination status as the virus continues spreading unchecked. --- Source: [https://arstechnica.com/health/2026/01/sc-measles-23-schools-hit-over-550-quarantined-as-outbreak-hits-record/](https://arstechnica.com/health/2026/01/sc-measles-23-schools-hit-over-550-quarantined-as-outbreak-hits-record/) ### The Underrated Cast Iron Skillet You Need in Your Kitchen Discover the specific cast iron skillet size that offers exceptional non-toxic, nonstick cooking properties. This essential kitchen tool combines health benefits with superior cooking performance, making it a worthwhile upgrade for home cooks seeking safer, more effective cookware. --- Source: [https://www.seriouseats.com/lodge-cast-iron-skillet-sale-11894172](https://www.seriouseats.com/lodge-cast-iron-skillet-sale-11894172) ### Weeknight-Ready White Bean and Kale Soup This 30-minute soup combines creamy white beans, fire-roasted tomatoes, and hearty kale for a nutritious, satisfying meal. Perfect for busy weeknights when you want something healthy and delicious without spending hours in the kitchen. --- Source: [https://www.seriouseats.com/30-minute-white-bean-and-kale-soup-recipe-11894062](https://www.seriouseats.com/30-minute-white-bean-and-kale-soup-recipe-11894062) ### Essential Tools That Make Breast Pumping Easier and More Comfortable Wirecutter's comprehensive guide draws on years of expert testing to recommend the best pumping bras, accessories, and tools for nursing parents. From hands-free pumping bras to breast care essentials, these products can transform the pumping experience from a chore into a more manageable routine. --- Source: [[www.nytimes.com/wirecutte...](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/best-pumping-bra/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/best-pumping-bra/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed)) ### The Best Breast Pumps for Every Nursing Style After testing 32 pumps, Wirecutter reveals the top performers for every pumping situation. Their standout picks include the reliable Spectra S1 Plus, hands-free portables like BabyBuddha, and wearable options from Elvie and Willow Go. --- Source: [[www.nytimes.com/wirecutte...](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/best-breast-pumps/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/best-breast-pumps/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed)) \n## Food ### Crispy Catfish Po' Boys: Southern Comfort Food Done Right Discover the art of crafting authentic Southern po' boys with perfectly fried catfish fillets that are crispy on the outside and flaky within. This classic sandwich recipe brings the taste of New Orleans straight to your kitchen, making it the ideal meal for anyone craving traditional Southern comfort food. --- Source: [https://www.seriouseats.com/catfish-po-boys-recipe-11894135](https://www.seriouseats.com/catfish-po-boys-recipe-11894135) \n## Business ### Deutschland droht der Verlust des Ingenieur-Nimbus Ein Interview mit Dirk Fox, Träger des Bundesverdienstkreuzes, beleuchtet den alarmierenden Ingenieurmangel in Deutschland. Mit 170.000 unbesetzten Stellen und sinkenden MINT-Studierendenzahlen warnt er vor gravierenden Folgen für den Wirtschaftsstandort. --- Source: [https://pm-wissen.com/politik/fehlen-deutschland-ingenieure/](https://pm-wissen.com/politik/fehlen-deutschland-ingenieure/) ### Microsoft übertrifft Erwartungen – doch Aktienkurs stürzt ab Microsoft hat die Erwartungen an Umsatz und Gewinn übertroffen, doch der schwächere Ausblick für das Cloud-Geschäft sorgt für Enttäuschung bei den Anlegern. Die Aktie fiel, obwohl die KI-Nachfrage das Cloud-Angebot übersteigt. Investoren sind besorgt über die zukünftige Entwicklung des Cloud-Bereichs trotz der starken Nachfrage nach Künstlicher Intelligenz. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Micr...](https://www.heise.de/news/Microsoft-uebertrifft-Erwartungen-aber-Boerse-bestraft-schwaecheren-Cloud-Ausblick-11157857.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Microsoft-uebertrifft-Erwartungen-aber-Boerse-bestraft-schwaecheren-Cloud-Ausblick-11157857.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Meta Cashes In: More Users, Higher Ad Prices Drive Record Revenue Meta Platforms has successfully raised advertising prices while simultaneously increasing ad sales volume, resulting in boosted revenue and operating profit. The company's strong performance comes despite higher ad costs, with lower taxes further contributing to their impressive bottom line growth. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Meta...](https://www.heise.de/news/Meta-casht-ab-Mehr-User-schauen-mehr-Werbung-zu-hoeheren-Preisen-11157837.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Meta-casht-ab-Mehr-User-schauen-mehr-Werbung-zu-hoeheren-Preisen-11157837.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### SAP stellt drei Manager frei nach Vorwurf des Diebstahls von Geschäftsgeheimnissen Der Konkurrent o9 hat SAP verklagt wegen angeblichen Diebstahls von Geschäftsgeheimnissen durch drei Manager, die von o9 zu SAP wechselten. SAP hat daraufhin die drei Führungskräfte vorläufig freigestellt, während die rechtlichen Untersuchungen laufen. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Gesc...](https://www.heise.de/news/Geschaeftgeheimnisse-von-o9-gestohlen-SAP-stellt-drei-Fuehrungskraefte-frei-11157416.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Geschaeftgeheimnisse-von-o9-gestohlen-SAP-stellt-drei-Fuehrungskraefte-frei-11157416.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Weltmarktführer SK Hynix verdoppelt Gewinn dank Speichermangel SK Hynix verdient goldene Zeiten an der aktuellen Speicherkrise und verdoppelt seinen Betriebsgewinn. Der südkoreanische Weltmarktführer schiebt damit ein Rekordjahr ein, von dem primär die Anleger profitieren. Die Knappheit bei Speicherchips treibt die Preise und damit die Margen des Konzerns in die Höhe. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/So-v...](https://www.heise.de/news/So-viel-verdient-der-Weltmarktfuehrer-an-der-Speicherkrise-11157267.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/So-viel-verdient-der-Weltmarktfuehrer-an-der-Speicherkrise-11157267.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) --- #### How This Newsletter Works This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that: 1. **Aggregates** content from 61 RSS feeds 2. **Filters** articles from the last 24 hours 3. **Categorizes** each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air) 4. **Detects similarities** and combines related stories 5. **Selects** the top 5 most interesting stories per category 6. **Summarizes** each story with AI (GLM-4.7) **Tech Stack**: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings. --- **Generated with ❤️ by n8n**

items.title: The Daily News — 2026-01-28 Edition
items.content_html:
A curated selection of today’s most interesting stories from 61 RSS sources.

Health

Jenny Lawson on Handling Constant Stress and Finding Hope

Popular blogger Jenny Lawson reflects on the overwhelming stress we face from witnessing global brutality and explains why our fury often has nowhere to go. Her thoughtful post reminds us we’re not meant to handle this level of constant trauma alone, making it an essential read for anyone struggling with current events. If you’re in San Antonio, you can also visit her wonderful Nowhere Bookshop.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/jenny-lawson-blogging-about-how.html

Gleich und Gleich: Psychische Störungen suchen sich ähnliche Partner

Umfangreiche Daten aus drei Ländern zeigen, dass Menschen mit bestimmten psychischen Störungen häufig Partner mit ähnlichen Diagnosen heiraten. Die Forschungsergebnisse deuten auf eine bemerkenswerte Assortativität bei psychischen Erkrankungen hin.

Source: https://www.spektrum.de/news/psychodiagnosen-in-der-ehe-wie-der-eine-so-der-andere/2306951

The Best Fitness Trackers for Every Goal and Budget

From budget bands to elite performance monitors, 2026 offers more variety than ever in fitness wearables. Whether you’re a casual user seeking an Apple Watch or Garmin Venu Sq 2, or a serious athlete eyeing the Garmin Fenix 8 or Whoop MG, there’s a device perfectly suited to your fitness journey and wallet.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/22985108/best-fitness-tracker

Kampf um Aufgabenverteilung: Telemedizin und Primärarztsystem im Konflikt

Das Primärarztsystem soll durch telemedizinische Tools wie 116117 und Patientenakte revolutioniert werden, doch entbrennt nun ein Streit über die Aufgabenverteilung zwischen Ärzten. Diese digitale Transformation ist entscheidend für die Zukunft der Gesundheitsversorgung, da sie bestimmt, wie Patienten effizient gesteuert und medizinische Ressourcen optimal genutzt werden können.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/1161…

Apple Watch Hypertension Alerts Now Available in Seven New Countries

Apple expands its life-saving hypertension detection feature to Australia, Malaysia, Colombia, Indonesia, South Korea, Brazil, and Turkey. The feature uses Apple Watch sensors to identify potential high blood pressure over 30 days, alerting users to seek medical guidance for this often symptomless condition affecting 1.4 billion people worldwide.

Source: https://www.macrumors.com/2026/01/27/hypertension-alerts-expansion-six-countries/ \n## Entertainment

The Heartbreak of Losing a Childhood Friend to Gun Violence

Kristen Radtke shares a devastating personal reflection on learning her childhood friend Alex Pretti was gunned down. Her poignant words capture the universal tragedy of violence, reminding us that every victim is someone’s friend, son, or daughter, and the world is smaller and more connected than we realize.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/kristen-radtke-writes-at-the.html

The Yard’s Stunning VFX Breakdown for Predator: Badlands

The Yard reveals their impressive visual effects work on Predator: Badlands, including a detailed breakdown of the film’s five-minute opening sequence on Yautja Prime. VFX enthusiasts can see how the team brought the Predator’s homeworld to life through this behind-the-scenes look at their craft.

Source: https://beforesandafters.com/2026/01/28/check-out-the-yards-vfx-breakdown-for-predator-badlands/

Oscar Nominations Trigger Massive Piracy Surge for ‘Sinners’

Following a record-breaking 16 Oscar nominations, Ryan Coogler’s ‘Sinners’ saw piracy downloads triple as legal viewing demand also spiked. The data confirms that award recognition directly impacts both authorized and unauthorized viewing, with other nominees like ‘Bugonia’ experiencing smaller but significant boosts.

Source: https://torrentfreak.com/the-oscar-surge-sinners-piracy-triples-following-record-breaking-16-nominations/

Darkly Comic Take on Trying Too Hard to Impress

Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal delivers another hilariously dark comic about someone who purchased multiple nail polishes despite having no nails at all. The comic perfectly captures that painful moment of over-preparation and the absurdity of trying to impress someone when you physically can’t deliver.

Source: https://www.smbc-comics.com/comic/friend

FREE Digital Magazine: Inside Avatar: The Way of Water’s Visual Effects

befores & afters is offering a complimentary digital magazine packed with exclusive behind-the-scenes content from Avatar: The Way of Water. The issue features in-depth interviews with Wētā FX covering water simulation, creature creation, and revolutionary VFX techniques used in James Cameron’s blockbuster.

Source: https://beforesandafters.com/2026/01/28/download-the-avatar-the-way-of-water-issue-of-befores-afters-for-free/ \n## Technology

NetNewsWire 7 Arrives with Sleek Liquid Glass Design

The popular RSS reader NetNewsWire 7 has launched with a refined Liquid Glass UI that perfectly complements macOS 26. The update introduces a cleaner look with hidden menu icons, delivering a modern interface without going overboard on the new design language.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/netnewswire-is-out-with-a.html

FediForum Introduces Position Paper Format for Open Social Web

FediForum announces an innovative un-workshop format called “Growing the Open Social Web” where participants submit position papers in advance. The lightly curated papers are distributed beforehand to help attendees prepare, creating a more thoughtful and informed discussion environment.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/growing-the-open-social-web.html

Apple Watch Finally Gets AirTag Precision Finding

Apple’s watchOS 26.2.1 update brings Precision Finding for AirTag 2 to Apple Watch Series 9 and Ultra 2 models, a feature previously limited to iPhone. This means you can now locate lost items with ultra-wideband precision directly from your wrist, though it’s unclear whether original AirTag owners will benefit from this enhancement.

Source: https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/27/watchos-26-2-1/

Swift Proposal: Faster Iteration with BorrowingSequence

Ben Cohen has proposed a new BorrowingSequence protocol for Swift that enables borrowing iteration instead of consuming iteration, significantly reducing ARC overhead when traversing collections. The approach uses spans of elements rather than individual next() calls, potentially offering better performance for Array and other common collection types while providing better support for noncopyable types.

Source: https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/27/swift-pitch-borrowing-sequence/

curl Kills Bug Bounty Program Amid AI Report Flood

The cURL project is terminating its bug bounty program due to overwhelming AI-generated reports and poor quality submissions flooding maintainers. While AI has contributed hundreds of legitimate bug discoveries, the signal-to-noise ratio has become unsustainable for the small team to manage effectively.

Source: https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/27/curl-removes-bug-bounties/ \n## Business

Twin Cities Rent Relief Fund Supports Families Facing Income Loss

A GoFundMe campaign is providing critical rent relief for Minneapolis families who have lost income due to workplace closures or personal circumstances. Many residents in South Minneapolis haven’t been able to work for over a month, creating urgent financial need for households struggling to make ends meet.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/bethany-blogging-about-a-gofundme.html

Amazon Shuts Down All Go and Fresh Physical Stores

Amazon is closing all its Go and Fresh physical locations, converting some to Whole Foods Markets while expanding online grocery delivery. The retail giant plans to open over 100 new Whole Foods stores and boost same-day delivery service to more cities this year.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/news/868800/amazon-go-and-fresh-stores-closed

Does Tim Cook Even Care About Apple’s Image Anymore?

Macworld’s Macalope questions Apple CEO Tim Cook’s judgment amid his recent attendance at a White House event with figures facing serious allegations, while Apple’s App Store continues hosting apps like X and Grok that generate non-consensual sexual content. The piece highlights a stark contrast between Apple’s stated values and actual practices, suggesting Cook may soon transition to chairman as the company faces mounting criticism for its contradictory positions.

Source: https://www.macworld.com/article/3043477/apple-is-full-of-it.html

Erster Kinder-Prozess gegen Facebook und YouTube beginnt in LA

Tausende Klagen gegen soziale Netzwerke wegen Schädigung von Minderjährigen sind anhängig. Nun läuft in Los Angeles der erste große Prozess gegen Facebook und YouTube an, während Snap und TikTok bereits Vergleichszahlungen geleistet haben. Die Tech-Giganten hoffen auf ein Urteil durch Geschworene.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/So-s…

Amazon schließt alle Fresh- und Go-Läden - Radikale Neuausrichtung im Lebensmittelgeschäft

Amazon zieht sich überraschend aus dem stationären Lebensmittelhandel mit Fresh und Go zurück und konzentriert sich künftig nur noch auf Online-Verkäufe und Whole Foods. Diese strategische Neuausrichtung zeigt, wie schwierig der Betrieb physischer Supermärkte für den E-Commerce-Riesen war und könnte die Zukunft des Lebensmittelhandels maßgeblich verändern.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Amaz… \n## Politics

Minnesota Communities Prove MAGA Ideology Wrong Through Unity

Adam Serwer reports from Minnesota, where ordinary residents have demonstrated that community cohesion thrives because of diversity, not despite it. By standing together against ICE and Border Patrol operations, Minnesotans have disproven core MAGA beliefs about American division and shown that virtue remains common in our communities.

Source: [www.theatlantic.com/ideas/202…

Crypto Industry’s Market Structure Bill Faces Imminent Collapse in Congress

The crypto industry is running out of time to pass a bipartisan market structure bill as Congress prepares to shift into campaign mode for midterm elections. DC insiders fear the favorable legislation the industry has been pushing for will fail to materialize before the legislative window closes.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/column/868941/clarity-act-congress-shutdown

Digitaler „Omnibus": EU-Parlament bremst Kommissionspläne für Daten und KI

Die EU-Kommission möchte verschiedene Datengesetze und KI-Regelungen unter einem Dach zusammenfassen. Diese Pläne stoßen im Europaparlament jedoch auf erheblichen Widerstand – die Abgeordneten befürchten eine unzureichende Regulierung im digitalen Bereich.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Digi…

Sicherheitsvorrang: Schwarz-Rot will Kritis-Bestimmungen verschärfen

CDU/CSU und SPD fordern, den Sabotageschutz bei kritischer Infrastruktur über Informationsrechte zu stellen. Ein neuer Antrag sieht schnellere Warnwege und erweiterte Kontrollen vor, um Kritis-Anlagen besser vor Angriffen zu schützen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Sich…

Tim Cook Calls for Deescalation After Minneapolis ICE Shootings

Apple CEO Tim Cook expressed heartbreak over recent ICE shootings in Minneapolis that claimed two lives, including a VA nurse and a poet. In an internal memo, Cook called for deescalation and dignity for all, while acknowledging he discussed his views with President Trump despite criticism over his White House attendance.

Source: https://www.macrumors.com/2026/01/27/tim-cook-responds-after-minneapolis-shootings/ \n## Science

Deutschlands riskante Datenpolitik: Millionen für digitale Souveränität, doch Forschungsdaten sind gefährdet

Die deutsche Regierung investiert Millionen in digitale Souveränität, doch hinter den Kulissen tobt ein gefährlicher Streit um die Sicherung wichtiger medizinischer Forschungsdaten. Der Konflikt gefährdet nicht nur den wissenschaftlichen Fortschritt, sondern wirft auch grundlegende Fragen zur Unabhängigkeit von Deutschlands Gesundheitsforschung auf.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Die-…

Grönlands kulturelle Vielfalt: Zählen bis 12 auf Grönländisch

Entdecken Sie die faszinierende Zahlenwelt Grönlands – jenseits von Eis und Schnee bietet die Insel eine reiche Kultur mit eigenem Zahlensystem. Ein Blick auf die grönländische Sprache zeigt, dass die Insel weit mehr ist als nur ein ‘großes Stück Eis’.

Source: [www.heise.de/hintergru…

Grönlands seltene Erden: Warum Trump die Insel will

US-Präsident Trump erneuerte seinen Anspruch auf Grönland – dahinter steckt das strategische Interesse an den dortigen seltenen Erden. China dominiert diesen wichtigen Markt, und die USA suchen nach Alternativen. Unser Ranking zeigt, wie Grönland weltweit abschneidet und welche Länder die größten Reserven besitzen.

Source: https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/27/mit-groenland-laender-meisten-seltene-erden/

Künstliche Organe auf Chips: Revolution im Kampf gegen Tierversuche

Forscher entwickeln Organe auf Computerchips und digitale Zwillinge als innovative Alternativen zu Tierversuchen. Die Technologie könnte die Medikamentenentwicklung revolutionieren, da 95 Prozent der an Tieren erfolgreichen Behandlungen nie auf den Markt kommen. Großbritannien und andere Länder planen bereits das schrittweise Auslaufen von Tierversuchen bis 2030.

Source: https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/27/alternativen-tierversuche-organe-auf-chips/

The Science Behind Why You Click With Some People Instantly

Journalist Kate Murphy reveals that ‘clicking’ with others isn’t just a vibe—it’s a measurable physiological phenomenon called interpersonal synchrony. This podcast explores the science behind social chemistry, explaining why some connections feel magical and how you can become more ‘clickable’ in relationships and teamwork.

Source: https://www.artofmanliness.com/people/social-skills/podcast-1102-the-click-effect-inside-the-science-and-magic-of-social-chemistry/ \n## Sports

Avoid Super Bowl Spoilers With This $20 Streaming Solution

Streaming the Super Bowl could ruin your game day experience with significant lag delays that let social media spoilers beat the broadcast. An affordable $20 antenna can eliminate the frustration and ensure you see every touchdown in real-time, faster than any streaming service.

Source: [www.nytimes.com/wirecutte…

How This Newsletter Works

This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that:

  1. Aggregates content from 61 RSS feeds
  2. Filters articles from the last 24 hours
  3. Categorizes each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air)
  4. Detects similarities and combines related stories
  5. Selects the top 5 most interesting stories per category
  6. Summarizes each story with AI (GLM-4.7)

Tech Stack: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings.

Her thoughtful post reminds us we're not meant to handle this level of constant trauma alone, making it an essential read for anyone struggling with current events. If you're in San Antonio, you can also visit her wonderful Nowhere Bookshop. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/jenny-lawson-blogging-about-how.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/jenny-lawson-blogging-about-how.html) ### Gleich und Gleich: Psychische Störungen suchen sich ähnliche Partner Umfangreiche Daten aus drei Ländern zeigen, dass Menschen mit bestimmten psychischen Störungen häufig Partner mit ähnlichen Diagnosen heiraten. Die Forschungsergebnisse deuten auf eine bemerkenswerte Assortativität bei psychischen Erkrankungen hin. --- Source: [https://www.spektrum.de/news/psychodiagnosen-in-der-ehe-wie-der-eine-so-der-andere/2306951](https://www.spektrum.de/news/psychodiagnosen-in-der-ehe-wie-der-eine-so-der-andere/2306951) ### The Best Fitness Trackers for Every Goal and Budget From budget bands to elite performance monitors, 2026 offers more variety than ever in fitness wearables. Whether you're a casual user seeking an Apple Watch or Garmin Venu Sq 2, or a serious athlete eyeing the Garmin Fenix 8 or Whoop MG, there's a device perfectly suited to your fitness journey and wallet. --- Source: [https://www.theverge.com/22985108/best-fitness-tracker](https://www.theverge.com/22985108/best-fitness-tracker) ### Kampf um Aufgabenverteilung: Telemedizin und Primärarztsystem im Konflikt Das Primärarztsystem soll durch telemedizinische Tools wie 116117 und Patientenakte revolutioniert werden, doch entbrennt nun ein Streit über die Aufgabenverteilung zwischen Ärzten. Diese digitale Transformation ist entscheidend für die Zukunft der Gesundheitsversorgung, da sie bestimmt, wie Patienten effizient gesteuert und medizinische Ressourcen optimal genutzt werden können. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/1161...](https://www.heise.de/news/116117-Termin-Backend-Patientenakte-Co-Streit-um-Aufgabenverteilung-beginnt-11155725.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/116117-Termin-Backend-Patientenakte-Co-Streit-um-Aufgabenverteilung-beginnt-11155725.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Apple Watch Hypertension Alerts Now Available in Seven New Countries Apple expands its life-saving hypertension detection feature to Australia, Malaysia, Colombia, Indonesia, South Korea, Brazil, and Turkey. The feature uses Apple Watch sensors to identify potential high blood pressure over 30 days, alerting users to seek medical guidance for this often symptomless condition affecting 1.4 billion people worldwide. --- Source: [https://www.macrumors.com/2026/01/27/hypertension-alerts-expansion-six-countries/](https://www.macrumors.com/2026/01/27/hypertension-alerts-expansion-six-countries/) \n## Entertainment ### The Heartbreak of Losing a Childhood Friend to Gun Violence Kristen Radtke shares a devastating personal reflection on learning her childhood friend Alex Pretti was gunned down. Her poignant words capture the universal tragedy of violence, reminding us that every victim is someone's friend, son, or daughter, and the world is smaller and more connected than we realize. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/kristen-radtke-writes-at-the.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/kristen-radtke-writes-at-the.html) ### The Yard's Stunning VFX Breakdown for Predator: Badlands The Yard reveals their impressive visual effects work on Predator: Badlands, including a detailed breakdown of the film's five-minute opening sequence on Yautja Prime. VFX enthusiasts can see how the team brought the Predator's homeworld to life through this behind-the-scenes look at their craft. --- Source: [https://beforesandafters.com/2026/01/28/check-out-the-yards-vfx-breakdown-for-predator-badlands/](https://beforesandafters.com/2026/01/28/check-out-the-yards-vfx-breakdown-for-predator-badlands/) ### Oscar Nominations Trigger Massive Piracy Surge for 'Sinners' Following a record-breaking 16 Oscar nominations, Ryan Coogler's 'Sinners' saw piracy downloads triple as legal viewing demand also spiked. The data confirms that award recognition directly impacts both authorized and unauthorized viewing, with other nominees like 'Bugonia' experiencing smaller but significant boosts. --- Source: [https://torrentfreak.com/the-oscar-surge-sinners-piracy-triples-following-record-breaking-16-nominations/](https://torrentfreak.com/the-oscar-surge-sinners-piracy-triples-following-record-breaking-16-nominations/) ### Darkly Comic Take on Trying Too Hard to Impress Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal delivers another hilariously dark comic about someone who purchased multiple nail polishes despite having no nails at all. The comic perfectly captures that painful moment of over-preparation and the absurdity of trying to impress someone when you physically can't deliver. --- Source: [https://www.smbc-comics.com/comic/friend](https://www.smbc-comics.com/comic/friend) ### FREE Digital Magazine: Inside Avatar: The Way of Water's Visual Effects befores & afters is offering a complimentary digital magazine packed with exclusive behind-the-scenes content from Avatar: The Way of Water. The issue features in-depth interviews with Wētā FX covering water simulation, creature creation, and revolutionary VFX techniques used in James Cameron's blockbuster. --- Source: [https://beforesandafters.com/2026/01/28/download-the-avatar-the-way-of-water-issue-of-befores-afters-for-free/](https://beforesandafters.com/2026/01/28/download-the-avatar-the-way-of-water-issue-of-befores-afters-for-free/) \n## Technology ### NetNewsWire 7 Arrives with Sleek Liquid Glass Design The popular RSS reader NetNewsWire 7 has launched with a refined Liquid Glass UI that perfectly complements macOS 26. The update introduces a cleaner look with hidden menu icons, delivering a modern interface without going overboard on the new design language. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/netnewswire-is-out-with-a.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/netnewswire-is-out-with-a.html) ### FediForum Introduces Position Paper Format for Open Social Web FediForum announces an innovative un-workshop format called "Growing the Open Social Web" where participants submit position papers in advance. The lightly curated papers are distributed beforehand to help attendees prepare, creating a more thoughtful and informed discussion environment. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/growing-the-open-social-web.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/growing-the-open-social-web.html) ### Apple Watch Finally Gets AirTag Precision Finding Apple's watchOS 26.2.1 update brings Precision Finding for AirTag 2 to Apple Watch Series 9 and Ultra 2 models, a feature previously limited to iPhone. This means you can now locate lost items with ultra-wideband precision directly from your wrist, though it's unclear whether original AirTag owners will benefit from this enhancement. --- Source: [https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/27/watchos-26-2-1/](https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/27/watchos-26-2-1/) ### Swift Proposal: Faster Iteration with BorrowingSequence Ben Cohen has proposed a new BorrowingSequence protocol for Swift that enables borrowing iteration instead of consuming iteration, significantly reducing ARC overhead when traversing collections. The approach uses spans of elements rather than individual next() calls, potentially offering better performance for Array and other common collection types while providing better support for noncopyable types. --- Source: [https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/27/swift-pitch-borrowing-sequence/](https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/27/swift-pitch-borrowing-sequence/) ### curl Kills Bug Bounty Program Amid AI Report Flood The cURL project is terminating its bug bounty program due to overwhelming AI-generated reports and poor quality submissions flooding maintainers. While AI has contributed hundreds of legitimate bug discoveries, the signal-to-noise ratio has become unsustainable for the small team to manage effectively. --- Source: [https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/27/curl-removes-bug-bounties/](https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/27/curl-removes-bug-bounties/) \n## Business ### Twin Cities Rent Relief Fund Supports Families Facing Income Loss A GoFundMe campaign is providing critical rent relief for Minneapolis families who have lost income due to workplace closures or personal circumstances. Many residents in South Minneapolis haven't been able to work for over a month, creating urgent financial need for households struggling to make ends meet. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/bethany-blogging-about-a-gofundme.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/27/bethany-blogging-about-a-gofundme.html) ### Amazon Shuts Down All Go and Fresh Physical Stores Amazon is closing all its Go and Fresh physical locations, converting some to Whole Foods Markets while expanding online grocery delivery. The retail giant plans to open over 100 new Whole Foods stores and boost same-day delivery service to more cities this year. --- Source: [https://www.theverge.com/news/868800/amazon-go-and-fresh-stores-closed](https://www.theverge.com/news/868800/amazon-go-and-fresh-stores-closed) ### Does Tim Cook Even Care About Apple's Image Anymore? Macworld's Macalope questions Apple CEO Tim Cook's judgment amid his recent attendance at a White House event with figures facing serious allegations, while Apple's App Store continues hosting apps like X and Grok that generate non-consensual sexual content. The piece highlights a stark contrast between Apple's stated values and actual practices, suggesting Cook may soon transition to chairman as the company faces mounting criticism for its contradictory positions. --- Source: [https://www.macworld.com/article/3043477/apple-is-full-of-it.html](https://www.macworld.com/article/3043477/apple-is-full-of-it.html) ### Erster Kinder-Prozess gegen Facebook und YouTube beginnt in LA Tausende Klagen gegen soziale Netzwerke wegen Schädigung von Minderjährigen sind anhängig. Nun läuft in Los Angeles der erste große Prozess gegen Facebook und YouTube an, während Snap und TikTok bereits Vergleichszahlungen geleistet haben. Die Tech-Giganten hoffen auf ein Urteil durch Geschworene. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/So-s...](https://www.heise.de/news/So-schaedlich-Erster-Kinder-Prozess-gegen-Facebook-und-YouTube-laeuft-in-LA-an-11156313.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/So-schaedlich-Erster-Kinder-Prozess-gegen-Facebook-und-YouTube-laeuft-in-LA-an-11156313.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Amazon schließt alle Fresh- und Go-Läden - Radikale Neuausrichtung im Lebensmittelgeschäft Amazon zieht sich überraschend aus dem stationären Lebensmittelhandel mit Fresh und Go zurück und konzentriert sich künftig nur noch auf Online-Verkäufe und Whole Foods. Diese strategische Neuausrichtung zeigt, wie schwierig der Betrieb physischer Supermärkte für den E-Commerce-Riesen war und könnte die Zukunft des Lebensmittelhandels maßgeblich verändern. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Amaz...](https://www.heise.de/news/Amazon-strukturiert-Lebensmittelgeschaeft-um-schliesst-alle-Fresh-und-Go-Laeden-11156325.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Amazon-strukturiert-Lebensmittelgeschaeft-um-schliesst-alle-Fresh-und-Go-Laeden-11156325.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) \n## Politics ### Minnesota Communities Prove MAGA Ideology Wrong Through Unity Adam Serwer reports from Minnesota, where ordinary residents have demonstrated that community cohesion thrives because of diversity, not despite it. By standing together against ICE and Border Patrol operations, Minnesotans have disproven core MAGA beliefs about American division and shown that virtue remains common in our communities. --- Source: [[www.theatlantic.com/ideas/202...](https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/2026/01/the-neighbors-defending-minnesota-from-ice/685769/?gift=Je3D9AQS-C17lUTOnl2W8L893jn-xkg4gA0ahaD_Ltw](https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/2026/01/the-neighbors-defending-minnesota-from-ice/685769/?gift=Je3D9AQS-C17lUTOnl2W8L893jn-xkg4gA0ahaD_Ltw)) ### Crypto Industry's Market Structure Bill Faces Imminent Collapse in Congress The crypto industry is running out of time to pass a bipartisan market structure bill as Congress prepares to shift into campaign mode for midterm elections. DC insiders fear the favorable legislation the industry has been pushing for will fail to materialize before the legislative window closes. --- Source: [https://www.theverge.com/column/868941/clarity-act-congress-shutdown](https://www.theverge.com/column/868941/clarity-act-congress-shutdown) ### Digitaler „Omnibus": EU-Parlament bremst Kommissionspläne für Daten und KI Die EU-Kommission möchte verschiedene Datengesetze und KI-Regelungen unter einem Dach zusammenfassen. Diese Pläne stoßen im Europaparlament jedoch auf erheblichen Widerstand – die Abgeordneten befürchten eine unzureichende Regulierung im digitalen Bereich. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Digi...](https://www.heise.de/news/Digitaler-Omnibus-Europa-Parlament-bremst-Kommissionsplaene-fuer-Daten-und-KI-11156161.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Digitaler-Omnibus-Europa-Parlament-bremst-Kommissionsplaene-fuer-Daten-und-KI-11156161.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Sicherheitsvorrang: Schwarz-Rot will Kritis-Bestimmungen verschärfen CDU/CSU und SPD fordern, den Sabotageschutz bei kritischer Infrastruktur über Informationsrechte zu stellen. Ein neuer Antrag sieht schnellere Warnwege und erweiterte Kontrollen vor, um Kritis-Anlagen besser vor Angriffen zu schützen. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Sich...](https://www.heise.de/news/Sicherheit-zuerst-Schwarz-Rot-will-Transparenzpflichten-bei-Kritis-einschraenken-11156002.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Sicherheit-zuerst-Schwarz-Rot-will-Transparenzpflichten-bei-Kritis-einschraenken-11156002.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Tim Cook Calls for Deescalation After Minneapolis ICE Shootings Apple CEO Tim Cook expressed heartbreak over recent ICE shootings in Minneapolis that claimed two lives, including a VA nurse and a poet. In an internal memo, Cook called for deescalation and dignity for all, while acknowledging he discussed his views with President Trump despite criticism over his White House attendance. --- Source: [https://www.macrumors.com/2026/01/27/tim-cook-responds-after-minneapolis-shootings/](https://www.macrumors.com/2026/01/27/tim-cook-responds-after-minneapolis-shootings/) \n## Science ### Deutschlands riskante Datenpolitik: Millionen für digitale Souveränität, doch Forschungsdaten sind gefährdet Die deutsche Regierung investiert Millionen in digitale Souveränität, doch hinter den Kulissen tobt ein gefährlicher Streit um die Sicherung wichtiger medizinischer Forschungsdaten. Der Konflikt gefährdet nicht nur den wissenschaftlichen Fortschritt, sondern wirft auch grundlegende Fragen zur Unabhängigkeit von Deutschlands Gesundheitsforschung auf. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Die-...](https://www.heise.de/news/Die-PubMed-Falle-Deutschlands-gefaehrlicher-Datenpoker-in-der-Medizin-11155637.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Die-PubMed-Falle-Deutschlands-gefaehrlicher-Datenpoker-in-der-Medizin-11155637.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Grönlands kulturelle Vielfalt: Zählen bis 12 auf Grönländisch Entdecken Sie die faszinierende Zahlenwelt Grönlands – jenseits von Eis und Schnee bietet die Insel eine reiche Kultur mit eigenem Zahlensystem. Ein Blick auf die grönländische Sprache zeigt, dass die Insel weit mehr ist als nur ein 'großes Stück Eis'. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/hintergru...](https://www.heise.de/hintergrund/Zahlen-bitte-Bis-12-zaehlen-auf-Groenlaendisch-11155334.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/hintergrund/Zahlen-bitte-Bis-12-zaehlen-auf-Groenlaendisch-11155334.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Grönlands seltene Erden: Warum Trump die Insel will US-Präsident Trump erneuerte seinen Anspruch auf Grönland – dahinter steckt das strategische Interesse an den dortigen seltenen Erden. China dominiert diesen wichtigen Markt, und die USA suchen nach Alternativen. Unser Ranking zeigt, wie Grönland weltweit abschneidet und welche Länder die größten Reserven besitzen. --- Source: [https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/27/mit-groenland-laender-meisten-seltene-erden/](https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/27/mit-groenland-laender-meisten-seltene-erden/) ### Künstliche Organe auf Chips: Revolution im Kampf gegen Tierversuche Forscher entwickeln Organe auf Computerchips und digitale Zwillinge als innovative Alternativen zu Tierversuchen. Die Technologie könnte die Medikamentenentwicklung revolutionieren, da 95 Prozent der an Tieren erfolgreichen Behandlungen nie auf den Markt kommen. Großbritannien und andere Länder planen bereits das schrittweise Auslaufen von Tierversuchen bis 2030. --- Source: [https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/27/alternativen-tierversuche-organe-auf-chips/](https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/27/alternativen-tierversuche-organe-auf-chips/) ### The Science Behind Why You Click With Some People Instantly Journalist Kate Murphy reveals that 'clicking' with others isn't just a vibe—it's a measurable physiological phenomenon called interpersonal synchrony. This podcast explores the science behind social chemistry, explaining why some connections feel magical and how you can become more 'clickable' in relationships and teamwork. --- Source: [https://www.artofmanliness.com/people/social-skills/podcast-1102-the-click-effect-inside-the-science-and-magic-of-social-chemistry/](https://www.artofmanliness.com/people/social-skills/podcast-1102-the-click-effect-inside-the-science-and-magic-of-social-chemistry/) \n## Sports ### Avoid Super Bowl Spoilers With This $20 Streaming Solution Streaming the Super Bowl could ruin your game day experience with significant lag delays that let social media spoilers beat the broadcast. An affordable $20 antenna can eliminate the frustration and ensure you see every touchdown in real-time, faster than any streaming service. --- Source: [[www.nytimes.com/wirecutte...](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/how-to-watch-the-super-bowl-without-spoilers/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/how-to-watch-the-super-bowl-without-spoilers/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed)) --- #### How This Newsletter Works This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that: 1. **Aggregates** content from 61 RSS feeds 2. **Filters** articles from the last 24 hours 3. **Categorizes** each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air) 4. **Detects similarities** and combines related stories 5. **Selects** the top 5 most interesting stories per category 6. **Summarizes** each story with AI (GLM-4.7) **Tech Stack**: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings. --- **Generated with ❤️ by n8n**

items.content_html: I’m struggling right now. I’m being pulled in too many directions at once. Unfortunately, my coping mechanism is to dive head deep into LLM coding and ignore everything else. I need to find a way out of that tunnel vision mentality.
