items.title: The Daily News — 2026-01-27 Edition
items.content_html:
A curated selection of today’s most interesting stories from 61 RSS sources.

Technology

Open APIs Matter More Than Open Source for User Freedom

The debate between open source and open platforms reveals a nuanced truth: while open source empowers developers, open APIs give power to everyone. The author challenges the fediverse’s binary thinking, highlighting successful bootstrapped apps that charge fair prices without making users the product. Open platforms with portable data and open APIs may ultimately matter more than open source code for true user ownership.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/26/open-source-vs-open-platforms.html

Developer Swears Off APIs: Taking a Stand Against Platform Dependency

Dave Rupert is abandoning API-dependent projects after hitting frustrating limitations, arguing that building on closed platforms wastes valuable development time. He’s adopting a strict policy to only work with permission-less, ad-free platforms and open protocols, a philosophy that could help other developers avoid similar pitfalls.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/26/dave-rupert-is-swearing-off.html

Apple’s Next-Gen AirTag Boasts Expanded Range and Louder Audio

Apple has launched the second-generation AirTag featuring the same Ultra Wideband chip as the iPhone 17, enabling Precision Finding from 50% farther away. The upgraded tracker is 50% louder with enhanced Bluetooth range, delivering significant improvements while maintaining the same $29 price point.

Source: https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/26/airtag-2026/

UK Lawmakers Vote to Extend Age Verification to VPNs

The UK House of Lords has voted to extend age verification mandates to VPNs and most interactive online platforms under the Children’s Wellbeing and Schools Bill. This expansion of the controversial Online Safety Act raises serious privacy concerns about digital autonomy and could fundamentally change how online services collect and verify user data.

Source: https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/26/uk-age-verification-for-vpns/

Revolutionary 3D AI Model Rodin Transforms Game Asset Creation

Hyper3D’s breakthrough Rodin model uses native 3D generation to create high-quality assets directly from images, winning SIGGRAPH 2024’s Best Paper Honorable Mention. The free-to-generate platform enables game developers, designers, and 3D printing enthusiasts to rapidly prototype assets, with 2026 plans focused on advanced AI editing tools for artists.

Source: https://beforesandafters.com/2026/01/27/everything-you-need-to-know-about-hyper3d-ai-and-its-rodin-3d-generative-ai-model/ \n## Entertainment

Why the Perfect RPG Prep Framework Doesn’t Exist

Having any RPG prep framework beats chasing perfection. Sly Flourish explains how to build a personalized, flexible prep system using his eight-step model from ‘Return of the Lazy Dungeon Master’ and continuously refine it through the Learn-Prep-Run-Evaluate cycle.

Source: [slyflourish.com/your_own_…

Hitchcock’s Silent Film Reimagined as Vertical Phone Drama

UK streaming platform Tattle TV has transformed Alfred Hitchcock’s 1927 silent film ‘The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog’ into a vertical video microdrama for mobile viewing. This creative adaptation makes classic cinema accessible to modern audiences, proving that bite-sized entertainment can include cinematic masterpieces alongside contemporary reality series and dramas.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/entertainment/867844/tattle-tv-the-lodger-hitchcock

EU Forced to Act: 1.3 Million Signatures Demand Video Game Preservation

A citizen initiative called “Stop Destroying Videogames” has collected over 1.2 million verified signatures, compelling the EU Commission to address video game preservation concerns. This massive public response highlights growing anxiety about losing gaming history and could lead to new EU policies protecting digital cultural heritage.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Buer…

Terraria überrascht mit riesigem Update 15 Jahre nach Release

Das kultige Sandbox-Spiel Terraria erhält am Dienstag ein umfangreiches Update, ganze 15 Jahre nach seiner ursprünglichen Veröffentlichung. Fans warten sehnsüchtig seit Jahren auf diese Erweiterung, die das beliebte Spiel nochmals erheblich erweitern wird. Ein bemerkenswertes Zeichen für die anhaltende Langlebigkeit und die engagierte Community rund um das Indie-Meisterwerk.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/15-J…

Super Mario Galaxy Film: Neuer Trailer und früherer Starttermin

Nintendo hat einen frischen Trailer für “The Super Mario Galaxy Movie” veröffentlicht und Überraschendes angekündigt: Der Filmstart wurde vorgezogen und findet nun am 1. April statt. Fans der beliebten Videospiel-Reihe können sich also früher auf das cineografische Abenteuer mit dem berühmten Klempner freuen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/The-… \n## Health

RFK Jr.’s Vaccine Advisor Questions Need for Polio Shots, Alarms Doctors

Kirk Milhoan, newly appointed chair of the CDC’s vaccine advisory panel, shocked medical experts by declaring ‘I don’t like established science’ and questioning the necessity of polio vaccinations. The American Medical Association issued a scathing response to his remarks, raising serious concerns about public health guidance under the new administration.

Source: https://arstechnica.com/science/2026/01/do-we-really-need-polio-shots-deep-thoughts-by-rfk-jr-advisor-get-dragged/

Rich and Creamy Slow-Cooker Beef Stroganoff

This slow-cooker version of beef stroganoff delivers tender beef in a luscious sauce. Drape it over egg noodles for a complete meal.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/rich-and-creamy-slow-cooker-beef-stroganoff-recipe-11892781

Neustart fürs Gehirn: Wie das Mittagsschlaf-Synapsen-Reset funktioniert

Neue Forschungsergebnisse erklären, warum wir uns nach einem Mittagsschlaf erfrischt fühlen: Ein Nickerchen löst ein art Synapsen-Reset im Gehirn aus. Dieser Mechanismus stellt unsere kognitiven Fähigkeiten wieder her und macht uns wieder aufnahmefähig für neue Informationen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Neus…

The Ultimate Guide to Finding Perfect Boxed Chocolates

After evaluating 40 chocolate brands through extensive taste tests, experts have identified Recchiuti Confections Black Box as the top choice for luxurious, sophisticated gifting. The guide also features outstanding options for every preference, from flavor-forward samplers and single-origin truffles to vegan and nut-free collections, ensuring you’ll find the perfect box for any chocolate lover.

Source: [www.nytimes.com/wirecutte… \n## Science

Former Astronaut: NASA’s Lunar Spacesuits “Not Great Right Now”

Retired astronaut Kate Rubins warns that NASA’s Artemis missions will face grueling physical challenges, criticizing current lunar spacesuits as heavier than Apollo gear while crews are asked to do more. Her concerns add to known health risks including radiation exposure, muscle atrophy, and reduced immune function for Moonwalkers.

Source: https://arstechnica.com/space/2026/01/former-astronaut-on-lunar-spacesuits-i-dont-think-theyre-great-right-now/

Ex-Astronauten äußern Sicherheitsbedenken bei historischer Artemis-2 Mondmission

Mit Artemis-2 könnten erstmals seit über 50 Jahren Menschen den Mond umrunden, doch ehemalige Astronauten äußern ernsthafte Zweifel am Hitzeschild der Orion-Kapsel. Die Kritik von erfahrenen Experten wirft Fragen zur Sicherheit der bemannten Mission auf, die einen entscheidenden Schritt für die Rückkehr zum Mond darstellen würde.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Ex-A…

KI revolutioniert Waldwachstumsanalyse durch alte Satellitendaten

Ein Forschungsteam hat erfolgreich Künstliche Intelligenz eingesetzt, um aus historischen Landsat-Satellitenbildern Waldwachstumsraten zu messen – eine Methode, die bisher als unmöglich galt. Diese bahnbrechende Technologie ermöglicht nun detaillierte Rückblicke auf Waldentwicklung über Jahrzehnte.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Dank…

Stört beim Sterngucken: Auch Amazons Leo-Konstellation zu hell für die Forschung

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Stoe…

Kohlenstoffdioxid als Treibstoff: Durchbruch bei der CO2-Verwertung

Forscher der Yale University haben einen stabilen Mangan-Katalysator entwickelt, der CO2 kostengünstig in Formiat verwandelt. Durch ein innovatives Design mit sogenannten Pincer-Liganden übertrifft die Produktivität die teurerer Edelmetalle. Diese Technologie könnte die Produktion von sauberem Wasserstoff revolutionieren und fossile Brennstoffe durch nachhaltige Alternativen ersetzen.

Source: https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/27/co2-in-treibstoff-verwandeln/ \n## Politics

OpenAI President Donates $25M to Pro-Trump Super PAC

Greg Brockman, OpenAI’s co-founder and president, and his wife Anna contributed $25 million to ‘MAGA Inc.’ in September 2025, making it the largest donation to the pro-Trump super PAC. The massive contribution highlights the growing alignment between tech industry leaders and the Trump administration as it pursues pro-AI policies and deregulation.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/ai-artificial-intelligence/867947/openai-president-greg-brockman-trump-super-pac

Even Unlikely Reddit Communities Are Protesting ICE After Shootings

From hobby forums to adult content subreddits, diverse Reddit communities are uniting against ICE following the agency’s shooting deaths of two individuals. One popular subreddit declared “Fuck ICE first, second, third, and fourth,” illustrating how immigration enforcement outrage is permeating unexpected corners of the internet amid nationwide protests.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/news/867967/ice-shooting-minneapolis-reddit-communities-activism

Britisches Oberhaus beschließt Altersverifikation für VPNs und soziale Medien

Das britische Oberhaus hat für eine Ausweitung der Altersverifikation gestimmt, die künftig auch VPN-Anbieter und Social-Media-Plattformen betrifft. Anbieter sollen zukünftig überprüfen müssen, ob ihre Nutzer minderjährig sind. Diese Entscheidung könnte weitreichende Auswirkungen auf den digitalen Datenschutz und die Internetfreiheit haben.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Brit…

Irans Internetsperre: 30.000 Tote während des Blackouts

Die verheerende Dimension der iranischen Protestbekämpfung wird erst jetzt sichtbar: Während der Internetsperre sollen bis zu 30.000 Menschen ums Leben gekommen sein. Da die Blockade allmählich löchrig wird, kommt das wahre Ausmaß der Gewalt ans Licht.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Inte…

TikTok in der Hand von Trump-Freunden: Das Ende der digitalen Unabhängigkeit?

Ein US-Konsortium mit Oracle, Silver Lake und MGX übernimmt TikTok Amerika – laut Kritikern ein Deckmantel für politischen Einfluss. Was als Schutz vor chinesischer Überwachung begann, könnte nun zur Gefahr: Wenn Trump-nahe Milliardäre den Algorithmus kontrollieren, droht die Instrumentalisierung einer Plattform, die Wahlen und öffentliche Meinung beeinflusst.

Source: https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/26/algorithmus-diktatur-tikttok-usa/ \n## Business

Google to Pay $68 Million Over Assistant Recording Lawsuit

Google is settling a $68 million class-action lawsuit after its Assistant devices recorded private conversations without consent when activated by unintended triggers. The case revealed that human workers were listening to these unauthorized recordings, exposing serious privacy concerns in smart speaker technology.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/news/868078/google-assistant-lawsuit-settlement

Google zahigt 68 Millionen Dollar für illegale Sprachaufnahmen

Google einigt sich im jahrelangen Rechtsstreit mit einer Zahlung von 68 Millionen US-Dollar. Der Vorwurf: Der Sprachassistent Google Assistant hatte ohne Erlaubnis private Gespräche aufgezeichnet. Die Kläger erhalten nun Entschädigungen zwischen 150 und 600 Dollar, was Googles datenschutzrechtliche Verantwortungen unterstreicht.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Goog…

79 Prozent der Deutschen wollen Schutz vor ausländischen Übernahmen

Eine Bitkom-Umfrage zeigt, dass eine überwältigende Mehrheit von 79 Prozent der Deutschen Maßnahmen unterstützt, um Übernahmen von deutschen Tech-Unternehmen durch Investoren aus Nicht-EU-Ländern zu verhindern. Das Ergebnis spiegelt wachsende Bedenken hinsichtlich der nationalen Wirtschaftssicherheit in strategisch wichtigen Branchen wider.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Umfr…

Autohersteller verfehlen EU-CO₂-Ziele 2025 knapp – bleiben aber straffrei

Die EU-Ziele zur CO₂-Reduktion wurden 2025 leicht verfehlt, doch keine Strafen drohen. Volkswagen liegt noch zurück, kündigt aber kräftiges Aufholen an, während andere Hersteller das Heil im Pooling suchen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/CO-J…

John Ternus wird Apples neuer Designchef – Cook-Nachfolger?

Apple überträgt die Designverantwortung an Hardwarechef John Ternus, der damit CEO Tim Cook als letztes Wort bei Designentscheidungen ablöst. Diese strategische Führungsänderung könnte auf mögliche CEO-Nachfolgepläne hindeuten und stärkt Ternus’ Position innerhalb des Unternehmens erheblich.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Nich… \n## Lifestyle

How to Make Your Waxed Cotton Jacket Last a Lifetime

Waxed cotton jackets can become heirloom pieces with the right care. Learn how to clean and reapply wax to maintain water-resistance and extend your jacket’s lifespan for decades of use.

Source: [www.nytimes.com/wirecutte…

How This Newsletter Works

This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that:

  1. Aggregates content from 61 RSS feeds
  2. Filters articles from the last 24 hours
  3. Categorizes each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air)
  4. Detects similarities and combines related stories
  5. Selects the top 5 most interesting stories per category
  6. Summarizes each story with AI (GLM-4.7)

Tech Stack: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings.

Generated with ❤️ by n8n

A curated selection of today's most interesting stories from 61 RSS sources. ## Technology ### Open APIs Matter More Than Open Source for User Freedom The debate between open source and open platforms reveals a nuanced truth: while open source empowers developers, open APIs give power to everyone. The author challenges the fediverse's binary thinking, highlighting successful bootstrapped apps that charge fair prices without making users the product. Open platforms with portable data and open APIs may ultimately matter more than open source code for true user ownership. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/26/open-source-vs-open-platforms.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/26/open-source-vs-open-platforms.html) ### Developer Swears Off APIs: Taking a Stand Against Platform Dependency Dave Rupert is abandoning API-dependent projects after hitting frustrating limitations, arguing that building on closed platforms wastes valuable development time. He's adopting a strict policy to only work with permission-less, ad-free platforms and open protocols, a philosophy that could help other developers avoid similar pitfalls. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/26/dave-rupert-is-swearing-off.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/26/dave-rupert-is-swearing-off.html) ### Apple's Next-Gen AirTag Boasts Expanded Range and Louder Audio Apple has launched the second-generation AirTag featuring the same Ultra Wideband chip as the iPhone 17, enabling Precision Finding from 50% farther away. The upgraded tracker is 50% louder with enhanced Bluetooth range, delivering significant improvements while maintaining the same $29 price point. --- Source: [https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/26/airtag-2026/](https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/26/airtag-2026/) ### UK Lawmakers Vote to Extend Age Verification to VPNs The UK House of Lords has voted to extend age verification mandates to VPNs and most interactive online platforms under the Children's Wellbeing and Schools Bill. This expansion of the controversial Online Safety Act raises serious privacy concerns about digital autonomy and could fundamentally change how online services collect and verify user data. --- Source: [https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/26/uk-age-verification-for-vpns/](https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/26/uk-age-verification-for-vpns/) ### Revolutionary 3D AI Model Rodin Transforms Game Asset Creation Hyper3D's breakthrough Rodin model uses native 3D generation to create high-quality assets directly from images, winning SIGGRAPH 2024's Best Paper Honorable Mention. The free-to-generate platform enables game developers, designers, and 3D printing enthusiasts to rapidly prototype assets, with 2026 plans focused on advanced AI editing tools for artists. --- Source: [https://beforesandafters.com/2026/01/27/everything-you-need-to-know-about-hyper3d-ai-and-its-rodin-3d-generative-ai-model/](https://beforesandafters.com/2026/01/27/everything-you-need-to-know-about-hyper3d-ai-and-its-rodin-3d-generative-ai-model/) \n## Entertainment ### Why the Perfect RPG Prep Framework Doesn't Exist Having any RPG prep framework beats chasing perfection. Sly Flourish explains how to build a personalized, flexible prep system using his eight-step model from 'Return of the Lazy Dungeon Master' and continuously refine it through the Learn-Prep-Run-Evaluate cycle. --- Source: [[slyflourish.com/your_own_...](https://slyflourish.com/your_own_prep_framework.html?rss=1](https://slyflourish.com/your_own_prep_framework.html?rss=1)) ### Hitchcock's Silent Film Reimagined as Vertical Phone Drama UK streaming platform Tattle TV has transformed Alfred Hitchcock's 1927 silent film 'The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog' into a vertical video microdrama for mobile viewing. This creative adaptation makes classic cinema accessible to modern audiences, proving that bite-sized entertainment can include cinematic masterpieces alongside contemporary reality series and dramas. --- Source: [https://www.theverge.com/entertainment/867844/tattle-tv-the-lodger-hitchcock](https://www.theverge.com/entertainment/867844/tattle-tv-the-lodger-hitchcock) ### EU Forced to Act: 1.3 Million Signatures Demand Video Game Preservation A citizen initiative called "Stop Destroying Videogames" has collected over 1.2 million verified signatures, compelling the EU Commission to address video game preservation concerns. This massive public response highlights growing anxiety about losing gaming history and could lead to new EU policies protecting digital cultural heritage. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Buer...](https://www.heise.de/news/Buergerinitiative-1-294-188-Unterschriften-fuer-Stop-Destroying-Videogames-11154449.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Buergerinitiative-1-294-188-Unterschriften-fuer-Stop-Destroying-Videogames-11154449.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Terraria überrascht mit riesigem Update 15 Jahre nach Release Das kultige Sandbox-Spiel Terraria erhält am Dienstag ein umfangreiches Update, ganze 15 Jahre nach seiner ursprünglichen Veröffentlichung. Fans warten sehnsüchtig seit Jahren auf diese Erweiterung, die das beliebte Spiel nochmals erheblich erweitern wird. Ein bemerkenswertes Zeichen für die anhaltende Langlebigkeit und die engagierte Community rund um das Indie-Meisterwerk. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/15-J...](https://www.heise.de/news/15-Jahre-nach-Release-Update-1-4-5-fuer-Terraria-in-den-Startloechern-11153514.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/15-Jahre-nach-Release-Update-1-4-5-fuer-Terraria-in-den-Startloechern-11153514.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Super Mario Galaxy Film: Neuer Trailer und früherer Starttermin Nintendo hat einen frischen Trailer für "The Super Mario Galaxy Movie" veröffentlicht und Überraschendes angekündigt: Der Filmstart wurde vorgezogen und findet nun am 1. April statt. Fans der beliebten Videospiel-Reihe können sich also früher auf das cineografische Abenteuer mit dem berühmten Klempner freuen. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/The-...](https://www.heise.de/news/The-Super-Mario-Galaxy-Movie-Neuer-Trailer-und-fruehere-Veroeffentlichung-11153358.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/The-Super-Mario-Galaxy-Movie-Neuer-Trailer-und-fruehere-Veroeffentlichung-11153358.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) \n## Health ### RFK Jr.'s Vaccine Advisor Questions Need for Polio Shots, Alarms Doctors Kirk Milhoan, newly appointed chair of the CDC's vaccine advisory panel, shocked medical experts by declaring 'I don't like established science' and questioning the necessity of polio vaccinations. The American Medical Association issued a scathing response to his remarks, raising serious concerns about public health guidance under the new administration. --- Source: [https://arstechnica.com/science/2026/01/do-we-really-need-polio-shots-deep-thoughts-by-rfk-jr-advisor-get-dragged/](https://arstechnica.com/science/2026/01/do-we-really-need-polio-shots-deep-thoughts-by-rfk-jr-advisor-get-dragged/) ### Rich and Creamy Slow-Cooker Beef Stroganoff This slow-cooker version of beef stroganoff delivers tender beef in a luscious sauce. Drape it over egg noodles for a complete meal. --- Source: [https://www.seriouseats.com/rich-and-creamy-slow-cooker-beef-stroganoff-recipe-11892781](https://www.seriouseats.com/rich-and-creamy-slow-cooker-beef-stroganoff-recipe-11892781) ### Neustart fürs Gehirn: Wie das Mittagsschlaf-Synapsen-Reset funktioniert Neue Forschungsergebnisse erklären, warum wir uns nach einem Mittagsschlaf erfrischt fühlen: Ein Nickerchen löst ein art Synapsen-Reset im Gehirn aus. Dieser Mechanismus stellt unsere kognitiven Fähigkeiten wieder her und macht uns wieder aufnahmefähig für neue Informationen. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Neus...](https://www.heise.de/news/Neustart-fuers-Gehirn-Darum-ist-man-nach-dem-Mittagsschlaf-wieder-aufnahmefaehig-11154508.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Neustart-fuers-Gehirn-Darum-ist-man-nach-dem-Mittagsschlaf-wieder-aufnahmefaehig-11154508.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### The Ultimate Guide to Finding Perfect Boxed Chocolates After evaluating 40 chocolate brands through extensive taste tests, experts have identified Recchiuti Confections Black Box as the top choice for luxurious, sophisticated gifting. The guide also features outstanding options for every preference, from flavor-forward samplers and single-origin truffles to vegan and nut-free collections, ensuring you'll find the perfect box for any chocolate lover. --- Source: [[www.nytimes.com/wirecutte...](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/gifts/best-boxed-chocolates/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/gifts/best-boxed-chocolates/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed)) \n## Science ### Former Astronaut: NASA's Lunar Spacesuits "Not Great Right Now" Retired astronaut Kate Rubins warns that NASA's Artemis missions will face grueling physical challenges, criticizing current lunar spacesuits as heavier than Apollo gear while crews are asked to do more. Her concerns add to known health risks including radiation exposure, muscle atrophy, and reduced immune function for Moonwalkers. --- Source: [https://arstechnica.com/space/2026/01/former-astronaut-on-lunar-spacesuits-i-dont-think-theyre-great-right-now/](https://arstechnica.com/space/2026/01/former-astronaut-on-lunar-spacesuits-i-dont-think-theyre-great-right-now/) ### Ex-Astronauten äußern Sicherheitsbedenken bei historischer Artemis-2 Mondmission Mit Artemis-2 könnten erstmals seit über 50 Jahren Menschen den Mond umrunden, doch ehemalige Astronauten äußern ernsthafte Zweifel am Hitzeschild der Orion-Kapsel. Diese strategische Führungsänderung könnte auf mögliche CEO-Nachfolgepläne hindeuten und stärkt Ternus' Position innerhalb des Unternehmens erheblich. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Nich...](https://www.heise.de/news/Nicht-mehr-Tim-Cook-John-Ternus-ist-Apples-neuer-Designchef-11153769.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Nicht-mehr-Tim-Cook-John-Ternus-ist-Apples-neuer-Designchef-11153769.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) \n## Lifestyle ### How to Make Your Waxed Cotton Jacket Last a Lifetime Waxed cotton jackets can become heirloom pieces with the right care. Learn how to clean and reapply wax to maintain water-resistance and extend your jacket's lifespan for decades of use. --- Source: [[www.nytimes.com/wirecutte...](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/how-to-rewax-barbour-jacket/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/how-to-rewax-barbour-jacket/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed)) --- #### How This Newsletter Works This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that: 1. **Aggregates** content from 61 RSS feeds 2. **Filters** articles from the last 24 hours 3. **Categorizes** each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air) 4. **Detects similarities** and combines related stories 5. **Selects** the top 5 most interesting stories per category 6. **Summarizes** each story with AI (GLM-4.7) **Tech Stack**: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings. --- **Generated with ❤️ by n8n**

items.title: The Daily News — 2026-01-26 Edition
items.content_html:
A curated selection of today’s most interesting stories from 61 RSS sources.

Technology

Apple’s Major Siri AI Announcement Coming in February

Mark Gurman reports that Apple plans to unveil its revamped Siri in the second half of February, demonstrating new functionality and features. The company is shifting focus to cloud-based AI models, as current on-device technology isn’t yet powerful enough to deliver the experience they’re aiming for.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/25/mark-gurman-pulls-together-a.html

Apple’s iPhone Air MagSafe Battery Gets First-Ever 20% Discount

Apple’s ultra-slim MagSafe battery pack designed for the iPhone Air is marked down by 20% on Amazon for the first time ever, dropping from $99. The sleek accessory adds up to 65% battery life and delivers 12W fast wireless charging, making it the perfect solution for iPhone Air users who need extra power without bulk.

Source: https://www.macworld.com/article/3041407/apples-iphone-air-magsafe-battery-is-20-off-for-the-first-time-ever.html

Opus 4.5 Glitch: Error Rates Spike and Recovery

Claude’s Opus 4.5 experienced increased error rates, with a fix now implemented and ongoing monitoring. The incident highlights the challenges in maintaining AI system reliability at scale.

Source: https://status.claude.com/incidents/1f8s9zn12cfh

The Great E-Bike Crackdown Has Begun

New Jersey lawmakers have passed heavy restrictions on e-bike ownership in response to growing safety concerns about teenage injuries and fatalities. The legislation marks what experts fear could be the start of a broader crackdown on electric bikes, potentially threatening a movement that has transformed urban transportation.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/column/866218/e-bike-crackdown

Best MagSafe Power Banks Tested: Fastest iPhone Chargers for 2026

Macworld’s comprehensive lab tests reveal the top magnetic power banks for iPhone 12-17, from ultra-slim 5K packs to powerhouse 10K models. The EcoFlow RAPID 10K emerges as the overall winner, while new 25W Qi2.2 chargers deliver near-wired speeds for iPhone 16 and 17 users.

Source: https://www.macworld.com/article/668978/best-magsafe-portable-battery-packs-and-power-banks-for-iphone-12-and-13.html \n## Entertainment

One Movie Buff’s Quest to Watch Every Oscar Nomination

Gonna try to watch all the Oscar nominations this year. Over the weekend caught up on Bugonia (what the heck?) and The Smashing Machine (not much plot, but really liked the characters). 🍿

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/25/gonna-try-to-watch-all.html

Old School Runescape Defies 25 Years of Gaming Rules

Despite being 25 years old, Old School Runescape remains vibrantly alive by consistently defying gaming conventions. The upcoming sailing expansion, featuring new quests and activities like the Barracuda Trial, showcases how the classic game continues evolving fresh mechanics.

Source: https://www.polygon.com/old-school-runescape-design-director-kieren-charles-interview/

Netflix’s Mappa Deal Opens Door for Absolute Batman Anime

Netflix’s groundbreaking partnership with acclaimed anime studio Mappa, combined with its planned acquisition of Warner Bros. Discovery’s streaming assets, creates a perfect storm for adapting DC’s Absolute Batman into an anime series. This bold collaboration could deliver a stunning visual interpretation of the darker Batman storyline while operating outside James Gunn’s DCU reboot.

Source: https://www.polygon.com/mappa-netflix-warner-bros-discovery-absolute-batman-anime/

SMBC Comic Satirizes Scientific Method With Clever Wordplay

Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal delivers another intelligent comic that playfully pokes fun at scientific methodology. The strip uses witty dialogue and a pun about the null hypothesis to explore the philosophy of empiricism, showcasing why SMBC remains a favorite among science enthusiasts who appreciate smart humor.

Source: https://www.smbc-comics.com/comic/just

Behind Squid Game’s Invisible VFX Magic

Lux Aeterna’s team reveals how invisible visual effects supported Squid Game’s emotional authenticity without breaking the show’s raw, realistic feel. Executive VFX Producer Emma Kolasinska and Compositing Supervisor Tav Flett discuss the delicate art of enhancing unscripted television through seamless, undetectable effects.

Source: https://www.fxguide.com/fxpodcasts/squid-game-the-vfx-challenge-with-lux-aeterna/ \n## Health

Master the Art of Cooking Perfect Lentils Every Time

Lentils are tiny powerhouses packed with nutrition and endless versatility in the kitchen. This comprehensive guide from the pros reveals everything you need to know about selecting, cooking, and storing lentils to maximize their flavor and health benefits in every dish.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/guide-to-cooking-storing-and-buying-lentils-11892132

The 1980s Walking Workout That Will Actually Get You in Shape

This largely forgotten 1980s fitness method combines walking with pumping light dumbbells, engaging all four limbs for dramatically increased cardiovascular benefits. The Heavyhands Walk delivers a low-impact, full-body workout that can approach jogging intensity while being gentle on joints, making it ideal for building strength, burning fat, and improving overall fitness.

Source: https://www.artofmanliness.com/health-fitness/fitness/heavyhands-walking-workout/ \n## Politics

Social Media Creators Unite in Unprecedented Protest Against ICE

Following the killing of Alex Pretti by ICE agents, creators and communities across social media platforms are speaking out against federal immigration enforcement. Even typically apolitical accounts and niche communities like r/catbongos are joining the protest.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/policy/867451/creators-and-communities-take-a-stand-against-ice

Why It Doesn’t Matter If Alex Pretti Had a Gun

Federal agents claimed Alex Pretti was armed when they fatally shot him in Minneapolis, but Bellingcat analysis shows he was holding a phone. This article argues that even if Pretti had been legally armed, the killing raises serious questions about excessive force and accountability in immigration enforcement operations.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/policy/867455/dhs-ice-border-patrol-minneapolis-alex-pretti

Why Masked ICE Agents Are Sparking National Outcry

Americans are increasingly concerned about ICE officers wearing masks that hide their identities, raising serious questions about accountability and public safety. The inability to distinguish between legitimate law enforcement and impersonators has led to dangerous situations, including recent violent incidents. California has responded with the No Secret Police Act, restricting federal law enforcement’s ability to conceal their identities during operations.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/policy/867202/ice-mask-ban-no-secret-police-california \n## Business

VW-Chef: Audi-Werk in USA wegen Zöllen nicht finanzierbar

VW zieht Planungen für ein Audi-Werk in den USA ernsthaft in Zweifel – hohe Zölle machen das Projekt wirtschaftlich unattraktiv. Die Entscheidung hängt maßgeblich von der Handelspolitik des Weißen Hauses ab und zeigt, wie politische Rahmenbedingungen globale Investitionsentscheidungen der Automobilindustrie beeinflussen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/VW-A…

Krypto-Branche zeigt sich beim Weltwirtschaftsforum in Davos selbstsicher

Auf dem Weltwirtschaftsforum in Davos präsentiert sich die Kryptowährungsbranche mit newfound confidence. Stablecoins sollen an Bedeutung gewinnen und könnten traditionelle nationale Währungen mittelfristig sogar ersetzen – eine Entwicklung mit weitreichenden Konsequenzen für das globale Finanzsystem.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Deba…

Norwegischer Pensionsfonds: Erfolgsmodell einfach nachbauen

Der norwegische Pensionsfonds gilt als Vorbild für kapitalmarktgestützte Altersvorsorge und ist mit geringem Aufwand auch für Privatanleger replizierbar. Erfahren Sie, wie Sie diese bewährte Strategie für Ihre eigene finanzielle Absicherung nutzen und von einer stabilen, breit diversifizierten Geldanlage profitieren können.

Source: [www.heise.de/ratgeber/…

Das beste CRM für Gastronomie: Digitale Gästebindung einfach gemacht

Die Gastronomie steht vor der Herausforderung, Gäste langfristig zu binden und Prozesse zu digitalisieren. Ein Vergleich der drei führenden CRM-Lösungen zeigt, wie Restaurants, Cafés und Hotels mit moderner Technologie die Gästebeziehung revolutionieren und gleichzeitig ihre Effizienz steigern können.

Source: https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/25/das-beste-crm-fuer-gastronomie/

Apple CEO Succession: Tim Cook Likely to Stay Until Mid-2026

Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman pushes back against recent reports suggesting Tim Cook could step down as early as 2026, saying a transition before mid-year seems unlikely. Apple has positioned hardware chief John Ternus as the likely successor, recently placing him in charge of the company’s design teams.

Source: https://www.macrumors.com/2026/01/25/when-will-tim-cook-step-down-as-apple-ceo/

How This Newsletter Works

This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that:

  1. Aggregates content from 61 RSS feeds
  2. Filters articles from the last 24 hours
  3. Categorizes each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air)
  4. Detects similarities and combines related stories
  5. Selects the top 5 most interesting stories per category
  6. Summarizes each story with AI (GLM-4.7)

Tech Stack: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings.

Generated with ❤️ by n8n

items.content_html: I am finally back at coding my iOS app dialysisPal in a way the forced 5 months break was a godsend. The AI world has evolved quite a bit and it allowed me to give quite a bit of polish to the app’s UI/UX. It looks really nice now.
items.content_text: I am finally back at coding my iOS app [dialysisPal](https://dialysepal.de) in a way the forced 5 months break was a godsend. The AI world has evolved quite a bit and it allowed me to give quite a bit of polish to the app's UI/UX. It looks really nice now.

items.content_html: My daughter has started watching the new She-Ra. I am pretty disappointed. Too much slap-stick all the time & the character design and flat shading are just too simplistic. So much has been lost from the original. It might have a pretty good story behind it, but it’s overshadowed by the flaws.
items.content_text:
My daughter has started watching the new She-Ra. I am pretty disappointed. Too much slap-stick all the time & the character design and flat shading are just too simplistic. So much has been lost from the original. 
It might have a pretty good story behind it, but it’s overshadowed by the flaws.

items.title: The Daily News — 2026-01-24 Edition
items.content_html:
A curated selection of today’s most interesting stories from 61 RSS sources.

Entertainment

Disneyland Handcrafted Documentary Reveals Rare Early Construction Footage

Watched: Disneyland Handcrafted. Some great early construction footage. 🍿

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/23/watched-disneyland-handcrafted-some-great.html

Drops of God Season 2 Now Streaming on Apple TV Plus

Apple TV Plus just released season 2 of Drops of God, marking one of several new additions to their expanding content library. The streaming service continues to grow with diverse offerings, including recent releases like Hijack season 2, Tehran season 3, and the documentary Born to be Wild.

Source: https://www.macworld.com/article/230863/apple-tv-originals-shows-series-movies-release-dates-news-actors-directors.html

Töpfern und Kämpfen: Double Fines verrücktes neues Multiplayer-Spiel

Double Fine präsentiert mit ‘Kiln’ einen einzigartigen Online-Brawler, der Töpferkunst mit Teamkämpfen vereint. Das ungewöhnliche Konzept lässt Spieler handgefertigte Töpfe in Schauplätzen für tobende Gefechte nutzen. Eine kreative Mischung aus Kunsthandwerk und actionreichem Multiplayer-Gaming.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Hand…

Xbox Reveals Exciting New Gameplay From Fable and Forza Horizon 6

Playground Games has unveiled extended gameplay footage from two highly anticipated Xbox titles: Fable and Forza Horizon 6. The new clips showcase Fable’s signature British humor alongside Forza Horizon 6’s stunning Japanese street settings, giving fans their first real look at what’s to come.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Play…

The Toxic Avenger im 4K-Test: Trash-Kino wie noch nie

Das hochkarätig besetzte Remake mit Peter Dinklage zeigt, dass Trash-Film in 4K atemberaubend aussehen kann. Die Heise-Redaktion lobt das grün funkelnde Filmjuwel für seine brillante Heimkinopräsenz und gelungene Ästhetik.

Source: [www.heise.de/tests/Pun… \n## Technology

Micro.blog Introduces Slow Reads for Long-Form Content

Micro.blog has launched a new ‘slow reads’ submission form to highlight and promote long-form blog posts that deserve more than a quick skim. Users can now submit their favorite in-depth articles, encouraging a shift toward more thoughtful, substantial content reading.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/23/for-microblog-this-year-we.html

From Mind-Blowing to Mundane: How We Embraced the Autonomous Future

Manton Reece captures the remarkable journey of Waymo’s autonomous vehicles from jaw-dropping novelty to everyday normalcy. What once seemed impossible—cars driving themselves—has transformed into something even more remarkable: trusted, safe transportation that we now take for granted.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/23/the-first-time-i-saw.html

Bluesky, ICE Verification, and Fediverse Confusion Explained

Laurens Hofs offers insightful analysis on ICE getting a verified badge on Bluesky and the resulting controversy. He explores how fediverse users are applying ActivityPub mental models to ATProto infrastructure, and notes how ICE’s mere presence without any posts serves as an effective fear tactic.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/23/good-analysis-from-laurens-hofs.html

Making C Libraries Feel Native in Swift

How This Newsletter Works

This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that:

  1. Aggregates content from 61 RSS feeds
  2. Filters articles from the last 24 hours
  3. Categorizes each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air)
  4. Detects similarities and combines related stories
  5. Selects the top 5 most interesting stories per category
  6. Summarizes each story with AI (GLM-4.7)

Die lautstarke Kritik der Wirtschaft an der zumutbaren Bürokratie wächst weiter. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Beri...](https://www.heise.de/news/Berichtspflichten-62-Milliarden-Euro-Buerokratiekosten-fuer-Unternehmen-11151828.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Berichtspflichten-62-Milliarden-Euro-Buerokratiekosten-fuer-Unternehmen-11151828.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Rossmann folgt dm nach: Eigene Online-Apotheke geplant Nachdem dm bereits eine Online-Apotheke gestartet hat, kündigt nun auch Rossmann den Einstieg in den Online-Handel mit Medikamenten an. Die Entscheidung spiegelt den wachsenden Trend wider, dass Kunden Arzneimittel vermehrt online bestellen, was die Drogeriemarken zu einer strategischen Anpassung zwingt. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Nach...](https://www.heise.de/news/Nach-dm-Auch-Rossmann-plant-eigene-Online-Apotheke-11151983.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Nach-dm-Auch-Rossmann-plant-eigene-Online-Apotheke-11151983.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Google und Epic beenden jahrelangen Rechtsstreit mit 800-Millionen-Deal Nach jahrelangen Gerichtskämpfen haben sich Google und Epic Games außergerichtlich geeinigt – angestoßen durch einen neuen 800-Millionen-Dollar-Geschäftsdeal. Die Einigung beendet einen der bedeutendsten Rechtsstreite der Tech-Branche und zeigt, wie geschäftliche Interessen strategische Konflikte lösen können. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Goog...](https://www.heise.de/news/Google-gegen-Epic-800-Millionen-Deal-ist-Teil-der-aussergerichtlichen-Einigung-11151537.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Google-gegen-Epic-800-Millionen-Deal-ist-Teil-der-aussergerichtlichen-Einigung-11151537.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Käuferschutz bei PayPal und Bezahldiensten: So sind Sie abgesichert Wenn Onlinebestellungen nicht wie geplant verlaufen, bieten PayPal und andere Bezahldienste wichtige Käuferschutz-Mechanismen. Dieser informative Artikel erklärt detailliert die Voraussetzungen und den genauen Verfahrensablauf, damit Sie im Ernstfall wissen, wie Sie Ihre Ansprüche geltend machen können. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/hintergru...](https://www.heise.de/hintergrund/So-funktioniert-Kaeuferschutz-bei-Bezahldiensten-11089055.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag_plus.beitrag_plus](https://www.heise.de/hintergrund/So-funktioniert-Kaeuferschutz-bei-Bezahldiensten-11089055.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag_plus.beitrag_plus)) \n## Home & Lifestyle ### Sleep Better Tonight With These Dreamy Comforter Picks After testing dozens of comforters for hundreds of hours, Wirecutter has identified six exceptional options that combine warmth, lightweight comfort, and quality construction. From budget-friendly to luxury down alternatives, find the perfect bedding upgrade for your best night's sleep. --- Source: [[www.nytimes.com/wirecutte...](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/best-comforter/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/best-comforter/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed)) --- #### How This Newsletter Works This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that: 1. **Aggregates** content from 61 RSS feeds 2. **Filters** articles from the last 24 hours 3. **Categorizes** each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air) 4. **Detects similarities** and combines related stories 5. **Selects** the top 5 most interesting stories per category 6. **Summarizes** each story with AI (GLM-4.7) **Tech Stack**: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings. --- **Generated with ❤️ by n8n**

items.title: AI as in Addictive
items.content_html:
The one thing that sucks about AI coding is that it is very addictive. I have a hard time letting go once I start. Features and bug fixes are done so fast that the urge to quickly do „one more“ is overwhelming for me.

Just taking a peek how a the AI is doing easily turns into an hour or more of me sitting in front of the computer.

And I have a hard time focusing on other tasks (housework, other projects, etc.). H

items.title: The Daily News — 2026-01-23 Edition
items.content_html:
A curated selection of today’s most interesting stories from 61 RSS sources.

Health

Fleischfressende Bakterien im Meer: Wie gefährlich ist Vibrio vulnificus wirklich?

Das Bakterium Vibrio vulnificus kommt in warmem Meerwasser vor und kann in seltenen Fällen schwere Infektionen verursachen – sogar zum Absterben von Weichteilgeweben. In Deutschland ist das Risiko im Vergleich zu den USA sehr gering, besonders gefährdet sind jedoch Menschen mit geschwächtem Immunsystem oder offenen Wunden. Bei frühzeitiger Behandlung mit Antibiotika lassen sich Infektionen gut besiegen.

Source: https://pm-wissen.com/umwelt/wie-gefaehrlich-ist-vibrio-vulnificus/

Kann Musik wirklich die Konzentration steigern?

Forscher der Georgetown University haben in einem Experiment mit 200 Teilnehmenden untersucht, ob Musik bei der Konzentration hilft. Das Ergebnis: Speziell designte “Work Flow”-Musik ohne Texte und störende Höhen steigert zwar nicht die Genauigkeit, aber die mentale Ausdauer und Stimmung erheblich – was über Stunden produktiver arbeiten lässt.

Source: https://pm-wissen.com/psychologie/verbessert-musik-die-konzentration/

The Missing Skill for Lifelong Fitness: How to Choose What Actually Matters

In an age of overwhelming fitness advice, the key to lasting progress isn’t more information—it’s having a framework to make better choices. Learn how to cut through the noise of extreme theories and quick fixes by focusing on what actually works for your current goals, body, and lifestyle.

Source: https://gmb.io/lifelong-fitness/

50 Millionen Dollar: OpenAI und Gates Foundation revolutionieren afrikanische Gesundheitsversorgung mit KI

OpenAI und die Gates Foundation investieren gemeinsam 50 Millionen US-Dollar, um die medizinische Versorgung in Afrika durch künstliche Intelligenz maßgeblich zu verbessern. Diese strategische Partnerschaft zielt darauf ab, kritische Gesundheitsprobleme zu lösen und die Patientenversorgung in unterversorgten Regionen durch KI-gestützte Innovationen spürbar zu verbessern. Die Initiative könnte die Gesundheitslandschaft afrikanischer Länder nachhaltig transformieren.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Open…

20 Thoughtful Gifts for People Who Absolutely Love to Sleep

Wirecutter has curated 20 giftable sleep-enhancing products for the nap enthusiasts in your life. From soothing soaks and cozy PJs to light-blocking shades and sleep-inducing headphones, these thoughtful gifts can improve both sleep quality and overall wellbeing.

Source: [www.nytimes.com/wirecutte… \n## Politics

Minnesota Reaching a Tipping Point That Demands Change

Getting the sense that what’s happening in Minnesota is about to reach a tipping point, or maybe already has, where it becomes so clearly unacceptable to everyone regardless of political party that there will be new pressure for change. This is not sustainable. 🇺🇸

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/22/getting-the-sense-that-whats.html

Jack Smith Justice: Would We Do It All Again?

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/22/watched-some-of-the-jack.html

Führerschein läuft ab 2026: Was Autofahrer jetzt wissen müssen

Ab Januar 2026 verfallen weitere Führerschein-Dokumente in Deutschland. Unser FAQ erklärt, welche Dokumenttypen betroffen sind, welche Fristen gelten und mit welchen Kosten Sie bei der Neuausstellung rechnen müssen – wichtig für alle, deren Papier-Führerschein bald ungültig wird.

Source: [www.heise.de/hintergru…

Britisches Oberhaus stimmt für Social-Media-Mindestalter

Das britische Oberhaus hat mehrheitlich für ein Mindestalter für Social-Media-Nutzung gestimmt. Die Labour-Regierung plant jedoch, den Antrag im Unterhaus zu stoppen, was zu einem politischen Konflikt führen könnte.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Brit…

Staatstrojaner vor Verfassungsgericht und neue Satelliten-Internet-Optionen

Staatliche Malware muss sich vor dem Bundesverfassungsgericht verantworten, während Terawave und Blue Origins neue Satelliten-Internet-Dienste für verbesserte Konnektivität vorantreiben. Zudem wächst Threads mit mehr Nutzern und Werbung, und die Charité steht wegen Datenschutzbedenken unter Kritik.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Donn… \n## Technology

AI Bubble Is in Stocks, Not Real Usage

Vinod Khosla argues that the AI bubble exists primarily in stock market valuations, not in actual usage and adoption. Like the internet continued growing through the dot-com bubble, AI usage is expected to keep expanding despite potential company failures, suggesting the technology’s real-world impact will outlast market volatility.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/22/listening-to-the-open-ai.html

From Quick Fixes to Complex Tasks: AI Coding Evolution

I usually give AI little coding tasks. Go off and fix this one thing, make this small tweak, add this one feature that I will review. Today I had it help with something bigger. I iterated on the plan, then it worked for 30 minutes. Pretty incredible.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/22/i-usually-give-ai-little.html

The Perfect QuickTime Replacement for Fast Video Trimming

LosslessCut 1.13 solves a common video editing headache by providing a clean, visual interface for lossless video trimming. Built on FFmpeg, this open-source tool lets you quickly cut and join video files without time-consuming re-encoding—finally filling the void left when classic QuickTime was deprecated.

Source: https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/22/losslesscut-1-13/

Meet the AI Assistant That Lives in Your Chat Apps

Clawdbot is a revolutionary local AI agent that you can interact with through WhatsApp, Telegram, or iMessage to automate tasks, manage your schedule, and even write code. Unlike traditional apps, this self-improving assistant can install new skills, execute commands, and continuously expand its capabilities—offering a glimpse into a future where prompts replace apps as our primary interface.

Source: https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/22/clawdbot/

When Your Software Starts Driving You Instead of the Other Way Around

Mike Swanson coins “backseat software” to describe how modern apps have shifted from being user-controlled tools to interruptive channels that operate on us. This transformation is driven by product metrics like DAU, retention, and gamification, showing that analytics often prove features were buried, not unwanted. A must-read for understanding why your software feels increasingly pushy.

Source: https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/22/backseat-software/ \n## Business

Apple’s John Ternus: The New Jony Ive Emerges as Future CEO

Apple hardware chief John Ternus now oversees the company’s entire design team, a role previously held only by Apple’s most legendary figures including Jony Ive. This strategic move by Tim Cook signals Ternus is the leading candidate to replace Cook as CEO, placing him at the helm of both hardware and software design.

Source: https://www.macworld.com/article/3040394/apples-john-ternus-just-became-the-new-jony-ive.html

Take Control of Your Monthly Subscription Spending

Subscriptions have quietly taken over our digital lives, often draining our finances unnoticed. TidBITS invites you to audit your recurring payments through a simple five-question poll that helps tally your spending and compare habits with fellow readers. It’s a practical opportunity to discover exactly where your money goes each month and see how your subscription footprint stacks up against others in the community.

Source: https://tidbits.com/2026/01/22/do-you-use-it-audit-your-subscriptions/

Vimeo Cuts ‘Large Portion’ of Staff After $1.38B Acquisition

Vimeo is laying off a significant portion of its global workforce just months after Italian software company Bending Spoons acquired the platform for $1.38 billion. Former employees report that entire teams, including the entire video engineering department, were affected in what appears to be a massive restructuring following the buyout.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/news/866238/vimeo-layoffs-bending-spoons-acquisition

TikTok USA: Abschluss der Überziehung näher gerückt

Die notwendigen behördlichen Genehmigungen für den Verkauf von TikTok USA liegen vor – nach langen juristischen Auseinandersetzungen zeichnet sich der Abschluss der Transaktion ab. Der Wechsel der Eigentümerverhältnisse steht kurz bevor.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/TikT…

Telefon-AU: Warum sie nicht für den Anstieg der Krankmeldungen verantwortlich ist

Die hohe Zahl an Krankmeldungen entfacht eine neue Debatte um die Telefon-AU. Experten analysieren, warum diese umstrittene Methode kaum ins Gewicht fällt und welche wirklichen Probleme hinter den steigenden AU-Fällen stecken.

Source: [www.heise.de/hintergru… \n## Entertainment

Oscar Nominees Push Visual Effects Boundaries

The Academy unveiled the five nominees for Best Visual Effects, featuring groundbreaking work from Avatar: Fire and Ash, F1, and Jurassic World Rebirth. Each nominated film showcases extraordinary technical achievements that blur reality and imagination, representing the pinnacle of modern cinema’s visual innovation.

Source: https://beforesandafters.com/2026/01/23/here-are-the-vfx-oscar-nominees/

Beyond Good & Evil 2 Miraculously Survives Ubisoft’s Project Purge

Despite being in development hell for 17 years and losing two creative directors, Beyond Good & Evil 2 has somehow survived Ubisoft’s recent corporate restructuring that canceled other projects like Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake. Ubisoft insists the long-awaited sequel remains a priority as part of their open world adventure strategy.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/games/866439/beyond-good-and-evil-2-somehow-survived-the-purge-at-ubisoft

Geheimtipps 2025: Indie-Games, die Ihre Aufmerksamkeit verdienen

Viele kreative Indie-Spiele bleiben unbeachtet, obwohl sie mit ungewöhnlichen Ideen und mutigen Experimenten beeindrucken. Dieser Artikel stellt die spannendsten Geheimtipps des Jahres 2025 vor, die abseits des Mainstreams warten und definitiv einen Blick wert sind.

Source: [www.heise.de/tests/Spi…

Celebrating the 98th Oscar Nominees: A Toast to Cinematic Excellence

The nominations for the 98th Academy Awards have been announced, recognizing outstanding achievements across the film industry. These prestigious nominations highlight the year’s most remarkable performances, technical innovations, and storytelling that defined cinema in 2025.

Source: https://www.fxguide.com/quicktakes/congrats-to-the-98th-oscar-nominations/

Apple’s F1 Racing Film Scores Best Picture Oscar Nomination

Apple’s high-octane racing film F1, starring Brad Pitt, has earned a prestigious Best Picture nomination at the 2026 Academy Awards alongside five other total nominations for the tech giant. The film’s historic theatrical run, generating over $631 million worldwide, marks Apple’s most successful movie yet and cements its growing influence in Hollywood’s awards season.

Source: https://www.macrumors.com/2026/01/22/f1-best-picture-nomination/ \n## Science

Drei heftige Sonneneruptionen in einem atemberaubenden Zeitraffer

Die ESA-Sonden Proba-3 haben einen spektakulären Zeitraffer von drei aufeinanderfolgenden Sonneneruptionen eingefangen. Durch künstliche Sonnenfinsternisse können die Wissenschaftler die Korona unseres Heimatsterns bisher unerreicht genau erforschen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/ESA-…

Schnelle Evolution: Neue Spezies entstehen nur 2000 Jahre nach Asteroideneinschlag

Forschungen zeigen, dass sich die biologische Vielfalt auf der Erde nach dem Chicxulub-Asteroideneinschlag viel schneller erholte als bisher angenommen. Bereits nach nur 2.000 Jahren tauchten neue Spezies auf, was unser Verständnis davon revolutioniert, wie schnell das Leben nach massiven Vernichtungsereignissen zurückkehren kann.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Schn…

Helgoland simuliert totalen Stromausfall

Die Nordseeinsel Helgoland hat umfassende Notfallübungen durchgeführt, um auf den Ausfall des Seekabels vorbereitet zu sein. Bei dem realistischen Blackout-Szenario wurde getestet, wie die Inselversorgung ohne Strom auskommt und welche Maßnahmen im Ernstfall greifen. Die Übung zeigt, wie wichtig Katastrophenschutz für abgelegene Regionen ist.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Helg…

Erneuerbare Energien überholen fossile Brennstoffe in der EU

Ein historischer Wendepunkt: In mehr als der Hälfte der EU-Staaten tragen erneuerbare Energiequellen inzwischen mehr zum Strommix bei als fossile Brennstoffe. Besonders die Solarenergie verzeichnet starkes Wachstum und treibt die Energiewende voran – ein entscheidender Schritt hin zu einer nachhaltigeren Zukunft in Europa.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Trot…

Deutschland investiert 30 Millionen für unabhängige Forschungsdaten

Angesichts wachsender Unsicherheit in der US-Wissenschaftspolitik investiert die Bundesregierung 30 Millionen Euro in unabhängige Forschungsdateninfrastruktur. Diese strategische Maßnahme stärkt die EU-Datensouveränität und reduziert Abhängigkeiten von amerikanischen Plattformen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Abzu… \n## Sports

The Best Hydration Packs for Day Hikers

After nine years of testing, Wirecutter recommends the Osprey Skarab 18 and Skimmer 16 as the top hydration packs for day hikers. These well-made backpacks with built-in water reservoirs are reasonably priced and spacious enough to carry all the gear and water needed for a three-hour hike, making it easier to stay hydrated on the trail.

Source: [www.nytimes.com/wirecutte…

How This Newsletter Works

This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that:

  1. Aggregates content from 61 RSS feeds
  2. Filters articles from the last 24 hours
  3. Categorizes each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air)
  4. Detects similarities and combines related stories
  5. Selects the top 5 most interesting stories per category
  6. Summarizes each story with AI (GLM-4.7)

Tech Stack: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings.

Generated with ❤️ by n8n

--- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/22/watched-some-of-the-jack.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/22/watched-some-of-the-jack.html) ### Führerschein läuft ab 2026: Was Autofahrer jetzt wissen müssen Ab Januar 2026 verfallen weitere Führerschein-Dokumente in Deutschland. Unser FAQ erklärt, welche Dokumenttypen betroffen sind, welche Fristen gelten und mit welchen Kosten Sie bei der Neuausstellung rechnen müssen – wichtig für alle, deren Papier-Führerschein bald ungültig wird. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/hintergru...](https://www.heise.de/hintergrund/FAQ-Fuehrerschein-Dokument-laeuft-ab-was-nun-11149773.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/hintergrund/FAQ-Fuehrerschein-Dokument-laeuft-ab-was-nun-11149773.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Britisches Oberhaus stimmt für Social-Media-Mindestalter Das britische Oberhaus hat mehrheitlich für ein Mindestalter für Social-Media-Nutzung gestimmt. Die Labour-Regierung plant jedoch, den Antrag im Unterhaus zu stoppen, was zu einem politischen Konflikt führen könnte. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Brit...](https://www.heise.de/news/Britisches-Oberhaus-stimmt-fuer-Social-Media-Mindestalter-Stopp-im-Unterhaus-11149869.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Britisches-Oberhaus-stimmt-fuer-Social-Media-Mindestalter-Stopp-im-Unterhaus-11149869.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Staatstrojaner vor Verfassungsgericht und neue Satelliten-Internet-Optionen Staatliche Malware muss sich vor dem Bundesverfassungsgericht verantworten, während Terawave und Blue Origins neue Satelliten-Internet-Dienste für verbesserte Konnektivität vorantreiben. Zudem wächst Threads mit mehr Nutzern und Werbung, und die Charité steht wegen Datenschutzbedenken unter Kritik. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Donn...](https://www.heise.de/news/Donnerstag-Staatstrojaner-vor-Verfassungsgericht-Satelliten-Internet-Terawave-11149713.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Donnerstag-Staatstrojaner-vor-Verfassungsgericht-Satelliten-Internet-Terawave-11149713.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) \n## Technology ### AI Bubble Is in Stocks, Not Real Usage Vinod Khosla argues that the AI bubble exists primarily in stock market valuations, not in actual usage and adoption. Like the internet continued growing through the dot-com bubble, AI usage is expected to keep expanding despite potential company failures, suggesting the technology's real-world impact will outlast market volatility. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/22/listening-to-the-open-ai.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/22/listening-to-the-open-ai.html) ### From Quick Fixes to Complex Tasks: AI Coding Evolution I usually give AI little coding tasks. Go off and fix this one thing, make this small tweak, add this one feature that I will review. Today I had it help with something bigger. I iterated on the plan, then it worked for 30 minutes. Pretty incredible. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/22/i-usually-give-ai-little.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/22/i-usually-give-ai-little.html) ### The Perfect QuickTime Replacement for Fast Video Trimming LosslessCut 1.13 solves a common video editing headache by providing a clean, visual interface for lossless video trimming. Built on FFmpeg, this open-source tool lets you quickly cut and join video files without time-consuming re-encoding—finally filling the void left when classic QuickTime was deprecated. --- Source: [https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/22/losslesscut-1-13/](https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/22/losslesscut-1-13/) ### Meet the AI Assistant That Lives in Your Chat Apps Clawdbot is a revolutionary local AI agent that you can interact with through WhatsApp, Telegram, or iMessage to automate tasks, manage your schedule, and even write code. Unlike traditional apps, this self-improving assistant can install new skills, execute commands, and continuously expand its capabilities—offering a glimpse into a future where prompts replace apps as our primary interface. --- Source: [https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/22/clawdbot/](https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/22/clawdbot/) ### When Your Software Starts Driving You Instead of the Other Way Around Mike Swanson coins "backseat software" to describe how modern apps have shifted from being user-controlled tools to interruptive channels that operate on us. This transformation is driven by product metrics like DAU, retention, and gamification, showing that analytics often prove features were buried, not unwanted. A must-read for understanding why your software feels increasingly pushy. --- Source: [https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/22/backseat-software/](https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/22/backseat-software/) \n## Business ### Apple's John Ternus: The New Jony Ive Emerges as Future CEO Apple hardware chief John Ternus now oversees the company's entire design team, a role previously held only by Apple's most legendary figures including Jony Ive. This strategic move by Tim Cook signals Ternus is the leading candidate to replace Cook as CEO, placing him at the helm of both hardware and software design. --- Source: [https://www.macworld.com/article/3040394/apples-john-ternus-just-became-the-new-jony-ive.html](https://www.macworld.com/article/3040394/apples-john-ternus-just-became-the-new-jony-ive.html) ### Take Control of Your Monthly Subscription Spending Subscriptions have quietly taken over our digital lives, often draining our finances unnoticed. TidBITS invites you to audit your recurring payments through a simple five-question poll that helps tally your spending and compare habits with fellow readers. It's a practical opportunity to discover exactly where your money goes each month and see how your subscription footprint stacks up against others in the community. --- Source: [https://tidbits.com/2026/01/22/do-you-use-it-audit-your-subscriptions/](https://tidbits.com/2026/01/22/do-you-use-it-audit-your-subscriptions/) ### Vimeo Cuts 'Large Portion' of Staff After $1.38B Acquisition Vimeo is laying off a significant portion of its global workforce just months after Italian software company Bending Spoons acquired the platform for $1.38 billion. Former employees report that entire teams, including the entire video engineering department, were affected in what appears to be a massive restructuring following the buyout. --- Source: [https://www.theverge.com/news/866238/vimeo-layoffs-bending-spoons-acquisition](https://www.theverge.com/news/866238/vimeo-layoffs-bending-spoons-acquisition) ### TikTok USA: Abschluss der Überziehung näher gerückt Die notwendigen behördlichen Genehmigungen für den Verkauf von TikTok USA liegen vor – nach langen juristischen Auseinandersetzungen zeichnet sich der Abschluss der Transaktion ab. Der Wechsel der Eigentümerverhältnisse steht kurz bevor. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/TikT...](https://www.heise.de/news/TikTok-USA-Behoerdliche-Genehmigungen-fuer-Verkauf-sollen-fertig-sein-11151264.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/TikTok-USA-Behoerdliche-Genehmigungen-fuer-Verkauf-sollen-fertig-sein-11151264.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Telefon-AU: Warum sie nicht für den Anstieg der Krankmeldungen verantwortlich ist Die hohe Zahl an Krankmeldungen entfacht eine neue Debatte um die Telefon-AU. Experten analysieren, warum diese umstrittene Methode kaum ins Gewicht fällt und welche wirklichen Probleme hinter den steigenden AU-Fällen stecken. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/hintergru...](https://www.heise.de/hintergrund/Telefon-AU-Eine-kleine-Kennzahl-mit-grosser-Aufmerksamkeit-11150863.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/hintergrund/Telefon-AU-Eine-kleine-Kennzahl-mit-grosser-Aufmerksamkeit-11150863.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) \n## Entertainment ### Oscar Nominees Push Visual Effects Boundaries The Academy unveiled the five nominees for Best Visual Effects, featuring groundbreaking work from Avatar: Fire and Ash, F1, and Jurassic World Rebirth. Each nominated film showcases extraordinary technical achievements that blur reality and imagination, representing the pinnacle of modern cinema's visual innovation. --- Source: [https://beforesandafters.com/2026/01/23/here-are-the-vfx-oscar-nominees/](https://beforesandafters.com/2026/01/23/here-are-the-vfx-oscar-nominees/) ### Beyond Good & Evil 2 Miraculously Survives Ubisoft's Project Purge Despite being in development hell for 17 years and losing two creative directors, Beyond Good & Evil 2 has somehow survived Ubisoft's recent corporate restructuring that canceled other projects like Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake. Ubisoft insists the long-awaited sequel remains a priority as part of their open world adventure strategy. --- Source: [https://www.theverge.com/games/866439/beyond-good-and-evil-2-somehow-survived-the-purge-at-ubisoft](https://www.theverge.com/games/866439/beyond-good-and-evil-2-somehow-survived-the-purge-at-ubisoft) ### Geheimtipps 2025: Indie-Games, die Ihre Aufmerksamkeit verdienen Viele kreative Indie-Spiele bleiben unbeachtet, obwohl sie mit ungewöhnlichen Ideen und mutigen Experimenten beeindrucken. Dieser Artikel stellt die spannendsten Geheimtipps des Jahres 2025 vor, die abseits des Mainstreams warten und definitiv einen Blick wert sind. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/tests/Spi...](https://www.heise.de/tests/Spiele-die-mehr-Aufmerksamkeit-verdienen-Geheimtipps-abseits-des-Mainstreams-11077810.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag_plus.beitrag_plus](https://www.heise.de/tests/Spiele-die-mehr-Aufmerksamkeit-verdienen-Geheimtipps-abseits-des-Mainstreams-11077810.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag_plus.beitrag_plus)) ### Celebrating the 98th Oscar Nominees: A Toast to Cinematic Excellence The nominations for the 98th Academy Awards have been announced, recognizing outstanding achievements across the film industry. These prestigious nominations highlight the year's most remarkable performances, technical innovations, and storytelling that defined cinema in 2025. --- Source: [https://www.fxguide.com/quicktakes/congrats-to-the-98th-oscar-nominations/](https://www.fxguide.com/quicktakes/congrats-to-the-98th-oscar-nominations/) ### Apple's F1 Racing Film Scores Best Picture Oscar Nomination Apple's high-octane racing film F1, starring Brad Pitt, has earned a prestigious Best Picture nomination at the 2026 Academy Awards alongside five other total nominations for the tech giant. The film's historic theatrical run, generating over $631 million worldwide, marks Apple's most successful movie yet and cements its growing influence in Hollywood's awards season. --- Source: [https://www.macrumors.com/2026/01/22/f1-best-picture-nomination/](https://www.macrumors.com/2026/01/22/f1-best-picture-nomination/) \n## Science ### Drei heftige Sonneneruptionen in einem atemberaubenden Zeitraffer Die ESA-Sonden Proba-3 haben einen spektakulären Zeitraffer von drei aufeinanderfolgenden Sonneneruptionen eingefangen. Durch künstliche Sonnenfinsternisse können die Wissenschaftler die Korona unseres Heimatsterns bisher unerreicht genau erforschen. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/ESA-...](https://www.heise.de/news/ESA-Sonnensonden-Proba-3-Zeitraffer-zeigt-gleich-drei-heftige-Protuberanzen-11151073.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/ESA-Sonnensonden-Proba-3-Zeitraffer-zeigt-gleich-drei-heftige-Protuberanzen-11151073.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Schnelle Evolution: Neue Spezies entstehen nur 2000 Jahre nach Asteroideneinschlag Forschungen zeigen, dass sich die biologische Vielfalt auf der Erde nach dem Chicxulub-Asteroideneinschlag viel schneller erholte als bisher angenommen. Bereits nach nur 2.000 Jahren tauchten neue Spezies auf, was unser Verständnis davon revolutioniert, wie schnell das Leben nach massiven Vernichtungsereignissen zurückkehren kann. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Schn...](https://www.heise.de/news/Schnelle-Evolution-Neue-Spezies-erscheinen-2000-Jahre-nach-Chicxulub-Einschlag-11150979.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Schnelle-Evolution-Neue-Spezies-erscheinen-2000-Jahre-nach-Chicxulub-Einschlag-11150979.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Helgoland simuliert totalen Stromausfall Die Nordseeinsel Helgoland hat umfassende Notfallübungen durchgeführt, um auf den Ausfall des Seekabels vorbereitet zu sein. Bei dem realistischen Blackout-Szenario wurde getestet, wie die Inselversorgung ohne Strom auskommt und welche Maßnahmen im Ernstfall greifen. Die Übung zeigt, wie wichtig Katastrophenschutz für abgelegene Regionen ist. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Helg...](https://www.heise.de/news/Helgoland-probte-den-Blackout-11151057.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Helgoland-probte-den-Blackout-11151057.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Erneuerbare Energien überholen fossile Brennstoffe in der EU Ein historischer Wendepunkt: In mehr als der Hälfte der EU-Staaten tragen erneuerbare Energiequellen inzwischen mehr zum Strommix bei als fossile Brennstoffe. Besonders die Solarenergie verzeichnet starkes Wachstum und treibt die Energiewende voran – ein entscheidender Schritt hin zu einer nachhaltigeren Zukunft in Europa. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Trot...](https://www.heise.de/news/Trotz-Flaute-Solar-und-Windenergie-EU-weit-erstmals-vor-fossilen-Brennstoffen-11150451.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Trotz-Flaute-Solar-und-Windenergie-EU-weit-erstmals-vor-fossilen-Brennstoffen-11150451.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Deutschland investiert 30 Millionen für unabhängige Forschungsdaten Angesichts wachsender Unsicherheit in der US-Wissenschaftspolitik investiert die Bundesregierung 30 Millionen Euro in unabhängige Forschungsdateninfrastruktur. Diese strategische Maßnahme stärkt die EU-Datensouveränität und reduziert Abhängigkeiten von amerikanischen Plattformen. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Abzu...](https://www.heise.de/news/Abzug-aus-USA-Bund-gibt-30-Millionen-Euro-fuer-unabhaengige-Forschungsdaten-11150297.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Abzug-aus-USA-Bund-gibt-30-Millionen-Euro-fuer-unabhaengige-Forschungsdaten-11150297.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) \n## Sports ### The Best Hydration Packs for Day Hikers After nine years of testing, Wirecutter recommends the Osprey Skarab 18 and Skimmer 16 as the top hydration packs for day hikers. These well-made backpacks with built-in water reservoirs are reasonably priced and spacious enough to carry all the gear and water needed for a three-hour hike, making it easier to stay hydrated on the trail. --- Source: [[www.nytimes.com/wirecutte...](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/best-hydration-packs-for-day-hikers/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed](https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/best-hydration-packs-for-day-hikers/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=RSS%20Feed)) --- #### How This Newsletter Works This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that: 1. **Aggregates** content from 61 RSS feeds 2. **Filters** articles from the last 24 hours 3. **Categorizes** each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air) 4. **Detects similarities** and combines related stories 5. **Selects** the top 5 most interesting stories per category 6. **Summarizes** each story with AI (GLM-4.7) **Tech Stack**: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings. --- **Generated with ❤️ by n8n**
