items.title: The Daily News — 2026-01-22 Edition
items.content_html:
A curated selection of today’s most interesting stories from 61 RSS sources.

Technology

AI Leaders Discuss Future at Davos and Hint at Alien Life

Good discussion about the future of AI in this interview from Davos with Demis Hassabis and Dario Amodei. Although they ended on a sort of cliffhanger right as Demis started talking about the likelihood of extraterrestrial life, which now I’m curious about.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/good-discussion-about-the-future.html

Why Velocity Is Killing Our Ability to Discern Truth

Om Malik argues that modern digital systems reward speed over substance, flooding us with content that moves faster than truth. As AI threatens to accelerate this deluge, authentic human connections built over years may be our only defense against overwhelming noise.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/velocity-and-authenticity.html

Volvo EX60 Electric SUV Promises Impressive 500-Mile Range

A new extended advertisement showcases the Volvo EX60 electric vehicle and its remarkable 500-mile range capability. This positions the EX60 as a serious contender in the EV market, offering drivers significantly more freedom for long-distance travel without frequent charging stops.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/this-is-a-great-extended.html

Reviving Public Libraries: Could Government-Backed Search Transform Online Information Access?

Kagi proposes creating a government-backed, open search index that would restore the role public libraries historically played in providing non-discriminatory access to information. This innovative solution emerges from the recent Google antitrust ruling and could fundamentally transform how citizens access online knowledge, replacing commercial web search dominance with a public service model reminiscent of library principles.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/kagi-has-a-blog-post.html

Why Walmart Rejects Apple Pay: Data and Profits Over Convenience

Walmart refuses to accept any NFC payments in the US, including Apple Pay, because their proprietary Walmart Pay lets them build detailed customer profiles and avoid card network fees. Unlike Apple Pay which improves user experience, Walmart’s approach prioritizes their bottom line—though notably, they do accept contactless payments in Canada where customers demand it.

Source: https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/21/why-walmart-still-doesnt-support-apple-pay/ \n## Entertainment

Animated Anthology The House: Beautiful, Bonkers, and Creepy

Watched: The House. An anthology in three parts about the same house, directed and animated by different teams. The style and tone from first to second part was jarring. At times beautiful, at times bonkers and creepy.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/watched-the-house-an-anthology.html

Laika’s Wildwood: A Bold Celebration of Artistry Over Algorithms

Travis Knight champions Laika’s upcoming stop-motion feature ‘Wildwood’ as a testament to handmade filmmaking, declaring it ‘a celebration of artistry over algorithms.’ The film promises to deliver bold, surprising storytelling through meticulous handcrafted animation, offering audiences something uniquely alive in an era of digital production.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/travis-knight-in-the-press.html

Batman, Superman Fused Together in Wild New DC Comics Arc

DC Comics delivers two stellar issues this week: Batman/Superman: World’s Finest #47 features the heroes being fused into one being after Luthor and Joker merge, creating a Silver Age-inspired story with surprisingly emotional moments. Meanwhile, Catwoman #83 delivers intense action as Selina battles both the Court of Owls and Carmine Falcone in a locked-down facility.

Source: [geekdad.com/2026/01/d…

Nightwing #134: Dark Circus Games for Bludhaven’s Fate

Dick Grayson enters a twisted spirit realm circus in a chilling horror storyline from Dan Watters, where high-stakes games determine kidnapped children’s fates and Bludhaven’s survival. This issue blends disturbing supernatural visuals with psychological tension as Nightwing faces the Zanni in a devil’s bargain that could trap him forever.

Source: [geekdad.com/2026/01/r…

Superman Unlimited #9 Delivers Old-School Thrills With Modern Edge

Dan Slott returns to full scripting duties with an issue that masterfully channels 90s Superman storytelling, featuring Vicki Vale and a deadly Prankster threat. With Bruno Mannheim’s daughter controlling Intergang and a mysterious new villain, this comic delivers intense, character-driven action that prioritizes protecting civilians over superhero spectacle.

Source: [geekdad.com/2026/01/r… \n## Science

Veränderung ist möglich: Charakter ist kein Schicksal

Neurowissenschaftliche Studien zeigen, dass sich unsere Persönlichkeit in bestimmten Lebensphasen – mit 9, 32, 66 und sogar 83 Jahren – tatsächlich verändern lässt. Mit Bewusstsein, Übung und neuen Umgebungen können wir gezielt an uns arbeiten, obwohl Gene etwa die Hälfte unseres Charakters bestimmen.

Source: https://pm-wissen.com/psychologie/kann-man-seinen-charakter-aendern/

Climate Expert Fights to Restore Zillow’s Removed Risk Scores

Zillow removed climate risk data from its platform after California officials questioned flood model accuracy, leaving homebuyers without crucial information. Now a climate policy expert is working to restore this vital data, ensuring buyers can understand flood, fire, and heat risks before making one of life’s biggest financial decisions.

Source: https://arstechnica.com/science/2026/01/zillow-removed-climate-risk-scores-this-climate-expert-is-restoring-them/

US-Start-up Vast baut private Raumstation Haven-1 für 2027

Das US-Raumfahrtunternehmen Vast hat mit der Montage der Systeme in die Primärstruktur seiner Raumstation Haven-1 begonnen. Der Start der privaten Raumstation ist für das Jahr 2027 geplant und markiert einen wichtigen Schritt in der kommerziellen Raumfahrt.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/US-R…

James-Webb-Teleskop enthüllt bislang unsichtbare Details im Helixnebel

Das Weltraumteleskop James Webb hat den bekannten Helixnebel in nie dagewesener Detailfülle abgebildet und dabei bislang unsichtbare Strukturen freigelegt. Die Aufnahmen zeigen die letzten Atemzüge eines sterbenden Sterns und bieten Astronomen neue Erkenntnisse über planetarische Nebel.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Letz… \n## Politics

Judge Blocks FBI From Searching Journalist’s Seized Devices

A federal judge has temporarily halted the FBI’s search of devices seized from Washington Post reporter Hannah Natanson during a leak investigation. The ruling protects First Amendment-protected material as the Post challenges whether the government should return her personal and work devices altogether.

Source: https://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2026/01/judge-orders-stop-to-fbi-search-of-devices-seized-from-washington-post-reporter/

FCC Threatens Equal-Time Rule on Late-Night Talk Shows

The Trump-era FCC, led by Brendan Carr, warns that late-night and daytime talk shows may lose exemptions to the equal-time rule. This move targets alleged liberal bias and could pressure programs into booking more Republican candidates to comply with federal broadcasting requirements.

Source: https://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2026/01/trump-fcc-tries-to-get-more-republicans-on-late-night-and-daytime-talk-shows/

Österreichs Verfassungsgericht prüft Staatstrojaner auf Grundrechtsverletzung

Die österreichische Opposition hat eine Prüfung vor dem Verfassungsgerichtshof erzwungen, ob staatliche Malware Grundrechte beschneidet. Das Urteil könnte weitreichende Konsequenzen für die Überwachungspraxis und den Datenschutz haben.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Staa…

Führungszeugnis wird digital: BundID-Konto Pflicht für Antragstellung

Die Bundesregierung hat den Weg für digitale Führungszeugnisse frei gemacht. Künftig benötigen Bürger ein BundID-Konto, um das Dokument online zu beanfragen und abzurufen. Die Digitalisierung erleichtert besonders Ehrenamtlichen und Arbeitgebern den Zugang zu den geforderten Nachweisen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Digi… \n## Health

Custom mRNA Cancer Vaccine Shows 50% Risk Reduction in 5-Year Study

Moderna and Merck’s personalized mRNA vaccine reduced cancer recurrence and death risk by nearly half over five years when combined with standard immunotherapy in high-risk melanoma patients. The Phase 2 trial results align with earlier data, and a Phase 3 trial is already underway with enrollment complete.

Source: https://arstechnica.com/health/2026/01/mrna-cancer-vaccine-shows-protection-at-5-year-follow-up-moderna-and-merck-say/

These Kitchen Tools Finally Made Meal Prep Actually Easy

Struggling with meal prep? This roundup highlights essential kitchen tools that transform the dreaded weekly meal prep chore into a manageable routine. Discover the gadgets that can streamline your cooking process and make healthy eating infinitely easier.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/best-kitchen-tools-meal-prep-11888589

Finally, Crispy Air-Fryer French Fries Without the Fuss

This straightforward recipe delivers perfectly crispy air-fryer french fries without the complexity of traditional deep-frying methods. You’ll get satisfying results with minimal effort, making homemade fries accessible for any night of the week.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/air-fryer-french-fries-recipe-11889617

How to Store Garlic Confit Safely—and When to Toss It

Garlic confit is a delicious but potentially dangerous condiment if stored incorrectly. Learn the proper methods for safely storing garlic confit in your fridge or freezer, including key signs that indicate when it’s time to toss it. These essential food safety tips will help you enjoy this luxurious ingredient without risking foodborne illness.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/safe-garlic-confit-storage-11889561

Charité-Datenbank gestoppt: Datenschutzbedenken bremsen Großprojekt

Berlins oberste Datenschützerin hat die Pläne für eine Gesundheitsdatenbank der Charité scharf kritisiert und als „unverständlich“ bezeichnet. Wegen erheblicher Bedenken zur Anonymisierung sensibler Patientendaten ist das Projekt nun vorerst gestoppt worden. Der Fall wirft ein Schlaglicht auf die schwierige Balance zwischen medizinischer Datennutzung und Datenschutz im digitalen Zeitalter.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Wege… \n## Sports

Underdog Team Oblivion Shocks Esports World with Historic ALGS Championship Win

In a stunning upset, underdog team Oblivion defeated heavily favored Team Falcons to win the Apex Legends Global Series Year 5 Championship in Sapporo, Japan. The improbable victory, capped by a clutch final match performance, marks a historic moment in competitive esports as the team toppled the tournament’s top-ranked squad after three days of competition.

Source: https://www.polygon.com/apex-legends-globa-series-monsoon-interview/ \n## Crime

Man Impersonates ICE Agent to Steal PlayStation

A man allegedly impersonated an ICE agent to break into a home and attempted to steal a PlayStation in a bizarre crime. The unusual incident highlights the lengths criminals will go to acquire gaming consoles and raises concerns about impersonation crimes. Authorities are currently investigating the attempted theft and impersonation case.

Source: https://kotaku.com/fake-ice-agent-criminal-pretending-break-in-steal-ps5-playstation-teen-punch-crime-2000661943 \n## Business

Ubisoft Shuts Down Prince of Persia Remake Amid Major Studio Overhaul

Ubisoft is restructuring its entire organization into five Creative Houses, canceling the troubled Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time remake as part of the shift. The company will now focus on big open-world games and live service titles while accelerating investments in player-facing Generative AI technology.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/news/865060/ubisoft-prince-of-persia-sands-of-time-remake-canceled-reorganization

Netflix wächst dank Werbeabo auf 325 Millionen Nutzer

Netflix verzeichnet starkes Quartalsergebnis mit 325 Millionen Nutzern und über 12 Milliarden US-Dollar Umsatz. Der Streaming-Riese profitiert besonders von steigenden Werbeeinnahmen durch sein erfolgreiches Werbe-Abo-Modell.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Netf…

Sparkassen warnen vor digitalem Euro: Hohe Kosten ohne Nutzen

Der Sparkassen-Verbandspräsident Hirsch bezweifelt den Sinn des digitalen Euro und sieht hohe Kosten ohne echten Mehrwert für Kunden. Zudem werden Fragen zu möglichen Rollenkonflikten bei der Europäischen Zentralbank aufgeworfen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Spar…

Migration aufgedeckt: Diese Länder verlieren die meisten Menschen

Über 280 Millionen Menschen leben heute außerhalb ihrer Geburtsländer – doch welche Staaten verlieren die meisten Bürger? Während Deutschland mit 4,3 Millionen Auswanderern auf Platz 17 landet, dominieren asiatische Länder die Top Ten. Spannend: Die Migrationsrate ist oft nicht in den ärmsten Ländern am höchsten, da viele Menschen erst mit gewissen finanziellen Mitteln den Schritt ins Ausland wagen.

Source: https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/21/laender-meisten-auswanderer/

E-Auto-Prämie 2026: Subvention mit Makeln

Union und SPD einigen sich auf eine neue E-Auto-Förderung bis zu 6.000 Euro, rückwirkend ab Januar 2026. Kritiker bemängeln die Include ungünstiger Plug-in-Hybride und fehlender Unterstützung für Gebrauchtwagen. Die Subvention soll sozial gestaffelt werden, doch Experten zweifeln an ihrer Wirksamkeit für die deutsche Autoindustrie.

Source: https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/21/neue-e-auto-praemie-fehler/ \n## Home

Best Blackout Curtains Tested for Perfect Sleep

Wirecutter tested 35 blackout and room-darkening curtains to find the best options for blocking unwanted light. Their comprehensive research helps you achieve better sleep and uninterrupted naps by effectively blocking that pesky morning glare.

Source: [www.nytimes.com/wirecutte…

items.content_text: A curated selection of today's most interesting stories from 61 RSS sources. ## Technology ### AI Leaders Discuss Future at Davos and Hint at Alien Life Good discussion about the future of AI in this interview from Davos with Demis Hassabis and Dario Amodei. Although they ended on a sort of cliffhanger right as Demis started talking about the likelihood of extraterrestrial life, which now I'm curious about. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/good-discussion-about-the-future.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/good-discussion-about-the-future.html) ### Why Velocity Is Killing Our Ability to Discern Truth Om Malik argues that modern digital systems reward speed over substance, flooding us with content that moves faster than truth. As AI threatens to accelerate this deluge, authentic human connections built over years may be our only defense against overwhelming noise. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/velocity-and-authenticity.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/velocity-and-authenticity.html) ### Volvo EX60 Electric SUV Promises Impressive 500-Mile Range A new extended advertisement showcases the Volvo EX60 electric vehicle and its remarkable 500-mile range capability. This positions the EX60 as a serious contender in the EV market, offering drivers significantly more freedom for long-distance travel without frequent charging stops. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/this-is-a-great-extended.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/this-is-a-great-extended.html) ### Reviving Public Libraries: Could Government-Backed Search Transform Online Information Access? Kagi proposes creating a government-backed, open search index that would restore the role public libraries historically played in providing non-discriminatory access to information. This innovative solution emerges from the recent Google antitrust ruling and could fundamentally transform how citizens access online knowledge, replacing commercial web search dominance with a public service model reminiscent of library principles. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/kagi-has-a-blog-post.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/kagi-has-a-blog-post.html) ### Why Walmart Rejects Apple Pay: Data and Profits Over Convenience Walmart refuses to accept any NFC payments in the US, including Apple Pay, because their proprietary Walmart Pay lets them build detailed customer profiles and avoid card network fees. Unlike Apple Pay which improves user experience, Walmart's approach prioritizes their bottom line—though notably, they do accept contactless payments in Canada where customers demand it. --- Source: [https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/21/why-walmart-still-doesnt-support-apple-pay/](https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/21/why-walmart-still-doesnt-support-apple-pay/) \n## Entertainment ### Animated Anthology The House: Beautiful, Bonkers, and Creepy Watched: The House. An anthology in three parts about the same house, directed and animated by different teams. The style and tone from first to second part was jarring. At times beautiful, at times bonkers and creepy. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/watched-the-house-an-anthology.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/watched-the-house-an-anthology.html) ### Laika's Wildwood: A Bold Celebration of Artistry Over Algorithms Travis Knight champions Laika's upcoming stop-motion feature 'Wildwood' as a testament to handmade filmmaking, declaring it 'a celebration of artistry over algorithms.' The film promises to deliver bold, surprising storytelling through meticulous handcrafted animation, offering audiences something uniquely alive in an era of digital production. --- Source: [https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/travis-knight-in-the-press.html](https://www.manton.org/2026/01/21/travis-knight-in-the-press.html) ### Batman, Superman Fused Together in Wild New DC Comics Arc DC Comics delivers two stellar issues this week: Batman/Superman: World's Finest #47 features the heroes being fused into one being after Luthor and Joker merge, creating a Silver Age-inspired story with surprisingly emotional moments. Meanwhile, Catwoman #83 delivers intense action as Selina battles both the Court of Owls and Carmine Falcone in a locked-down facility. --- Source: [[geekdad.com/2026/01/d...](https://geekdad.com/2026/01/dc-this-week-roundup-masks/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=dc-this-week-roundup-masks](https://geekdad.com/2026/01/dc-this-week-roundup-masks/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=dc-this-week-roundup-masks)) ### Nightwing #134: Dark Circus Games for Bludhaven's Fate Dick Grayson enters a twisted spirit realm circus in a chilling horror storyline from Dan Watters, where high-stakes games determine kidnapped children's fates and Bludhaven's survival. This issue blends disturbing supernatural visuals with psychological tension as Nightwing faces the Zanni in a devil's bargain that could trap him forever. --- Source: [[geekdad.com/2026/01/r...](https://geekdad.com/2026/01/review-nightwing-134-circus-games/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=review-nightwing-134-circus-games](https://geekdad.com/2026/01/review-nightwing-134-circus-games/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=review-nightwing-134-circus-games)) ### Superman Unlimited #9 Delivers Old-School Thrills With Modern Edge Dan Slott returns to full scripting duties with an issue that masterfully channels 90s Superman storytelling, featuring Vicki Vale and a deadly Prankster threat. With Bruno Mannheim's daughter controlling Intergang and a mysterious new villain, this comic delivers intense, character-driven action that prioritizes protecting civilians over superhero spectacle. --- Source: [[geekdad.com/2026/01/r...](https://geekdad.com/2026/01/review-superman-unlimited-9-prank-war/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=review-superman-unlimited-9-prank-war](https://geekdad.com/2026/01/review-superman-unlimited-9-prank-war/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=review-superman-unlimited-9-prank-war)) \n## Science ### Veränderung ist möglich: Charakter ist kein Schicksal Neurowissenschaftliche Studien zeigen, dass sich unsere Persönlichkeit in bestimmten Lebensphasen – mit 9, 32, 66 und sogar 83 Jahren – tatsächlich verändern lässt. Mit Bewusstsein, Übung und neuen Umgebungen können wir gezielt an uns arbeiten, obwohl Gene etwa die Hälfte unseres Charakters bestimmen. --- Source: [https://pm-wissen.com/psychologie/kann-man-seinen-charakter-aendern/](https://pm-wissen.com/psychologie/kann-man-seinen-charakter-aendern/) ### Climate Expert Fights to Restore Zillow's Removed Risk Scores Zillow removed climate risk data from its platform after California officials questioned flood model accuracy, leaving homebuyers without crucial information. items.title: AI Playtime
items.content_html:
I’m having a blast catching up with the AI space. A lot has changed in the last three months since my surgery, and while it felt overwhelming at first, it’s just fun now.

I got myself the GLM Coding Plan for an insanely cheap price—1/10 the cost of a Claude subscription for nearly the same coding prowess. And I have yet to hit even their smallest plan’s limits.

I’m also playing with Automaker, and Goose is genuinely fun to use with GLM-4.7.

For creating project specs, I’ve been exploring AgentOS and DesignOS.

And of course, I’ve been tinkering with n8n running on my new Raspberry Pi 5—that’s been a blast too. It took me a while to figure out, but I’m planning to keep building interesting flows this year.
items.content_text:
I'm having a blast catching up with the AI space. A lot has changed in the last three months since my surgery, and while it felt overwhelming at first, it's just fun now.

I got myself the [GLM Coding Plan](https://z.ai/subscribe?ic=9MODNIDHPO) for an insanely cheap price—1/10 the cost of a Claude subscription for nearly the same coding prowess. And I have yet to hit even their smallest plan's limits.

I'm also playing with [Automaker](https://automaker.app), and [Goose](https://block.github.io/goose/) is genuinely fun to use with GLM-4.7.

For creating project specs, I've been exploring [AgentOS](https://buildermethods.com/agent-os) and [DesignOS](https://buildermethods.com/design-os).

And of course, I've been tinkering with [n8n](https://n8n.io) running on my new [Raspberry Pi 5](https://www.raspberrypi.com)—that's been a blast too. It took me a while to figure out, but I'm planning to keep building interesting flows this year.

items.title: The Daily News — 2026-01-21 Edition
items.content_html:
A curated selection of today’s most interesting stories from 61 RSS sources.

Technology

OpenAI’s Stargate: A Community-First Data Center Approach

OpenAI reveals details about its Stargate data center initiative, emphasizing a community-partnership approach that contrasts with xAI’s controversial Memphis deployment. The company outlines its commitment to being ‘good neighbors’ while addressing infrastructure challenges around electrical grids and water resources, signaling rapid progress on its massive AI infrastructure expansion.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/20/this-blog-post-from-openai.html

Micro.blog’s WordPress and Ghost Sync Almost Ready

Manton Reece has been testing WordPress and Ghost sync functionality for Micro.blog, describing it as “unlike anything out there” after deploying it to production. Despite the impressive progress, he’s putting the feature aside for a couple weeks to refine it further before a full release.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/20/i-hinted-a-few-times.html

The Daily Rhythm: Bug Fixes, Features, and Customer Support

The best way I can explain how I work: every day, I fix a bug, I work on a new feature, I reply to a customer. The balance isn’t perfect but it’s always all of these things. Keeps things moving forward.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/20/the-best-way-i-can.html

Micro.blog Inevitably Builds Open Feed Syncing API

Manton Reece reveals why Micro.blog is finally developing an open API for feed syncing, comparing it to Apple’s ecosystem of apps. Though he initially focused on indie microblogging after Google Reader’s demise, creating a feed syncing service became inevitable for a complete platform experience.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/20/after-google-reader-folks-asked.html

Mac Code Signing at 20: Apple’s Security Revolution

As Mac code signing marks its 20th anniversary, developers face ongoing challenges with certificate management and Apple’s evolving security policies. While Apple has improved timestamp handling for expired certificates, the developer experience remains frustrating, with unexplained certificate expirations and unreliable Keychain Access tools.

Source: https://mjtsai.com/blog/2026/01/20/mac-code-signing-at-20/ \n## Sports

Spurs Fall Short in Houston Despite Impressive Recent Run

Spurs lose a close one in Houston, but this team has been on a roll otherwise. Looking really good and fun to watch. I want to get down to San Antonio again soon. 🏀

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/20/spurs-lose-a-close-one.html

Why Football Could Collapse: America’s Operating System at Risk

Chuck Klosterman argues football isn’t just a sport—it’s America’s national operating system that permeates our culture and language. In this fascinating conversation, he explores the game’s unexpected rise to dominance and makes a compelling case for why football may be headed for a surprising, precipitous fall.

Source: https://www.artofmanliness.com/character/knowledge-of-men/podcast-1101-how-football-took-over-america-and-could-collapse/ \n## Politics

Choosing Empathy Over Extremism in Post-Trump Politics

Over the last year I’ve become hyper-sensitive to extremism. The lesson from Trumpism should be to do the opposite of whatever he does. Less hate, less judgement, less bullying. More empathy. I’m hopeful that whoever picks up leadership of the Democratic party will understand this. 🇺🇸

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/20/over-the-last-year-ive.html

EU jagt Huawei und Co aus kritischer Infrastruktur

Mit dem Cybersecurity Act 2 geht Brüssel hart gegen ‘Hochrisiko-Anbieter’ wie Huawei vor und will diese aus sensiblen IT-Bereichen verdrängen. Die neue EU-Regelung rüstet Unternehmen gleichzeitig besser gegen staatliche Cyberangriffe – ein entscheidender Schritt für digitale Souveränität in Europa.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Digi…

Datenschützer klagen gegen Staatstrojaner vor Europäischem Gerichtshof

Nach der Ablehnung durch das Bundesverfassungsgericht ziehen Bürgerrechtler vor den Europäischen Gerichtshof für Menschenrechte in Straßburg. Sie kämpfen gegen die umstrittenen Hacking-Befugnisse deutscher Geheimdienste und suchen nun europäischen Rechtsschutz. Dieser Schritt könnte weitreichende Folgen für die digitale Überwachung in Deutschland haben.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Staa…

Britisches Oberhaus will Social Media erst ab 16 Jahren erlauben

Das britische Oberhaus könnte schon am Mittwoch über ein Mindestalter von 16 Jahren für soziale Medien abstimmen. Unter wachsendem Druck aus dem Parlament hat die Regierung eine offizielle Konsultation zu diesem controversialen Thema versprochen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Brit…

DOGE Staffers Improperly Accessed Americans’ Private Social Security Data

The Trump administration admits DOGE employees broke protocols and accessed sensitive Social Security records beyond authorized limits. The staffers also maintained contact with an election fraud advocacy group, raising serious privacy and security concerns about Americans’ personal data.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/news/864643/doge-social-security-data-misuse \n## Entertainment

The Iconfactory Launches Ollie’s Arcade Kickstarter Campaign

The Iconfactory has launched a Kickstarter campaign for Ollie’s Arcade, offering nostalgic retro arcade games for iOS devices. The project aims to provide a pixelated refuge from modern stress, letting users unplug with simple, fun old-school games on iPhone and iPad.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/20/the-iconfactory-is-out-with.html

Comma Splices Versus Semicolons in Casual Writing

My short posts tend to cut corners so they flow a little more like informal thoughts. I wonder if I’ll one day regret all the intentional comma splices. The semicolon is sitting right there yet I reserve it for only the rare sentence, like it’s sacred punctuation that will draw attention to itself.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/19/my-short-posts-tend-to.html

Life is Strange Brings Max and Chloe Story to Emotional Conclusion

Deck Nine Games is creating ‘Reunion,’ a new Life is Strange game that will finally conclude the decade-long story of Max Caulfield and Chloe Price. Following 2024’s Double Exposure, this emotional conclusion gives players three days to prevent a devastating fire at their old school.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/games/864438/life-is-strange-reunion-release-date-max-chloe

Streaming-Rekord an Weihnachten: NFL und Stranger Things sorgten für historische Nutzungsdaten

An Weihnachten 2025 verzeichneten die USA den meistgestreamten Tag aller Zeiten. Die Rekordzahlen sind vor allem NFL-Spiele und das Finale von Stranger Things zurückzuführen, so die Marktforscher von Nielsen. Der erste Weihnachtstag übertraf alle bisherigen Streaming-Rekorde.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Mark…

Wie Fatboy Slim auf dem Atari ST Welt-Hits schuf

Der berühmte DJ Fatboy Slim hat seine größten Club-Hits auf einem Atari ST 520 aus den 1980er Jahren produziert – ein faszinierendes Stück Musikgeschichte. Der Beweis, dass kreative Vision wichtiger ist als die neueste Technologie.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Zahl… \n## Science

Stärkster Sonnensturm seit 2003: Spektakuläre Polarlichter und was jetzt folgt

In der Nacht vom 19. auf den 20. Januar sorgte der stärkste Sonnensturm seit über 20 Jahren für beeindruckende Polarlichter. Das astronomische Ereignis, das an die Stärke von 2003 heranreicht, lässt Experten nun vorsichtig sein: Die Sonnenaktivität könnte weitere Überraschungen bereithalten.

Source: https://www.spektrum.de/news/polarlichter-der-staerkste-sonnensturm-seit-2003/2305798

„Teenagerjahre von Planetensystemen“ erstmals abgebildet

Wissenschaftler haben es geschafft, dunkle Trümmerscheiben um Sterne zu fotografieren – die Phase, in der sich Exoplaneten bilden. Diese bisher schwer erforschbaren „Teenagerjahre“ von Planetensystemen geben neue Einblicke in die Entstehung fremder Welten.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Teen…

GPS-Pionierin Gladys West mit 95 Jahren verstorben

Die US-Mathematikerin Gladys West ist verstorben, deren Berechnungen der Erdmodelle die Grundlage für das moderne GPS-System bildeten. Ihre wegweisende Arbeit ermöglichte die präzise Positionsbestimmung per Satellit, die heute Milliarden von Menschen täglich nutzen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Math…

Seltene Polarlichter über ganz Deutschland zu sehen

Ein starker Sonnensturm sorgte in der Nacht zum Dienstag für ein spektakuläres Naturphänomen: Polarlichter waren bis weit in den Süden Deutschlands sichtbar. Das Himmelschauspiel bot eine seltene Gelegenheit, das normalerweise in polaren Regionen beobachtete Schauspiel hierzulande zu bestaunen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Heft…

Webb Telescope’s Breathtaking New View of the Eye of Sauron Nebula

The Webb Space Telescope has captured a spectacular new view of the famous Helix Nebula, nicknamed the “Eye of Sauron” for its striking appearance. Located just 655 light-years from Earth, this planetary nebula—formed by dying stars shedding their outer layers—has never been seen with such incredible clarity and detail.

Source: https://arstechnica.com/space/2026/01/webb-has-given-us-with-a-stunning-new-view-of-a-well-known-planetary-nebula/ \n## Health

CDC Warns Flesh-Eating Screwworm Flies Approaching Texas Border

The CDC has issued a health alert as flesh-eating New World Screwworm flies advance toward Texas, already infecting animals in Mexico’s Tamaulipas state. These parasitic flies lay up to 400 eggs in wounds, and their maggots burrow into living flesh, twisting like screws as they eat their victims alive.

Source: https://arstechnica.com/health/2026/01/be-on-the-lookout-for-flesh-eating-flies-cdc-tells-clinicians-in-alert/

14 Weeknight Chicken Dinners That Actually Feel New Again

Say goodbye to dinner fatigue with 14 fresh chicken recipes perfect for busy weeknights. From easy sheet-pan meals to comforting soups, these practical dishes bring excitement back to your dinner rotation without the hassle.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/weeknight-chicken-dinner-recipes-11889154

5-Ingredient Black Bean Soup Ready in Under 30 Minutes

Create a hearty, satisfying black bean soup with rich, smoky flavor using just five ingredients. This simple recipe delivers maximum taste with minimal effort, making it perfect for busy weeknights when you need a nutritious meal in a hurry.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/5-ingredient-black-bean-soup-recipe-11888713

EU-Zugriff auf Patientenakte: Psychotherapeuten warnen vor Datenabruf

Im Streit um die EU-weite E‑Evidenzverordnung fordern psychologische und therapeutische Verbände den Schutz der ärztlichen Schweigepflicht bei Zugriffen auf elektronische Patientendaten. Sie warnen davor, dass EU-Behörden sensible Gesundheitsdaten abrufen könnten, wenn die nationale Schweigepficht nicht durchgesetzt wird.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Psyc… \n## Business

Netflix’s Ad Revenue Doubles to $1.5 Billion, Eyes $3B in 2026

Netflix’s advertising business has exploded, more than doubling its revenue to $1.5 billion in 2025. The streaming giant expects another doubling to $3 billion in 2026, fueled by rapid growth in its ad-supported tier which now reaches over 94 million monthly subscribers.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/news/864451/netflix-advertising-revenue-doubled-q4-2025-earnings

FTC Appeals Meta Antitrust Case After Court Setback

The Federal Trade Commission will appeal its landmark antitrust loss against Meta, after a federal judge ruled the government failed to prove Meta held an illegal monopoly in social networking. The court noted the FTC faced challenges defining the relevant market, complicated by TikTok’s rise and market changes during the five-year legal battle.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/news/864622/ftc-meta-antitrust-ruling-appeal

KI-Revolution ausgeblieben: Warum Unternehmen von KI enttäuscht sind

KI sollte die große Produktivitätsrevolution entfachen, aber bisher zeigen sich in den Unternehmen enttäuschende Ergebnisse. Während CEOs große Erwartungen hatten, sieht die Mehrheit der Firmen bisher keinen spürbaren Effekt durch den Einsatz von künstlicher Intelligenz.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/KI-e…

Sony gibt Kontrolle über TV-Geschäft an China ab

Sony und der chinesische Hersteller TCL planen ein strategisches Joint-Venture. Während Sonys Markenname erhalten bleibt, werden die Produktion und Führung der Fernseher und Home-Entertainment-Geräte künftig unter chinesischer Leitung stehen – ein bedeutender Schritt in der weltweiten Elektronikindustrie.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Sony…

Netflix erhöht das Gebot für Warner Bros. mit mehr Bargeld

Netflix legt im Wettbwerb um Warner Bros. ein verbessertes Angebot vor und ersetzt geplante Aktienanteile durch mehr Bargeld für die Warner-Aktionäre. Diese strategische Anpassung zeigt, wie ernst Netflix die Übernahme nimmt und könnte den entscheidenden Vorteil im Bieterwettstreit bringen.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Netf…

How This Newsletter Works

This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that:

  1. Aggregates content from 61 RSS feeds
  2. Filters articles from the last 24 hours
  3. Categorizes each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air)
  4. Detects similarities and combines related stories
  5. Selects the top 5 most interesting stories per category
  6. Summarizes each story with AI (GLM-4.7)

Tech Stack: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings.

Generated with ❤️ by n8n

Das Himmelschauspiel bot eine seltene Gelegenheit, das normalerweise in polaren Regionen beobachtete Schauspiel hierzulande zu bestaunen. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Heft...](https://www.heise.de/news/Heftiger-Sonnensturm-perfektes-Wetter-Polarlichter-ueber-ganz-Deutschland-11146765.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Heftiger-Sonnensturm-perfektes-Wetter-Polarlichter-ueber-ganz-Deutschland-11146765.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Webb Telescope's Breathtaking New View of the Eye of Sauron Nebula The Webb Space Telescope has captured a spectacular new view of the famous Helix Nebula, nicknamed the "Eye of Sauron" for its striking appearance. Located just 655 light-years from Earth, this planetary nebula—formed by dying stars shedding their outer layers—has never been seen with such incredible clarity and detail. --- Source: [https://arstechnica.com/space/2026/01/webb-has-given-us-with-a-stunning-new-view-of-a-well-known-planetary-nebula/](https://arstechnica.com/space/2026/01/webb-has-given-us-with-a-stunning-new-view-of-a-well-known-planetary-nebula/) \n## Health ### CDC Warns Flesh-Eating Screwworm Flies Approaching Texas Border The CDC has issued a health alert as flesh-eating New World Screwworm flies advance toward Texas, already infecting animals in Mexico's Tamaulipas state. These parasitic flies lay up to 400 eggs in wounds, and their maggots burrow into living flesh, twisting like screws as they eat their victims alive. --- Source: [https://arstechnica.com/health/2026/01/be-on-the-lookout-for-flesh-eating-flies-cdc-tells-clinicians-in-alert/](https://arstechnica.com/health/2026/01/be-on-the-lookout-for-flesh-eating-flies-cdc-tells-clinicians-in-alert/) ### 14 Weeknight Chicken Dinners That Actually Feel New Again Say goodbye to dinner fatigue with 14 fresh chicken recipes perfect for busy weeknights. From easy sheet-pan meals to comforting soups, these practical dishes bring excitement back to your dinner rotation without the hassle. --- Source: [https://www.seriouseats.com/weeknight-chicken-dinner-recipes-11889154](https://www.seriouseats.com/weeknight-chicken-dinner-recipes-11889154) ### 5-Ingredient Black Bean Soup Ready in Under 30 Minutes Create a hearty, satisfying black bean soup with rich, smoky flavor using just five ingredients. This simple recipe delivers maximum taste with minimal effort, making it perfect for busy weeknights when you need a nutritious meal in a hurry. --- Source: [https://www.seriouseats.com/5-ingredient-black-bean-soup-recipe-11888713](https://www.seriouseats.com/5-ingredient-black-bean-soup-recipe-11888713) ### EU-Zugriff auf Patientenakte: Psychotherapeuten warnen vor Datenabruf Im Streit um die EU-weite E‑Evidenzverordnung fordern psychologische und therapeutische Verbände den Schutz der ärztlichen Schweigepflicht bei Zugriffen auf elektronische Patientendaten. Sie warnen davor, dass EU-Behörden sensible Gesundheitsdaten abrufen könnten, wenn die nationale Schweigepficht nicht durchgesetzt wird. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Psyc...](https://www.heise.de/news/Psychologische-und-therapeutische-Verbaende-fordern-besseren-Schutz-der-ePA-Daten-11147250.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Psychologische-und-therapeutische-Verbaende-fordern-besseren-Schutz-der-ePA-Daten-11147250.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) \n## Business ### Netflix's Ad Revenue Doubles to $1.5 Billion, Eyes $3B in 2026 Netflix's advertising business has exploded, more than doubling its revenue to $1.5 billion in 2025. The streaming giant expects another doubling to $3 billion in 2026, fueled by rapid growth in its ad-supported tier which now reaches over 94 million monthly subscribers. --- Source: [https://www.theverge.com/news/864451/netflix-advertising-revenue-doubled-q4-2025-earnings](https://www.theverge.com/news/864451/netflix-advertising-revenue-doubled-q4-2025-earnings) ### FTC Appeals Meta Antitrust Case After Court Setback The Federal Trade Commission will appeal its landmark antitrust loss against Meta, after a federal judge ruled the government failed to prove Meta held an illegal monopoly in social networking. The court noted the FTC faced challenges defining the relevant market, complicated by TikTok's rise and market changes during the five-year legal battle. --- Source: [https://www.theverge.com/news/864622/ftc-meta-antitrust-ruling-appeal](https://www.theverge.com/news/864622/ftc-meta-antitrust-ruling-appeal) ### KI-Revolution ausgeblieben: Warum Unternehmen von KI enttäuscht sind KI sollte die große Produktivitätsrevolution entfachen, aber bisher zeigen sich in den Unternehmen enttäuschende Ergebnisse. Während CEOs große Erwartungen hatten, sieht die Mehrheit der Firmen bisher keinen spürbaren Effekt durch den Einsatz von künstlicher Intelligenz. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/KI-e...](https://www.heise.de/news/KI-enttaeuscht-bislang-die-CEO-Hoffnungen-11147892.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/KI-enttaeuscht-bislang-die-CEO-Hoffnungen-11147892.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Sony gibt Kontrolle über TV-Geschäft an China ab Sony und der chinesische Hersteller TCL planen ein strategisches Joint-Venture. Während Sonys Markenname erhalten bleibt, werden die Produktion und Führung der Fernseher und Home-Entertainment-Geräte künftig unter chinesischer Leitung stehen – ein bedeutender Schritt in der weltweiten Elektronikindustrie. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Sony...](https://www.heise.de/news/Sony-will-Kontrolle-ueber-TV-Geschaeft-nach-China-abgeben-11147738.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Sony-will-Kontrolle-ueber-TV-Geschaeft-nach-China-abgeben-11147738.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Netflix erhöht das Gebot für Warner Bros. mit mehr Bargeld Netflix legt im Wettbwerb um Warner Bros. ein verbessertes Angebot vor und ersetzt geplante Aktienanteile durch mehr Bargeld für die Warner-Aktionäre. Diese strategische Anpassung zeigt, wie ernst Netflix die Übernahme nimmt und könnte den entscheidenden Vorteil im Bieterwettstreit bringen. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Netf...](https://www.heise.de/news/Netflix-mit-verbessertem-Angebot-fuer-Warner-Bros-11147554.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Netflix-mit-verbessertem-Angebot-fuer-Warner-Bros-11147554.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) --- #### How This Newsletter Works This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that: 1. **Aggregates** content from 61 RSS feeds 2. **Filters** articles from the last 24 hours 3. **Categorizes** each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air) 4. **Detects similarities** and combines related stories 5. **Selects** the top 5 most interesting stories per category 6. **Summarizes** each story with AI (GLM-4.7) **Tech Stack**: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings. --- **Generated with ❤️ by n8n**

items.title: The Daily News — 2026-01-20 Edition
items.content_html:
A curated selection of today’s most interesting stories from 61 RSS sources.

Entertainment

Avatar 3 Stuns While Servers Crash Under Traffic Load

A blogger shares their experience watching Avatar 3, describing the film as overwhelming in its beauty and spectacle. However, during their time at the theater, Micro.blog’s servers were simultaneously being overwhelmed by traffic, creating an ironic contrast between on-screen and online technological demands.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/18/were-on-a-roll-with.html

The Simplest Quest Model That Powers Every Great RPG Adventure

The most effective RPG quests start with just three elements: an NPC, a location, and an action. Sly Flourish breaks down this elegant framework that game masters can instantly expand using random tables and their own creativity to build compelling adventures.

Source: [slyflourish.com/simplest_…

Why You Need to Listen to Cosmic Horror-Comedy Podcast Welcome to Night Vale

Spanning 14 years, 12 seasons, and over 280 episodes, Welcome to Night Vale stands as the longest continually running fiction podcast. This cosmic horror-comedy follows the bizarre happenings of a desert town, expanding into books and live shows that will quickly hook any listener who dives in.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/column/864078/cosmic-horror-comedy-podcast-welcome-to-night-vale

„Die größten Player der Zukunft“ – warum YouTube so wächst

YouTube ist fast unbemerkt zum Superstar aufgestiegen und steht am Anfang eines der größten Umbrüche in der Unterhaltungsbranche. Die Plattform entwickelt sich zu einem der wichtigsten Player der Zukunft und verändert, wie wir Medien konsumieren.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Die-…

Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal Serves Up New Comic Fuzz

The latest SMBC comic titled ‘Fuzz’ delivers the brand’s signature wit and humor, complete with a bonus panel featuring clever hovertext about making sauce. This daily webcomic continues to blend intelligent commentary with quirky observations, keeping readers entertained with its unique take on everyday life and absurd scenarios.

Source: https://www.smbc-comics.com/comic/fuzz \n## Politics

Born Too Early: Why Our Grandchildren Will Have It Better

The author reflects on growing up in the 20th century without realizing their family’s poverty, expressing optimism that future generations will have significantly better lives. Despite recent setbacks to social progress over the past decade, they believe the future will be much brighter for our grandchildren—even if it means feeling like they were “born too early” to witness it firsthand.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/18/i-always-thought-i-was.html

EU plant harte Verbote gegen Huawei und ZTE bei kritischer Infrastruktur

Die EU bereitet ein neues Cybersicherheitsgesetz vor, das chinesische Anbieter wie Huawei und ZTE von kritischen Netzwerken und Solarprojekten ausschließen würde. Dieser Schritt markiert eine deutliche Verschärfung im Umgang mit chinesischer Technologie und unterstreicht die wachsenden Sicherheitsbedenken der Europäer im Bereich der kritischen Infrastruktur.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Beri… \n## Technology

The Joy of Switching Between Bug Fixes and New Features

A developer reflects on the satisfying rhythm of alternating between bug fixing and building new features. Working with Micro.blog’s established API infrastructure offers the best of both worlds: the excitement of fresh projects combined with the foundation of years of development work.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/18/going-back-and-forth-between.html

Threads Surpasses X in Global Daily Mobile Users

Meta’s Threads has reportedly overtaken X with 141.5 million daily mobile users worldwide, marking a significant milestone almost three years after launch. However, X maintains its lead in the US market despite Threads’ steady international growth.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/news/864099/threads-overtakes-x-daily-mobile-ios-android-users

10 Best Buy Deals You Should Grab Before January 19th

Best Buy’s Winter Sale features major discounts on premium tech, including $1,500 off LG’s 77-inch B5 OLED TV and $900 off Sony’s award-winning Bravia 8 II. You can also save on top-rated gear like Bose QuietComfort Ultra headphones, Amazfit’s best fitness tracker, and the 13-inch MacBook Air—all matching their best prices to date.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/gadgets/863660/best-buy-winter-sale-2026-oled-tvs-headphones-fitness-trackers-deal-sale

Korg Kaoss Pad V Arrives: First Major Upgrade in 13 Years

Korg has finally updated its iconic touch-based effects unit with the Kaoss Pad V, the first major upgrade since 2013. The new model features innovative dual-finger recognition, allowing musicians to simultaneously control two different parameters or effects, plus a dedicated voice effects engine for enhanced performance possibilities.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/news/864003/korg-kaoss-pad-v-namm

How Elon Musk’s ‘Rebellious’ Grok AI Became a Deepfake Disaster

Elon Musk’s xAI launched Grok in 2023 as a chatbot with ‘a rebellious streak’ designed to answer spicy questions other AI systems would reject. This deliberately unconstrained approach, born from Musk’s AI FOMO and crusade against ‘wokeness,’ made deepfake abuses and misuse inevitable from the start.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/column/863502/grok-deepfake-musk \n## Health

Why Chicken Thighs Often Turn Out Tough—and How to Get Them Tender and Juicy

Serious Eats reveals the surprising secret to perfectly tender chicken thighs: overcook them. This counterintuitive method transforms the meat into fall-apart, juicy perfection. Home cooks can now achieve restaurant-quality results by understanding how temperature affects the texture of chicken thighs.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/chicken-thigh-temperature-technique-11887963

Make-Ahead Cheesy Sausage Breakfast Casserole Saves Your Morning

This hearty breakfast casserole combines eggs, vegetables, cheese, and sausage in one convenient dish that can be prepared up to 24 hours in advance. Perfect for busy mornings or feeding a crowd, it’s a simple, satisfying meal that tastes even better when you’re not rushing to make it.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/cheesy-sausage-breakfast-casserole-11887872

Why Shaving at Night Might Be Better Than Your Morning Routine

Switching to nighttime shaving offers compelling benefits: you can take your time for a closer, more comfortable shave, save precious morning minutes, and let your face heal overnight instead of sporting red, irritated skin at work. Science suggests hair grows slower at night, meaning you might wake up looking fresher than expected.

Source: https://www.artofmanliness.com/style/shaving/the-case-for-shaving-at-night/ \n## Business

How Coinbase Sabotaged the Crypto Industry’s Biggest Political Win

The CLARITY Act, a landmark bill that would have established clear regulatory frameworks for cryptocurrency in the US, was poised to pass with bipartisan support. Coinbase’s actions disrupted this critical legislation, deriling decades of political progress and leaving the crypto industry’s legal future in limbo.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/policy/864008/senate-clarity-act-coinbase-crypto-market

Apple Card wechselt von Goldman Sachs zu JPMorgan

Apple beendet die unglückliche Partnerschaft mit Goldman Sachs und übergibt die Apple Card an die US-Großbank JPMorgan. Insider bezeichnen die Trennung als das Ende einer ‘unglücklichen Ehe’ – ein strategischer Schachzug, der die Kreditkarte mit etablierter Bankexpertise stärken soll.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Appl…

E-Auto-Förderung neu konzipiert: Soziale Komponente und Industry-Hilfe

Die Bundesregierung plant die E-Auto-Förderung mit sozialem Fokus neu und erwartet eine exponentielle Steigerung der Verkäufe. Die Neuregelung soll sowohl sozialere Mobilität ermöglichen als auch die heimische Autoindustrie unterstützen. Details zur Antragstellung und Förderhöhe wurden nun vom Umweltministerium konkretisiert.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Wie-…

E-Auto-Prämie erlebt Comeback für bestimmte Haushalte

Die Bundesregierung hat nach hitzigen Debatten eine neue Kaufprämie für Elektroautos und Plug-in-Hybride vorgestellt. Die Unterstützung soll gezielt bestimmten Haushalten zugutekommen und könnte die Elektromobilität imImportant Land wieder ankurbeln.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Rena…

Wärmepumpe mit einem Klick: Was hinter den Angeboten von Ikea, Obi und Toom steckt

Ikea, Obi und Toom machen es Verbrauchern leicht: Wärmepumpen-Komplettpakete aus einer Hand. Doch Vorsicht – wir zeigen, welche Partner tatsächlich dahinterstecken und worauf Sie bei den Angeboten achten sollten, um nicht teuer darauf hereinzufallen.

Source: [www.heise.de/ratgeber/… \n## Science

Chinesische Raumfähre Shenzhou 20 kehrt beschädigt zur Erde zurück

Das chinesische Raumschiff Shenzhou 20 ist sicher auf der Erde angekommen, allerdings ohne Crew an Bord. Grund war ein vermuteter Schaden an einem Fenster, der zur Vorsichtsmaßnahme führte, die Astronauten nicht mit dem beschädigten Fahrzeug zur Erde zurückkehren zu lassen. Der Vorfall unterstreicht die Bedeutung strenger Sicherheitsprotokolle in der bemannten Raumfahrt.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Besc…

Klimarisiko-Index enthüllt: Diese deutschen Regionen sind am stärksten bedroht

Wissenschaftler haben einen neuen Klimarisiko-Index entwickelt, der 400 deutsche Kreise und Städte auf ihre Anfälligkeit für extreme Wetterereignisse bis 2050 untersucht. Während Küstenregionen wie Friesland besonders durch Sturmfluten gefährdet sind, gelten Städte wie Kempten im Allgäu als vergleichsweise sicher.

Source: https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/18/klimawandel-deutschen-regionen-besonders-bedroht/ \n## Environment

Neuwagen verbrauchen weniger – E-Autos sind entscheidend für Klimaziele

Fast alle Hersteller konnten den durchschnittlichen Verbrauch ihrer Neuwagen im vergangenen Jahr senken – ein positiver Trend für die Umwelt. Doch die kommenden Klimaziele lassen sich ohne deutlich mehr Elektrofahrzeuge nicht erreichen. Der Fortschritt bei Verbrennern reicht allein nicht aus.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Durc…

How This Newsletter Works

This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that:

  1. Aggregates content from 61 RSS feeds
  2. Filters articles from the last 24 hours
  3. Categorizes each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air)
  4. Detects similarities and combines related stories
  5. Selects the top 5 most interesting stories per category
  6. Summarizes each story with AI (GLM-4.7)

Tech Stack: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings.

Generated with ❤️ by n8n

Home cooks can now achieve restaurant-quality results by understanding how temperature affects the texture of chicken thighs. --- Source: [https://www.seriouseats.com/chicken-thigh-temperature-technique-11887963](https://www.seriouseats.com/chicken-thigh-temperature-technique-11887963) ### Make-Ahead Cheesy Sausage Breakfast Casserole Saves Your Morning This hearty breakfast casserole combines eggs, vegetables, cheese, and sausage in one convenient dish that can be prepared up to 24 hours in advance. Perfect for busy mornings or feeding a crowd, it's a simple, satisfying meal that tastes even better when you're not rushing to make it. --- Source: [https://www.seriouseats.com/cheesy-sausage-breakfast-casserole-11887872](https://www.seriouseats.com/cheesy-sausage-breakfast-casserole-11887872) ### Why Shaving at Night Might Be Better Than Your Morning Routine Switching to nighttime shaving offers compelling benefits: you can take your time for a closer, more comfortable shave, save precious morning minutes, and let your face heal overnight instead of sporting red, irritated skin at work. Science suggests hair grows slower at night, meaning you might wake up looking fresher than expected. --- Source: [https://www.artofmanliness.com/style/shaving/the-case-for-shaving-at-night/](https://www.artofmanliness.com/style/shaving/the-case-for-shaving-at-night/) \n## Business ### How Coinbase Sabotaged the Crypto Industry's Biggest Political Win The CLARITY Act, a landmark bill that would have established clear regulatory frameworks for cryptocurrency in the US, was poised to pass with bipartisan support. Coinbase's actions disrupted this critical legislation, deriling decades of political progress and leaving the crypto industry's legal future in limbo. --- Source: [https://www.theverge.com/policy/864008/senate-clarity-act-coinbase-crypto-market](https://www.theverge.com/policy/864008/senate-clarity-act-coinbase-crypto-market) ### Apple Card wechselt von Goldman Sachs zu JPMorgan Apple beendet die unglückliche Partnerschaft mit Goldman Sachs und übergibt die Apple Card an die US-Großbank JPMorgan. Insider bezeichnen die Trennung als das Ende einer 'unglücklichen Ehe' – ein strategischer Schachzug, der die Kreditkarte mit etablierter Bankexpertise stärken soll. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Appl...](https://www.heise.de/news/Apple-Card-Hintergruende-zur-Uebernahme-durch-JPMorgan-11143213.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Apple-Card-Hintergruende-zur-Uebernahme-durch-JPMorgan-11143213.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### E-Auto-Förderung neu konzipiert: Soziale Komponente und Industry-Hilfe Die Bundesregierung plant die E-Auto-Förderung mit sozialem Fokus neu und erwartet eine exponentielle Steigerung der Verkäufe. Die Neuregelung soll sowohl sozialere Mobilität ermöglichen als auch die heimische Autoindustrie unterstützen. Details zur Antragstellung und Förderhöhe wurden nun vom Umweltministerium konkretisiert. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Wie-...](https://www.heise.de/news/Wie-bekomme-ich-E-Auto-Foerderung-Ministerium-gibt-Details-bekannt-11145697.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Wie-bekomme-ich-E-Auto-Foerderung-Ministerium-gibt-Details-bekannt-11145697.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### E-Auto-Prämie erlebt Comeback für bestimmte Haushalte Die Bundesregierung hat nach hitzigen Debatten eine neue Kaufprämie für Elektroautos und Plug-in-Hybride vorgestellt. Die Unterstützung soll gezielt bestimmten Haushalten zugutekommen und könnte die Elektromobilität imImportant Land wieder ankurbeln. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Rena...](https://www.heise.de/news/Renaissance-der-E-Auto-Praemie-fuer-einige-Haushalte-11145348.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Renaissance-der-E-Auto-Praemie-fuer-einige-Haushalte-11145348.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Wärmepumpe mit einem Klick: Was hinter den Angeboten von Ikea, Obi und Toom steckt Ikea, Obi und Toom machen es Verbrauchern leicht: Wärmepumpen-Komplettpakete aus einer Hand. Doch Vorsicht – wir zeigen, welche Partner tatsächlich dahinterstecken und worauf Sie bei den Angeboten achten sollten, um nicht teuer darauf hereinzufallen. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/ratgeber/...](https://www.heise.de/ratgeber/Waermepumpe-mit-einem-Klick-Was-hinter-Angeboten-von-Ikea-Obi-und-Toom-steckt-11141632.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag_plus.beitrag_plus](https://www.heise.de/ratgeber/Waermepumpe-mit-einem-Klick-Was-hinter-Angeboten-von-Ikea-Obi-und-Toom-steckt-11141632.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag_plus.beitrag_plus)) \n## Science ### Chinesische Raumfähre Shenzhou 20 kehrt beschädigt zur Erde zurück Das chinesische Raumschiff Shenzhou 20 ist sicher auf der Erde angekommen, allerdings ohne Crew an Bord. Grund war ein vermuteter Schaden an einem Fenster, der zur Vorsichtsmaßnahme führte, die Astronauten nicht mit dem beschädigten Fahrzeug zur Erde zurückkehren zu lassen. Der Vorfall unterstreicht die Bedeutung strenger Sicherheitsprotokolle in der bemannten Raumfahrt. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Besc...](https://www.heise.de/news/Beschaedigte-Raumfaehre-Shenzhou-20-kehrt-unbemannt-zur-Erde-zurueck-11145945.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Beschaedigte-Raumfaehre-Shenzhou-20-kehrt-unbemannt-zur-Erde-zurueck-11145945.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Klimarisiko-Index enthüllt: Diese deutschen Regionen sind am stärksten bedroht Wissenschaftler haben einen neuen Klimarisiko-Index entwickelt, der 400 deutsche Kreise und Städte auf ihre Anfälligkeit für extreme Wetterereignisse bis 2050 untersucht. Während Küstenregionen wie Friesland besonders durch Sturmfluten gefährdet sind, gelten Städte wie Kempten im Allgäu als vergleichsweise sicher. --- Source: [https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/18/klimawandel-deutschen-regionen-besonders-bedroht/](https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/18/klimawandel-deutschen-regionen-besonders-bedroht/) \n## Environment ### Neuwagen verbrauchen weniger – E-Autos sind entscheidend für Klimaziele Fast alle Hersteller konnten den durchschnittlichen Verbrauch ihrer Neuwagen im vergangenen Jahr senken – ein positiver Trend für die Umwelt. Doch die kommenden Klimaziele lassen sich ohne deutlich mehr Elektrofahrzeuge nicht erreichen. Der Fortschritt bei Verbrennern reicht allein nicht aus. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Durc...](https://www.heise.de/news/Durchschnittsverbrauch-von-Neuwagen-sinkt-11145750.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Durchschnittsverbrauch-von-Neuwagen-sinkt-11145750.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) --- #### How This Newsletter Works This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that: 1. **Aggregates** content from 61 RSS feeds 2. **Filters** articles from the last 24 hours 3. **Categorizes** each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air) 4. **Detects similarities** and combines related stories 5. **Selects** the top 5 most interesting stories per category 6. **Summarizes** each story with AI (GLM-4.7) **Tech Stack**: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings. --- **Generated with ❤️ by n8n**

items.title: The Daily News — 2026-01-18 Edition
items.content_html:
A curated selection of today’s most interesting stories from 61 RSS sources.

Entertainment

All You Need Is Kill Deserves More Adaptations

The author revisited ‘All You Need Is Kill,’ the source material behind the beloved film ‘Edge of Tomorrow.’ The story’s innovative time-loop mechanics and compelling sci-fi elements create perfect opportunities for expanded universe content. Fans would eagerly welcome more adaptations exploring this rich, action-packed world.

Source: https://www.manton.org/2026/01/17/watched-all-you-need-is.html

How Edge of Tomorrow Masterfully Adapted Japanese Sci-Fi

The Verge examines why 2014’s Edge of Tomorrow stands out as one of Hollywood’s rare successful manga adaptations. Despite deviating from Hiroshi Sakurazaka’s All You Need Is Kill, the film captured the original story’s imaginative spirit and powerful themes of perseverance through its time-loop narrative structure.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/entertainment/862881/all-you-need-is-kill-review

Our Favorite Cozy Game Returns

The Verge’s Installer newsletter celebrates the return of a beloved cozy gaming title, offering readers a comforting escape perfect for cold January days. Alongside gaming recommendations, this week’s edition features curated picks including binge-worthy TV shows like The Pitt and The Night Manager, plus smart home tech tips and entertainment finds to brighten your winter routine.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/tech/863614/animal-crossing-3-rip-netflix-cowork-installer

Netflix beruhigt Kino-Betreiber nach Warner-Bros.-Kaufgerüchten

Angesichts möglicher Übernahmepläne von Warner Bros. durch Netflix sorgen sich Kino-Betreiber um ihre Geschäftsmodelle. Der Streaming-Gigant dämpft nun die Sorgen und betont, dass an den traditionellen Kino-Zeitfenstern auch nach einer potenziellen Transaktion nichts geändert werden soll.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Netf…

Aliens Discover Earth’s Radio Frequencies, Regret It Immediately

The latest Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal comic delivers a hilarious take on what happens when extraterrestrials encounter human technology. Through clever wordplay and classic SMBC humor, the strip imagines alien reactions to our radio transmissions with a darkly comedic twist.

Source: https://www.smbc-comics.com/comic/frequency-2 \n## Health

The Science Behind Perfectly Tender Roasted Broccoli

Discover why your roasted broccoli often turns tough and leathery, and learn the simple science-backed techniques to keep it tender and delicious every time. This article breaks down the chemical reactions happening in your oven and provides practical solutions for achieving perfectly crisp-yet-tender results.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/roasted-broccoli-science-11887862 \n## Food

The Secret to Perfect Scones: Freeze Now, Bake Later

Stop letting your homemade scones go stale! This clever freezing technique lets you prepare scone dough in advance and bake fresh, tender treats whenever the craving strikes. It’s the ultimate kitchen hack for busy bakers who want warm, bakery-quality scones any day of the week.

Source: https://www.seriouseats.com/freezing-scone-dough-tip-11887719 \n## Business

Disney Deletes Thread After Users Flood It With Anti-Fascist Movie Quotes

Disney asked social media followers to share favorite movie quotes, but users responded with anti-fascist lines from Star Wars, The Hunchback of Notre Dame, and other films. The company quickly deleted the post, raising questions about corporate messaging during politically sensitive times.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/news/863980/disney-deleted-anti-fascist-thread

Flucht aus dem Silicon Valley: Werden Milliardäre Kalifornien den Rücken kehren?

Ähnlich dem Brüssel-Effekt in Europa sorgt der ‚California Effect’ zunehmend für Unmut: Strenge Gesetze und Reichensteuer könnten vermögende Einzelpersonen und die Tech-Industrie aus dem Silicon Valley verdrängen. Dieser Wandel könnte die Zukunft des globalen Technologiezentrums maßgeblich beeinflussen.

Source: [www.heise.de/hintergru…

Die 11 Top-Tech-Aktien für 2026: J.P. Morgans geheime Favoriten

J.P. Morgan-Analysten identifizieren vielversprechende Tech-Aktien für 2026, die den Spagat zwischen KI-Innovation und finanzieller Disziplin meistern. Während Nvidia und Apple im Fokus liegen, warten echte Renditenchancen oft bei Spezialisten aus Cybersicherheit und Softwareentwicklung – Arista Networks gilt als sicherer Gewinner im KI-Zeitalter.

Source: https://www.basicthinking.de/blog/2026/01/17/die-besten-tech-aktien-2026-laut-analysten/

FTC soll “Trump Mobile” auf irreführende Werbung prüfen

Kongressabgeordnete und Senatoren fordern die US-Handelsaufsicht auf, das Marketing für das goldene “Trump Phone” zu überprüfen. Hauptkritikpunkt: Das Smartphone wurde als “Made in USA” beworben, obwohl diese Kennzeichnung fraglich erscheint. Die Behörde soll prüfen, ob es sich um irreführende Werbeversprechen handelt.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/US-H… \n## Technology

Apple’s Creator Studio: Where Icons Get Worse While Hardware Stays Excellent

John Gruber offers a comprehensive critique of Apple’s new Creator Studio suite, arguing that while Apple’s hardware designs remain confident and iconic, their software UI has regressed dramatically over the past decade. He examines the controversial new Liquid Glass icons, the strategic positioning of apps like Final Cut Pro and Pixelmator Pro, and questions whether Apple’s subscription model actually serves iWork users who just want basic AI features.

Source: https://daringfireball.net/2026/01/thoughts_and_observations_regarding_apple_creator_studio

Weekend Deals: Apple M4 Mac Mini and LG C5 OLED Hit New Lows

Best Buy’s Winter Sale and other retailers are offering impressive weekend discounts on premium tech. The Apple M4 Mac Mini drops to $499, while LG’s 65-inch C5 OLED TV is available for just over $1,100 on eBay — both matching near-all-time low prices.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/gadgets/863503/apple-mac-mini-m4-lg-c5-oled-tv-deal-sale

Risking It All: Testing an Unreleased Laptop at CES

A tech reporter defied convention by using a pre-production Asus Zenbook A16 with an unreleased Snapdragon X2 processor as their primary workhorse during CES. Despite initial fears of disaster, the ARM-based laptop proved impressive despite some pre-production glitches, offering a promising glimpse into the future of Windows on ARM devices.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/tech/862985/asus-zenbook-a16-snapdragon-x2-ces-early-testing-hands-on

Apple’s New Creator Studio Bundle: Professional Tools Meet Awkward iWork Upsell

Apple just announced Creator Studio, bundling professional apps like Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, and Pixelmator Pro into a $130/year subscription. While the creative tools are impressive and reasonably priced, the bundle awkwardly locks enhanced iWork features behind a subscription that many users don’t need or want.

Source: https://www.macsparky.com/blog/2026/01/apple-creator-studios-awkward-bundle-sponsor/

Microsoft Office Lifetime License Now $50 Cheaper Than One Year of 365

Microsoft Office Home and Business 2021 for Mac is now available as a lifetime license for just $49.97—$50 less than a single year of Microsoft 365. This one-time purchase gives you permanent access to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Teams, and OneNote on one Mac device, with no subscription fees to track or renew. The deal represents significant savings for users who prefer to own their software outright rather than paying recurring annual subscription costs.

Source: https://www.macworld.com/article/3031629/a-microsoft-office-lifetime-license-is-now-50-cheaper-than-a-single-year-of-microsoft-365.html \n## Politics

Minnesota Governor Launches Citizen Surveillance Against Federal ICE Raids

As ICE agents swarm hospitals, schools, and Targets across Minnesota, Governor Tim Walz is urging residents to document every federal raid, calling for evidence to build a future database of ‘atrocities.’ The governor envisions Nuremberg-style accountability trials, framing a battle between state resistance and federal immigration enforcement that could reshape how America confronts mass deportation.

Source: https://www.theverge.com/policy/863632/minnesota-walz-trump-sousveillance-ice

EU will Massenüberwachung auf alle Reisewege ausweiten

Die EU plant die Ausweitung der Passagierdatenspeicherung auf sämtliche Verkehrsmittel einschließlich Fähren, Bussen und Bahnen. Ein internes Ratspapier zeigt einen Fahrplan für neue Kontrollsysteme, die die Reisefreiheit massiv einschränken könnten.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Uebe…

Telefon-AU trotz besserer Statistiken infrage gestellt

Friedrich Merz zweifelt die telefonische Krankschreibung an, obwohl höhere Krankenstandszahlen primär auf präzisere Erfassung seit 2022 zurückgehen. Die Debatte um die Telefon-AU spitzt sich zu – während Experten statistische Effekte betonen, sieht der CDU-Politiker das System als Ursache steigender Fehltage.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Trot… \n## Science

Windkraft-Rekord 2025: Onshore-Anlagen boomen, doch das Stromnetz wird zum Flaschenhals

Die Onshore-Windenergie übertrifft 2025 alle Erwartungen mit historischen Genehmigungszahlen und starkem Zubau. Doch der Erfolg drohnt an seine Grenzen zu stoßen, da die Netzinfrastruktur nicht mithalten kann und ernsthafte Lücken aufweist.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Wind…

Rückkehr zum Mond: Artemis-2-Rakete erreicht Startrampe

Die NASA-Rakete für die historische Artemis-2-Mondmission ist erfolgreich an ihrem Startplatz angekommen. Diese Mission wird zum ersten Mal seit Jahrzehnten wieder Astronauten zum Mond bringen und markiert einen entscheidenden Meilenstein für die bemannte Raumfahrt.

Source: [www.heise.de/news/Arte…

How This Newsletter Works

This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that:

  1. Aggregates content from 61 RSS feeds
  2. Filters articles from the last 24 hours
  3. Categorizes each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air)
  4. Detects similarities and combines related stories
  5. Selects the top 5 most interesting stories per category
  6. Summarizes each story with AI (GLM-4.7)

Tech Stack: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings.

Generated with ❤️ by n8n

Hauptkritikpunkt: Das Smartphone wurde als "Made in USA" beworben, obwohl diese Kennzeichnung fraglich erscheint. Die Behörde soll prüfen, ob es sich um irreführende Werbeversprechen handelt. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/US-H...](https://www.heise.de/news/US-Handelsaufsicht-soll-Trump-Phone-auf-irrefuehrendes-Marketing-pruefen-11144824.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/US-Handelsaufsicht-soll-Trump-Phone-auf-irrefuehrendes-Marketing-pruefen-11144824.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) \n## Technology ### Apple's Creator Studio: Where Icons Get Worse While Hardware Stays Excellent John Gruber offers a comprehensive critique of Apple's new Creator Studio suite, arguing that while Apple's hardware designs remain confident and iconic, their software UI has regressed dramatically over the past decade. He examines the controversial new Liquid Glass icons, the strategic positioning of apps like Final Cut Pro and Pixelmator Pro, and questions whether Apple's subscription model actually serves iWork users who just want basic AI features. --- Source: [https://daringfireball.net/2026/01/thoughts_and_observations_regarding_apple_creator_studio](https://daringfireball.net/2026/01/thoughts_and_observations_regarding_apple_creator_studio) ### Weekend Deals: Apple M4 Mac Mini and LG C5 OLED Hit New Lows Best Buy's Winter Sale and other retailers are offering impressive weekend discounts on premium tech. The Apple M4 Mac Mini drops to $499, while LG's 65-inch C5 OLED TV is available for just over $1,100 on eBay — both matching near-all-time low prices. --- Source: [https://www.theverge.com/gadgets/863503/apple-mac-mini-m4-lg-c5-oled-tv-deal-sale](https://www.theverge.com/gadgets/863503/apple-mac-mini-m4-lg-c5-oled-tv-deal-sale) ### Risking It All: Testing an Unreleased Laptop at CES A tech reporter defied convention by using a pre-production Asus Zenbook A16 with an unreleased Snapdragon X2 processor as their primary workhorse during CES. Despite initial fears of disaster, the ARM-based laptop proved impressive despite some pre-production glitches, offering a promising glimpse into the future of Windows on ARM devices. --- Source: [https://www.theverge.com/tech/862985/asus-zenbook-a16-snapdragon-x2-ces-early-testing-hands-on](https://www.theverge.com/tech/862985/asus-zenbook-a16-snapdragon-x2-ces-early-testing-hands-on) ### Apple's New Creator Studio Bundle: Professional Tools Meet Awkward iWork Upsell Apple just announced Creator Studio, bundling professional apps like Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, and Pixelmator Pro into a $130/year subscription. While the creative tools are impressive and reasonably priced, the bundle awkwardly locks enhanced iWork features behind a subscription that many users don't need or want. --- Source: [https://www.macsparky.com/blog/2026/01/apple-creator-studios-awkward-bundle-sponsor/](https://www.macsparky.com/blog/2026/01/apple-creator-studios-awkward-bundle-sponsor/) ### Microsoft Office Lifetime License Now $50 Cheaper Than One Year of 365 Microsoft Office Home and Business 2021 for Mac is now available as a lifetime license for just $49.97—$50 less than a single year of Microsoft 365. This one-time purchase gives you permanent access to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Teams, and OneNote on one Mac device, with no subscription fees to track or renew. The deal represents significant savings for users who prefer to own their software outright rather than paying recurring annual subscription costs. --- Source: [https://www.macworld.com/article/3031629/a-microsoft-office-lifetime-license-is-now-50-cheaper-than-a-single-year-of-microsoft-365.html](https://www.macworld.com/article/3031629/a-microsoft-office-lifetime-license-is-now-50-cheaper-than-a-single-year-of-microsoft-365.html) \n## Politics ### Minnesota Governor Launches Citizen Surveillance Against Federal ICE Raids As ICE agents swarm hospitals, schools, and Targets across Minnesota, Governor Tim Walz is urging residents to document every federal raid, calling for evidence to build a future database of 'atrocities.' The governor envisions Nuremberg-style accountability trials, framing a battle between state resistance and federal immigration enforcement that could reshape how America confronts mass deportation. --- Source: [https://www.theverge.com/policy/863632/minnesota-walz-trump-sousveillance-ice](https://www.theverge.com/policy/863632/minnesota-walz-trump-sousveillance-ice) ### EU will Massenüberwachung auf alle Reisewege ausweiten Die EU plant die Ausweitung der Passagierdatenspeicherung auf sämtliche Verkehrsmittel einschließlich Fähren, Bussen und Bahnen. Ein internes Ratspapier zeigt einen Fahrplan für neue Kontrollsysteme, die die Reisefreiheit massiv einschränken könnten. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Uebe...](https://www.heise.de/news/Ueberwachung-der-Reisewege-EU-plant-Ausweitung-der-Passagierdatenspeicherung-11144951.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Ueberwachung-der-Reisewege-EU-plant-Ausweitung-der-Passagierdatenspeicherung-11144951.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Telefon-AU trotz besserer Statistiken infrage gestellt Friedrich Merz zweifelt die telefonische Krankschreibung an, obwohl höhere Krankenstandszahlen primär auf präzisere Erfassung seit 2022 zurückgehen. Die Debatte um die Telefon-AU spitzt sich zu – während Experten statistische Effekte betonen, sieht der CDU-Politiker das System als Ursache steigender Fehltage. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Trot...](https://www.heise.de/news/Trotz-Statistik-Effekten-Merz-stellt-telefonische-Krankschreibung-infrage-11144856.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Trotz-Statistik-Effekten-Merz-stellt-telefonische-Krankschreibung-infrage-11144856.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) \n## Science ### Windkraft-Rekord 2025: Onshore-Anlagen boomen, doch das Stromnetz wird zum Flaschenhals Die Onshore-Windenergie übertrifft 2025 alle Erwartungen mit historischen Genehmigungszahlen und starkem Zubau. Doch der Erfolg drohnt an seine Grenzen zu stoßen, da die Netzinfrastruktur nicht mithalten kann und ernsthafte Lücken aufweist. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Wind...](https://www.heise.de/news/Windkraft-Rekord-Die-Branche-liefert-doch-das-Netz-wird-zum-Flaschenhals-11145065.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Windkraft-Rekord-Die-Branche-liefert-doch-das-Netz-wird-zum-Flaschenhals-11145065.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) ### Rückkehr zum Mond: Artemis-2-Rakete erreicht Startrampe Die NASA-Rakete für die historische Artemis-2-Mondmission ist erfolgreich an ihrem Startplatz angekommen. Diese Mission wird zum ersten Mal seit Jahrzehnten wieder Astronauten zum Mond bringen und markiert einen entscheidenden Meilenstein für die bemannte Raumfahrt. --- Source: [[www.heise.de/news/Arte...](https://www.heise.de/news/Artemis-2-Rakete-auf-dem-Weg-zum-Startplatz-11144860.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag](https://www.heise.de/news/Artemis-2-Rakete-auf-dem-Weg-zum-Startplatz-11144860.html?wt_mc=rss.red.ho.ho.atom.beitrag.beitrag)) --- #### How This Newsletter Works This newsletter is automatically generated by an AI-powered workflow that: 1. **Aggregates** content from 61 RSS feeds 2. **Filters** articles from the last 24 hours 3. **Categorizes** each story using AI (GLM-4.5 Air) 4. **Detects similarities** and combines related stories 5. **Selects** the top 5 most interesting stories per category 6. **Summarizes** each story with AI (GLM-4.7) **Tech Stack**: Built with n8n, powered by Z.AI GLM-4.7 and OpenAI embeddings. --- **Generated with ❤️ by n8n**
